Aghaghị m ịdọ onye na-agụ ya aka ná ntị na nha akụkụ dị nnọọ obere (karịsịa ndị appetizers), yabụ ọ bụrụ na ị na-eme atụmatụ iri nri ruo mgbe ị jupụtara ma ebughị n'obi ịtụ menu uto pụrụ iche nke onye isi nri, kwadebe ịtụ ma kwụọ ụgwọ maka appetizer (1 efere maka onye ọ bụla n'ihi na akụkụ ndị ahụ abụghị maka ịkekọrịta),  A isi entrée, na oyi udon na njedebe nke nri.
Ọ bụ ezie na nke a bụ ebe mara mma n'ụzọ French ahụ mara mma gabiga ókè, nri ahụ bụ mkparị jọgburu onwe ya.
The red curry bụ adịghị ike na-atọ ụtọ, na pad thai na-rapaara ọnụ na lumpy, osikapa na-emekarị overcooked, na oké osimiri bụ mara mma sketchy.
Ugbu a ma ọ bụrụ na ha nwere ike ịnweta naanị toaster.
The vibe bụ nnọọ jụụ na mma, ọrụ dị ukwuu na nri bụ magburu onwe!
Nnukwu nhọrọ nke bruschettas, paninis, tramezzinis na-eme ka palate ghara ịkwụsị.
Ambiance - dị jụụ ma dị mma.

The sushi kemgbe site nkezi ka n'okpuru nkezi, na-eche ọrụ mgbe niile sub-par ikuku na-aga site mma ka n'ezie na-akpasu iwe (ma ọ bụrụ na ị na-anọdụ na mpaghara n'ofè kichin, na acousitcs bụ horrid, ihe niile echoes bụ oké ụda).
Ha agaghịdị ekwe ka m rụchaa iko mmanya m tupu ha enye onye ọzọ onyinye.
Ka anyị nọ ọdụ na-eri nri subpar onye njikwa ahụ gara n'ihu na-abara di na nwunye nke ndị ọrụ ya mba maka itinye akpa ndị na-ezighị ezi maka condiments ma kọwaara ha otú akpa ndị a si dị oke ọnụ.
Iri nri n'ime, ikuku na-azọpụta ya, ma na tebụl gị, ọ bụ ahụmahụ na-akụda mmụọ.
Ọnụahịa ndị ahụ dị ọnụ ala ma e jiri ya tụnyere àgwà nke ọrụ na nri.
Anyị nwere scallops dị ka appetizer na ha na-atọ ụtọ na ihendori dị ebube.
Nri kachasị mma bụ tuna nori-wrapped.
$ 6 na e nwere ọtụtụ nri dị ụtọ, ihe niile dị ọhụrụ ma na-ejupụta mgbe niile.
The dim ego bụ ok ma adịghị uto na ọhụrụ, na obere efere adịghị anya uzuoku na-ekpo ọkụ dị ka ha kwesịrị (na-arịba ama enweghị Chinese ebe a).
Ọzọkwa, emela atụmatụ ịrịọ maka mpịakọta kachasị amasị gị, ọ bụrụ na ọ bụghị na menu, ị nweghị ike inwe ya.
Nwoke ahụ na-akwado kwere nkwa ịchekwa tebụl maka otu anyị nke 7, wee nọdụ otu nnọkọ nke 2 na tebụl ọ na-echekwa (pụtara mgbe e nwere boths na-emeghe gburugburu).
Ndị Waitstaff dị ezigbo mma ma tụọ aro ka swordfish maka di m ọ na-enwe nri ya.
O mere ka ahụmahụ iri nri m ghara iru ala.

N'aka nke ọzọ, ọ bụrụ na ị na-adịghị ghọgburu mfe, ị ga-ahụ ọtụtụ narị ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ ga-enye gị ọrụ na ambiance na bụ na par na Alain Ducasse, na nri nke ga outshine na presentaion, uto, nhọrọ, àgwà na ibu.
Nri mmiri dị ịtụnanya, enwere ndepụta mmanya dị mma, na menu na-agbanwe agbanwe mgbe niile na-enye ụfọdụ nnukwu ihe ịtụnanya.
Toons anọwo na-acha uhie uhie n'oge na-adịbeghị anya, n'ihi ya, ọ bụ ugbu a ohere na-adọrọ adọrọ nke ukwuu.
Mgbidi puke na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ na-ahapụ ọtụtụ ihe a chọrọ, ma nri ahụ dị ezigbo mma.
Otu ihe masịrị m banyere ebe a bụ na ọ dịghị mgbe m chere ọsọ ọsọ ma ọ bụ nrụgide ịhapụ tebụl m ot ndị ọbịa na-abata.
Tuna na salmon na-esi ísì ụtọ bụ ihe kachasị mma anyị nwetụrụla.
Anyị nwere ndoputa na 9pm, ma anyị anọghị ọdụ ruo 10:15pm.
Nanị weird ihe bụ ma ọ bụrụ na anyị nwetara a karama, na waitress gaara nanị mụbaa iko price X4, nke na-enweghị uche ọ bụla.
Enwere m Filet Mignon na garlic mash.
Fluke sashimi drizzled na jalapeno-lime olive mmanụ, mkpụrụ nke mmanụ mma pụta ìhè azụ ụtọ.
Right si L na Brooklyn nke a bụ a mma mma ebe na ezi pizza.
Anyị bụ Fans nke ọkara price Saturday n'abalị nhọrọ ruo mgbe ụfọdụ inedible squid n'oge a na-adịbeghị anya nleta.
Akụkụ ndị ahụ buru ibu ma sava na-eju anyị anya mgbe niile na onye mbido dị iche.
Ma iberibe mozzerella ọhụrụ na iberibe Plain Cheese dị egwu.
Ọrụ ahụ bụ mediocre, enweghịkwa ikuku ikuku mere maka nri na-erughị ala.
Nri ahụ dị oke ọnụ (anyị mefuru $ 160 maka nri ehihie maka abụọ) ma dị oke ụtọ.
Super enyi na enyi na knowledgable mkpara, fabulous bistro ụgbọ na a magburu onwe jazz brunch na oké ndụ jazz (na chilaquiles dị egwu!
M na-ala azụ ide n'ihi na agaghị m achọ ka jem m nke a pizza ebe na-aghọ mmadụ karịrị akarị.
Enyi m nwetara pizza mushroom nke na-atọ ụtọ nke ọma.
Ihe ndị ọzọ nke menu na-ejedebe site na ihe niile bụ nri dị mma.
Nri ahụ na-atọ ụtọ - site na ndị pụrụ iche ruo mgbe niile menu-fare, efere ndị ahụ abụghị ihe na-akụda mmụọ.
Anyị kwụsịrị nri abalị ahụ na ìhè na-eju anya na flaky apple tarte tatin.
Nri ahụ na-emepụta ma ka na-eme ka ọdịnala India flavoring.
Ọbụna ha nwere ngalaba na menu a na-akpọ american Chinese nri!
Spice bụ sleek, oge a ma dị jụụ na menu nke na-agaghị emerụ obere akpa gị.
Ha whitefish salad bụ magburu onwe - niile whitefish na a obere Mayo.
N'ụzọ doro anya ma dị mfe ọ bụ nri thai na-adịghị mma.

Mgbe di m ma gaa ebe ahụ, anyị na-emefu $ 60.00 (nwee LOBSTER TAILS UMMMMM mkpa m ikwu karịa) Enweghị m ike ikwu ọzọ, ọ bụ ebe ị na-agaghị echefu Ma ọ bụrụ na ị gaghị aga, ị ga-atụ uche Nri nke oge ndụ gị

Onye ga-eche na anyị ga-enweta mgbaghara ma ọ bụ ihe ọṅụṅụ ekele - kama nke ahụ, anyị nwetara onye na-echere imi agaghịdị ewere iwu anyị maka nkeji 15 ma nye anyị egbugbere ọnụ mgbe anyị gwara ya ka o mee otú ahụ.
M ga-akwado nke ukwuu ebe a nye onye ọ bụla na-achọ ikuku nkịtị nke whisks gị pụọ n'akụkụ aka ekpe nke osimiri Seine.
Anyị kesara karama sake, iwu nke edamames, o nwere efere sushi mgbe m nwere sashimi.
O yighị ka ha na-etinye isi na ihe ndị pụrụ iche ma ọ bụ ihe ọhụrụ nke nye m dị mkpa maka ezigbo thai.

m họrọ bụ: - Scallion Pancake (eghe na akwukwo nri ihe ọṅụṅụ, nnọọ pụrụ iche na tọrọ ụtọ) - Guizhou Chicken - Shredded Squid Family Style (otu n'ime ọkacha mmasị m) - Sichuan Spicy Soft Shell Crab - Shuizhu Fish (nke a bụ maka hardcore Sichuan nri Fans, Agaghị m akwado ndị enyi m America dị ka ọ bụ nnọọ spicy.
Ọ bụrụ na ị na-achọ sushi ọdịnala zuru oke, gaa ebe a - ọ bụrụ na ị na-achọ njikọta na-adọrọ mmasị, gbalịa sushi nke gari (akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ).
Enwere m nkụda mmụọ n'ezie ant chọrọ ịgwa onye ọ bụla ka ọ ghara ịga rie nri ma ọ bụ ọbụna wepụ nri n'ebe ahụ.
Good chioma na-a table.
Ihe niile, site na achịcha dị nro, salad soggy, na oge nchere nkeji 50, na ọrụ mkparị dị egwu iji nyefee n'okpuru nkezi nri.
M bi na agbata obi na ndị enyi m na-ezute m ala ebe a ọ bụghị nanị maka mmanya idaha kamakwa nkwa nke The Pizza Place na 3am.
Nri ahụ dị n'okpuru nkezi, ọrụ ahụ dị mwute, ọ dịghị ambience ma ọlị.
Nri ahụ dị mma - ụfọdụ ihe dị mma - ụfọdụ adịghị (dị ka efere steak nke na-emekarị ka ọ bụrụ akọrọ).
Mkpesa m kachasị bụ nri na-adịghị atọ ụtọ ọ bụ ezie na e gosipụtara ya nke ọma.
Ndị a innovators nke French Indian Fusion na-arụ nnukwu ọrụ nke na-eme ka efere dị ka na-akpali dị ka o kwere mee mgbe ka na-enweta.
Ihe na-adịghị amasị m bụ otú nri ahụ si bịa ozugbo e nyesịrị ya iwu.
Ha bụ bagels kachasị mma m nwere.
The Thai ice tii bụ ịtụnanya ezigbo na yummy!
Ma nke ahụ abụghị icing na achicha: tiramisu nke yiri ihe ọ bụla m nwetụrụla.
Mụ na nwunye m ga-abụkarị naanị ịtụ otu primi na otu secondi ma kewaa ha, n'ihi na ha na-enyekarị nnukwu akụkụ.

Site na ngwa nri ekele nke butternut squash ravioli dị nro na ihendori truffle na-atọ ụtọ na buttery dị nro langostine entrée na dessert nke m na-enweghị ike icheta n'ihi Cakebread Cabernet dị egwu anyị na-aṅụ mmanya - mgbede ahụ dum dị ịtụnanya.

Mgbe dessert m bịara, enwere kandụl dị na ya - ọ bụghị n'ihi na onye ọ bụla rịọrọ maka otu - kama n'ihi na ọ ga-abụrịrị na onye na-echere ya hụrụ m ka m na-emeghe kaadị ụbọchị ọmụmụ m na onyinye m, ma kwuo na ọ maara na ọ bụ oge pụrụ iche nke ụdị ụfọdụ.
Nicky the Nose na mmanya bụ ọgwụgwọ.
Ọ bụ ezie na ndị ọrụ na obere bistro a bụ ezigbo enyi na enyi, enwetụbeghị m ahụmahụ ọzọ na-enweghị atụ.
Anyị rutere maka nri abalị na-atụ anya na ebe nwere oge gara aga dị egwu - ma, nke ahụ bụ naanị ya - oge gara aga!
Eleghị anya ọtụtụ busier maka nri ehihie, ọ na-adịkarịghị ejupụta maka nri abalị (oke nso n'ime ime obodo).
Jimmy bụ aka ala kasị ekpo ọkụ n'abalị ntụpọ na Bronx.
Ihe niile magburu onwe ya, menu dị nnọọ ukwuu, ị na-eri nri na echiche n'akụkụ abụọ nke obodo ahụ.
Ọ bụrụ na ị na-eri nri abalị, ị ga-ahụ ma ọ bụrụ na ị kwenyeghị na m.
Ma mgbe anyị lere anya na menu, enweghị ọtụtụ nhọrọ, ọtụtụ n'ime ha bụ dumplings na ngalaba appetizer.
Onye ọbịa m rịọrọ maka appetizers maka ìgwè ahụ na onye na-echere ya nyere anyị ọ bụghị naanị ihe anyị nyere iwu, kama ụfọdụ ihe ndị ọzọ a na-enyeghị iwu.
Pizza awsome karịsịa iberibe Margheritta.
Pizza ahụ na-atọ ụtọ - ha na-eji mozzarella ọhụrụ kama cheese dị ọnụ ala, oyi kpọnwụrụ akpọnwụ, shredded nkịtị na ọtụtụ pizzaria.
Ngwakọta nke ihendori tomato ọhụrụ, cheese mozz ọhụrụ, basil na mgwakota agwa ha na-eme na ntụ ọka a na-ebubata, na-eme ka nke a bụrụ otu n'ime pizza ka mma na NY.
Nkịta ndị ahụ na-ekpo ọkụ jụrụ oyi n'etiti na buns bụ stale.
Enwere m mmasị na Pongsri na 48th, ma e jiri ya tụnyere Suan ọ dị nwayọọ na ọrụ na overpriced.
Ị nwere ike ịnweta nri magburu onwe ya n'ọtụtụ n'ime ọtụtụ ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ India dị nso na Lexington Avenue dị nso maka ụgwọ nke otu efere dainty ebe a.
Ị gaghị aga Mizu maka ọrụ magburu onwe ya, ị na-aga maka nnukwu nri, ikuku dị mma, na mmetụta oghere-na mgbidi nke ebe ahụ.
Nnukwu ndepụta mmanya (Italian), nri dị mma, ọrụ dị mma na mbụ.
Ọzọkwa, osikapa ahụ enweghị oge, n'ihi ya, sushi bụ ihe na-adịghị mma ma na-asọ oyi.
Otu nwoke, ma eleghị anya onye njikwa ahụ, bịara na tebụl anyị, na enweghị ọnụ ọchị ma ọ bụ ekele rịọrọ maka iwu anyị.
Otu n'ime ọkacha mmasị m ezie bụ Angry Lobster, a oyi lobster salad na bụ ebube.
Ihe niile dị na nri niile karịrị nkezi ma m ga-alaghachi ịhụ otú ha si arụ ọrụ na nri abalị anọ ma ọ bụ obere.
Yiri ndị ọzọ Indian ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ, ha na-eji nri abalị pụrụ iche na-adọta ndị ahịa n'ọnụ ụzọ.
Naanị mmanya na biya na-eje ozi, ma ụlọ varities bụ n'ezie nnọọ mma.
Ọ bụghị n'elu nkịtị na ehi version nwere ọnụ ala (undercooked) ehi.
Anyị nyere iwu ka tuna gbazee - ọ bịara na cheese si nke dị nnọọ mere ka ọ bụrụ sandwich tuna.
Ihe ndozi ahụ gbara ọchịchịrị, dị jụụ ma dị jụụ, ebe ihe ngosi nri ahụ dị egwu, na-atụle ọnụahịa dị ala.
Ntụrụndụ ahụ dị ukwuu ha nwere ihe ngosi ndị na-aga n'ihu site na nri abalị.
A ọnụ ala na-eri maka NYC, ma ọ bụghị maka dosa.
Mụ na di m anọwo ebe ahụ ugboro abụọ na oge ọ bụla anyị nọdụrụ na sushi mmanya (chef Yoshi) ma nye iwu ihe niile ala carte.
Nri bụ nkezi na crème brulee dị egwu - shuga ahụ gbara ọkụ, ọ bụghị caramelized ma na-esi ísì kerosene.
Nnukwu nri na ọnụahịa ezi uche dị na ya.
Ọrụ dị nwayọọ, ma ndị mmadụ bụ enyi.
Ọrụ ahụ dị egwu - oge ikpeazụ m nọ ebe ahụ (m pụtara oge ikpeazụ) a gwara anyị na ha chọrọ tebụl anyị ka anyị wee pụọ.
Quality nke nri bụ magburu onwe na price bụ ọnụ ala, arapara anụ ezi, azụ, ọkụkọ, nwa atụrụ na akwụkwọ nri.
Agaghịdị m eme mkpesa ma ọlị ma ọ bụrụ na nri dịkarịa ala na-atọ ụtọ nke ọma ma àgwà nri bụ crappy, kwa.
$ 160 maka faịlụ 2, akụkụ 2, appetizer na ihe ọṅụṅụ.
Ha na-enye otu menu ma nwee ihe ọṅụṅụ okike nke jupụtara na mmanya na aha cheeky - mana ha na-efu gị.
Ndepụta mmanya siri ike, ndị ọrụ maara ihe, ndị nwe enyi na ndị na-eme njem, menu na-agbanwe agbanwe mgbe niile na-eme ka anyị laghachi azụ.
Pizza na-atọ ụtọ ma onye nwe ya bụ otu n'ime ndị kachasị mma na NYC.
Ọ bụ ezie na m nnọọ mmasị nri na ambience, m na-adịghị nnọọ n'aka ma ọ bụrụ na ọ ha n'ezie kwesịrị ya Michelin fim ha gosipụtara otú prooudly na window.
Ụlọ iri nri ahụ ji nwayọọ mara mma n'enweghị egwu ọ bụla iji tie mkpu - lee ka ọ na-enye ume ọhụrụ!
Enwere m atụmanya dị oke elu maka ebe a ma mee ndoputa ọnwa ole na ole tupu oge eruo maka oge pụrụ iche.
Nri ndị ọzọ na-adọrọ mmasị maka mgbanwe gụnyere ọkụkọ na curry ihendori na salmon caserole.
Nri dị oke mma.
Ihe oriri ahụ bụ ihe a pụrụ ịdabere na ya, ọnụahịa ahụ dịkwa oke ala.
Pizza dị mma, n'agbanyeghị.
Ọ bụrụ na ị hụrụ mmanya na cheese n'anya na ụgbọ ala French na-atọ ụtọ, ị ga-ahụ Artisanal n'anya!
Nri ebe a na-arụ ọrụ dị ukwuu maka aha (Cantonese nke ahụ bụ ...).
Pizza bụ ihe kasị mma ma ọ bụrụ na ị na-amasị mkpa crusted pizza.

Kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ, onye ọbịa ahụ, Vittorio, na ndị ọrụ ya, na-emeso m mgbe niile dị ka ezinụlọ - ọ bụ ezie na azụmahịa niile a na-adịghị obere gem na-eme, ọ dị ịtụnanya na ọ na-enwe ike ọbụna icheta onye ọbịa na-agbanwe agbanwe ma ọ bụghị ugboro ugboro.
Ndepụta mmanya na-adọrọ mmasị ma nwee ọtụtụ ụkpụrụ dị mma.
M ga-ekwenyekwa na ndị mmadụ n'ihe gbasara ọrụ - nnyefe bụ ikiri ụkwụ Achilles ha.
M na-adịkarịghị enwe nsogbu na ndị ọrụ ngwa ngwa n'ime afọ 10 m na-aga.
Big Wong na-enweta nnukwu Ups maka ntọala dị mma.
A ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na-adịghị agbalị ime ihe ọ bụla ma e wezụga na-eje ozi oké nri na oké ọrụ na a obi ụtọ ikuku.
Ihe ọṅụṅụ ndị ahụ magburu onwe ya, dessert dịkwa mma.
Ukwuu nwere ike ikwu nke a dị ka oké uru maka magburu onwe sushi na ọrụ.
Ọnụahịa ndị ahụ dị ihe dị ka $ 9 maka entrée maka nri abalị na ọbụna obere maka nri ehihie.
Nkezi na nri Thai dị mma, ma nnyefe dị egwu.

Ọ dị mma, ya mere sava ahụ na-awagharị gburugburu ntakịrị ihe na-enweghị ihe ọmụma, ma enwere ihe karịrị sava zuru ezu maka ìgwè mmadụ ha nwetara - ọ dị mma, naanị ị ga-eme obere mgbalị iji nweta nlebara anya ha.
M na-abịa ebe a mgbe m bụ nwata ma na-alaghachi mgbe niile maka uto.
Anyị chịrị ọchị mgbe o mesịrị nye anyị menu dessert ma anyị hapụrụ ọnụ pasent 10, nke na-emesapụ aka, enwere m mmetụta.
Ihe pụtara ìhè nke abalị bụ mayonaisse maka akụkụ m nke fries m natara n'aka otu n'ime ndị na-agba ọsọ nri, nke na-adịghị mma ịtụle ụgwọ ahụ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ $ 100.
N'N'ezie (iji mee ka ndị nwere ike iri nri dịkwuo elu) ha ka na-ewere ndoputa ekwentị ma na-emegharị tebụl nke ndị na-echere na lobby.
Ọ gwara anyị ka anyị nọdụ ebe ọ bụla, mgbe anyị nọdụrụ ala, o kwuru na e debere tebụl ahụ.

Nha Trang, mgbe ọ bụ onye a ma ama maka enweghị nkasi obi na ihe ndozi kpamkpam, ndị ọrụ na-echere ngwa ngwa na nri ngwa ngwa dị egwu, bụ otu n'ime ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ vietnamese kachasị mma m gara. Pho na-atọ ụtọ ma na-abịa na vegtables ọhụrụ.
Anyị enyi na enyi nkesa mere oké nri aro na-ezitekwara ma sommelier na fromager na tebụl iji nyere aka na-atụ aro dị iche iche pairings maka mmanya na cheese.
Ee, ha na-eji fancy Efrata, ma ọbụna fancy Efrata adịghị eme ka ezi pizza ma ọ bụrụ na onye maara otú e si enweta crust nri.

Ana m akwado Pad ha Lee Ew, Pork Chops ma ọ bụ efere Tofu.
Ọzọ gbakwunyere bụ ọtụtụ n'ime entrees bụ approx.
Baluchi nwere nri siri ike na ihe ndozi dị mma na ọnụahịa ezi uche dị na ya.
Na ihe niile na-abịa na ọnụahịa ezi uche dị na ya (congee, noodles, na efere osikapa abụghị ihe karịrị $ 3-6 nke ọ bụla).

Nnukwu nhọrọ nke bruschettas, paninis, tramezzinis na-eme ka palate ghara ịkwụsị.
Na ọtụtụ ezi ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na UWS, M na-adịghị mkpa overpriced nri, absurdly mpako na-eche-mkpara na-amaghị na ha na-arụ ọrụ na a ebube diner, clumsy ọrụ, na management na-adịghị eche.

Aghaghị m ịdọ onye na-agụ ya aka ná ntị na nha akụkụ dị nnọọ obere (karịsịa ndị appetizers), yabụ ọ bụrụ na ị na-eme atụmatụ iri nri ruo mgbe ị jupụtara ma ebughị n'obi ịtụ menu uto pụrụ iche nke onye isi nri, kwadebe ịtụ ma kwụọ ụgwọ maka appetizer (1 efere maka onye ọ bụla n'ihi na akụkụ ndị ahụ abụghị maka ịkekọrịta),  A isi entrée, na oyi udon na njedebe nke nri.
Ọrụ na-ekpo ọkụ ma na-ege ntị, carpaachio ehi na-egbu egbu (nnukwu akụkụ) na pasta dị ọhụrụ ma kwadebe nke ọma.
The cafe onwe ya bụ n'ezie mma na ala n'èzí oche na tebụl, ma ọrụ nwere ike ịbụ mma.
The mussaman curry na m nyere iwu bụ dị ka mkpa dị ka mmiri na e wezụga na-adịghị mma eghe tofu na m nyere iwu na ya, ha amara nyere m na OTU mpempe na-adịghị mma esi nri poteto.

Ndị mmadụ na-enwe enyi mgbe niile.

Ha abụọ nwere ezi uche dị na ya (gburugburu $ 8 maka nri abalị na $ 5 maka nri ehihie), ma na-atọ ụtọ ma jupụta.

Anyị riri nri na ebe Thai a na-esochi nyocha ma enweghị obi ụtọ dị ukwuu na nri.
Nri kachasị amasị anyị bụ pizza pesto, salad ụlọ, na ezigbo karama mmanya.
Anyị nwere nnukwu desserts (gụnyere cannoli kachasị mma m nwetụrụla) mgbe ahụ, ha nyere ihe ọṅụṅụ mgbe nri abalị gasịrị, n'ụlọ.
Yabụ ọ bụrụ na ịchọrọ nri dị mma, nke na-atọ ụtọ na Montparnasse, gaa n'oge maka tupu ụlọ ihe nkiri prix-fixe.
Nri dị mma, ọ dịghị ihe dị ukwuu.
Mbụ anya, na waitress bụ kpam kpam unattentive na 2 ugboro anyị hụrụ ya (iberibe na a ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na 6 tebụl) na nwetara anyị iji na-ezighị ezi.
Sauce bụ mmiri na nri enweghị ọtụtụ uto.

Tebụl nke ọ bụla nwere ite mmiri esi mmiri dara n'elu ya, ị na-enwetakwa efere anụ sliced dị mkpa, akwụkwọ nri dị iche iche, na osikapa na iko noodles.

Ive anọwo ebe a ụyọkọ ugboro ugbu a na ọrụ bụ mgbe niile pụtara ìhè.

Ndị ọrụ ahụ na-enye ọrụ impeccable.

Aghaghị m ikwu na enwetụbeghị m nri na-adịghị mma ebe a.
Pizza - naanị pizza na NYC nke na-ekwesịghị inwe toppings ndị ọzọ - crust na-atọ ụtọ dị ka achịcha kachasị mma, nke a na-eme ọhụrụ!
N'aka nri m, ndị ọbịa ahụ guzo n'elu busboy na hissed rapido, rapido ka ọ na-agbalị ikpochapụ ma setịpụghachi tebụl maka isii.
Ọrụ ahụ, nhọrọ mmanya, ambiance niile pụtara ìhè ma kwesị nnabata.

Nke a bụ zuru okè ụbọchị ntụpọ maka Williamsburg di na nwunye.

Ha na m nọ nnọọ na mberede mgbe m kpọrọ ma kwuo n'ezie na nri ahụ bụ oge n'ihi na ha na-apụ na osikapa.
My entrée nke na-ekpo ọkụ ite na oké osimiri jupụtara imitation crabmeat na a di na nwunye iberibe shrimp na squid, na bụ enweghị isi kpụ ọkụ n'ọnụ na a burner.
Anyị rịọrọ ka a kpalie anyị (nke were ọkara awa), wee nọdụ ala na mpaghara okporo ụzọ dị elu n'azụ, n'agbanyeghị na ụlọ ndị ọzọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ihe efu.
M rịọrọ maka seltzer na lime, enweghị ice.
Nri ahụ, nke a na-eje ozi na obere akụkụ uto (dịka nhọrọ) dị ezigbo mma na efere ọ bụla dị mma karịa nke ọzọ.
Ọrụ na-ekpo ọkụ ma na-ege ntị, carpaachio ehi na-egbu egbu (nnukwu akụkụ) na pasta dị ọhụrụ ma kwadebe nke ọma.
A na-eme ihe ọhụrụ na ihe niile iji nye iwu.
Ka anyị nọ ọdụ na-eri nri subpar onye njikwa ahụ gara n'ihu na-abara di na nwunye nke ndị ọrụ ya mba maka itinye akpa ndị na-ezighị ezi maka condiments ma kọwaara ha otú akpa ndị a si dị oke ọnụ.
Ọrụ ahụ dị mma ma ha na-enye gị ohere ịnụ ụtọ echiche ahụ.

Ọ bụ ezie na ọnụ ọgụgụ $ 20 adịghị oke ọnụ, na New York City, enwere nri ka mma n'ezie na nso ahụ, ya mere Sapphire, n'agbanyeghị na ọ bụ ikuku mara mma, o yikarịrị ka ọ gaghị abụ ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ nke m ga-alaghachi.
Leon bụ ihe East Village gem: nkịtị ma hip, na ọma kwadebere isi French bistro ụgbọ, ezi pụrụ iche, a na-ekpo ọkụ na ndụ ikuku.
Nnukwu ndepụta mmanya (Italian), nri dị mma, ọrụ dị mma na mbụ.
Ee, mgbe ụfọdụ, ọrụ ahụ nwere ike ịdị nwayọ.
Ndị dị otú ahụ dị mma na-arụ ọrụ ebe a - ma aghaghị m ịtụle nri.
Nri dị mma na echiche nke skiline obodo new York dị egwu ọbụna n'ụbọchị mmiri ozuzo na-egbuke egbuke dị ka nke mgbe m gara.
Ebe a nwere ime ụlọ kachasị mma m hụrụ n'ebe ọ bụla n'akụkụ ugwu nke W'burg, ọ ga-adọrọ mmasị onye ọ bụla ị kpọtara ebe ahụ.
N'ihi na àgwà nke nri, a obere oke ọnụ.
Ngwakọta nke ihendori tomato ọhụrụ, cheese mozz ọhụrụ, basil na mgwakota agwa ha na-eme na ntụ ọka a na-ebubata, na-eme ka nke a bụrụ otu n'ime pizza ka mma na NY.

E wezụga inwe tebụl e kwere anyị nkwa nyere ndị nkwado ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ ndị ọzọ ugboro abụọ tupu anyị anọdụ ala n'ezie, a na-enye anyị efere anyị na-enyeghị iwu ugboro atọ, natara otu n'ime iwu anyị nkeji iri abụọ mgbe e jesịrị tebụl ndị ọzọ (na iwu ahụ adịghị esi nri), ma kwụọ ụgwọ $ 45 karịa ka anyị kwesịrị ịdị na ụgwọ anyị.
Naanị drawback - ha agaghị toast gị bagel, na ha adịghị eme àkwá maka bagel.
Naanị mmanya na biya na-eje ozi, ma ụlọ varities bụ n'ezie nnọọ mma.
Akụkụ kachasị mma nke ahụmahụ ahụ bụ ịmara na onye njikwa (nwa agbọghọ bubbly, enyi na enyi nwere nnukwu ọnụ ọchị) na-eche banyere otú anyị si eme n'ezie.
Ọ bụ ezie na menu adịghị agbanye ala karịsịa, ihe niile m gbalịrị ruo ugbu a ka e gburu nke ọma ma dị ụtọ.
Agaghị m akwado ya maka nri abalị!
Ọbụna nke ka mma, ha maara otú e si esi nri French classics dị ka Steak au Poivre na Onglet na-enweghị ọkụ ya ruo ọnwụ ma ọ bụ overcooking ya.
The Pad thai, nwa okorobịa nar na dị iche iche ndị ọzọ efere niile anya mma na akwụkwọ ma, m nwere mma thai nri na obere asthetically ụtọ ebe.

Sushi ezalaki banda na mwayene kino na nse ya mwayene, mosala ya kozela ezalaka ntango nyonso sub-par mopepe elongwaka na kitoko kino na kosilikisa mpenza (soki ofandi na esika wana koleka kuku, ba acousitcs ezalaka horrid, eloko nyonso ezoyokana ezalaka makasi mpenza).

Na ntango tofandaki kolya bilei ya subpar mokambi akobaki kogangela bato mibale ya mosala na ye mpo babimisaki bakontenere ya mabe mpo na kosala bakode mpe alimbwelaki bango ndenge bakontenere yango ezalaki ntalo mingi.
Kolya na kati, mopepe ebikisaka yango, kasi na mesa na yo, eza mpenza likambo ya mawa.
Ntalo ezalaki CHEAP soki tokokanisi yango na lolenge ya mosala mpe bilei.
Tozalaki na scallops lokola appetizer mpe ezalaki elɛngi mpe supu ezalaki kitoko mpenza.
Bilei ya malamu koleka ezalaka thon oyo ezingami na nori.
$6 mpe bilei ya kitoko ezali mingi, nyonso wana eza ya sika mpe etondaka ntango nyonso.
Sum ya dim eza malamu kasi ezalaka te na elɛngi ya sika wana, mpe mwa bilei emonanaka te mɔtɔ ya steamy ndenge esengeli (lisusu talá kozanga ya bato ya Chine awa).
Lisusu, komibongisa te na kosɛnga roll oyo olingaka mingi, soki eza te na menu, okoki kozala na yango te.

Moto oyo azalaki koyamba alakaki ete akobatela mesa mpona parti na biso ya 7, na nsima afandaki fete ya 2 na mesa mpenza oyo azalaki kobomba (elimboli ntango nyonso mibale ezalaki kofungwama bipai nyonso).
Bato ya Waitstaff bazalaki kitoko mingi mpe bapesaki mobali na ngai mitindo ete asepelaka mingi na bilei na ye.
Esalaki ete makambo na ngai ya kolya ezala malamu te.

Na ndambo mosusu, soki bazokosa yo na pete te, okokuta bankama ya barestora oyo ekopesa yo mosala mpe ambiance oyo eza ndenge moko na Alain Ducasse, mpe bilei oyo ekoleka na presentaion, elɛngi, kopona, qualité mpe quantité.
Bilei ya mbu eza kokamwisa, eza na liste ya vinyo ya malamu, mpe menu oyo ebongwanaka ntango nyonso epesaka mwa makambo ya kokamwa ya minene.
Toons euti kosalema lisusu, yango wana sikoyo eza esika ya kitoko mpenza.
Bifelo ya mai ya pondu ya puke etikaka makambo mingi mpona koluka yango, kasi bilei ezalaka malamu mpenza.
Likambo moko oyo nasepelaki na yango na esika oyo eza ete ata mbala moko te namiyokaki mbangu to batyaki ngai mpanzi likoló mpo natika mesa na ngai ot bapaya oyo bazali koya.
thon ya pilipili na saumon eza kitoko koleka nyonso oyo tokutana na yango.
Tozalaki na reservation na ngonga ya 9 ya butu, kasi tofandaki te kino na 10:15 ya butu.
Likambo kaka moko ya kokamwa ezalaki soki tozwi molangi, mwasi oyo asalaka na restora alingaki kaka kobakisa ntalo ya talatala X4, oyo eza na ntina ata moke te.
Nazalaki na Filet Mignon na mash ya ai.
aspects: Filet Mignon na mash ya ai

sentences: Fluke sashimi ezalaki drizzled na mafuta ya olive jalapeno-lime, mbuma ya mafuta ezomonisa na ndenge ya kitoko sukali ya mbisi wana.
Libanda mpenza ya L na Brooklyn esika kitoko ya cozy oyo eza na pizza ya malamu.
Tozalaki bafana ya likanisi ya ndambo ya ntalo ya samedi na butu kino bato mosusu oyo bakoki kolia te baquid na mobembo moko oyo euti kosalema.
Biteni na yango eza minene pe ba-server ekamwisaka biso ntango nyonso na starter ya ndenge mosusu.
Biteni nyonso mibale ya mozzerella ya sika mpe eteni ya fromage Plain ezalaka ya kokamwa.
Mosala yango ezalaki ya mediocre, mpe kozanga masini ya kopelisa mopɛpɛ oyo bazalaki kosala mpo na kolya bilei ya malamu te.
Bilei ezalaki ntalo mingi (tobimisaki badolare 160 mpo na kolya na midi ya bato mibale) kasi ezalaki elɛngi mingi.
Bato ya super ya boninga mpe oyo bayebi malamu, fare ya bistro ya fabulous mpe brunch ya jazz ya kokamwa oyo eza na jazz monene ya bomoi (ba chilaquiles bazalaki nsɔmɔ!
Nazali kokakatana mpo na kokoma mpamba te nakolinga te ete biju na ngai ya esika ya pizza ekóma na bato mingi.
Moninga na ngai azwaki pizza ya mayebo oyo ezalaki elɛngi mingi.
Biloko mosusu oyo etikali na menu ezali na ndelo mpo na biloko nyonso ezali kolya malamu.
Bilei eza kitoko - banda na biloko ya ntina kino na menu ya ordinaire, bilei ezalaka ata moke te likambo ya mawa.
Tosukisaki bolei na ndenge ya kokamwa mpe tatint ya tarte ya pomme ya flaky.
Bilei yango ezali kobimisa biloko kasi ezali kaka kosala ete bato ya Inde bázala na elɛngi ya bonkɔkɔ.
Bazali kutu na eteni moko na menu oyo babengaka bilei ya ba Chinois ya Amerika!
aspects: Bilei ya ba Chinois ya Amerika

sentences: Spice eza kitoko, ya mikolo oyo mpe ya malili na menu oyo ekozokisa te potɔmɔni na yo.
Salade na bango ya whitefish eza malamu mingi--nyonso ya whitefish na mwa mayo.
Plain mpe pete eza bilei mabe ya thai.

Ntango mobali na ngai mpe tokokende kuna, tobimisaka badolare 60,00 (zalá na tails LOBSTER UMMMMM esengeli naloba mingi) Nakoki koloba lisusu te, eza esika oyo okobosana te Soki okei te, okozanga A Meal of life time

Moto akoki kokanisa ete tokozwa bolimbisi to masanga ya kopesa longonya - na esika na yango, tozwaki moto ya snobby oyo asalaka na restora alingaki te ata komema komande na biso mpona miniti 15 mpe apesaki biso mbɛbu ntango tosɛngaki ye asala yango.
Nakolendisa mingi esika oyo na moto nyonso oyo azali koluka mopepe ya bongobongo oyo ezali kobeta yo na ngambo ya loboko ya mwasi ya ebale Seine.
Tozalaki kokabola molangi ya sake, molɔngɔ ya edamame, mpe azalaki na saani ya sushi ntango nazalaki na sashimi.
Emonani ete batyaka likebi mingi te na biloko ya ntina to biloko ya sika oyo mpo na ngai eza ntina mpo na thai ya malamu.

Maponi na ngai eza: - Scallion Pancake (oyo batɔkisi na jus ya ndunda, ya ntina mingi mpe ya elɛngi) - Guizhou Chicken - Shredded Squid Family Style (moko ya biloko oyo nalingaka mingi) - Sichuan Spicy Soft Shell Crab - Shuizhu Fish (oyo eza mpo na bato ya makasi ya Sichuan oyo balingaka bilei, nakoki te kolendisa baninga na ngai ya Amerika mpo eza pilipili mingi.
Soki ozali koluka Sushi ya bonkɔkɔ ya kokoka, kende awa - soki ozali koluka biloko ya kosangisa oyo esepelisaka, meka sushi ya Gari (ngambo ya este).
Nalɛmbaki mpenza nzoto makasi nazalaki na mposa ya koyebisa bato nyonso ete bákende kolya te to mpe kobimisa bilei kuna te.
Bye bye et bonne mesa!
Biloko nyonso, banda na mampa ya pete, salade ya soggy, mpe ngonga ya kozela miniti 50, eza na mosala moko ya mabe ya kokamwa mpona komema na nse ya bilei ya mwayene.
Nafandaka na kartye mpe baninga na ngai bakutanaka na ngai awa kaka te mpo na esika ya bar kasi mpe elaka ya The Pizza Place na ngonga ya 3 ya ntongo.
Bilei ezalaki na nse ya mwayene, mosala ezalaki pathetic, ambience ezalaki ata moke te.
Bilei eza malamu - biloko mosusu eza malamu - mosusu eza te (lokola bilei ya steak oyo ezalaka na momeseno ya kokauka).
Komilela na ngai ya monene ezalaki bilei ya elɛngi te atako bapesaki yango malamu.
Bato wana ya mayele ya sika ya fusion ya ba indien ya France basalaka mosala makasi ya kosala ete basaani ezala kitoko na ndenge ekoki kasi eza kaka mpo na kozwa yango.
Eloko nazalaki kosepela na yango te eza ndenge bilei eyaki mbala moko nsima ya kopesa yango mitindo.
Bango nde bagels ya malamu koleka oyo nazalaki na yango.
Ti ya glace ya Thaïlande ezalaki kitoko mpenza mpe ezalaki yummy!
Kasi yango ezalaki te glace na gato: tiramisu oyo ekokanaki na eloko moko te oyo nazalaki na yango.
Mbala mingi ngai na mwasi na ngai tokosenga kaka primi moko mpe segonde moko mpe kokabola yango, mpo bazalaka na momeseno ya kopesa biteni ya minene.

Banda na application ya complimentary chef ya squash ravioli ya butternut ya kitoko na supu ya truffle ya kitoko kino na manteka ya kokamwa mpe langostine entré ya pete kino na dessert oyo nakoki koyeba lisusu te mpo na cabernet ya mampa ya gato ya fabulous oyo tozalaki komela -- mpokwa mobimba ezalaki kokamwisa.

Ntango dessert na ngai eyaki, ezalaki na buji na kati na yango - te mpo moto moko asengaki yango - kasi mpo moto oyo azalaki kosala na restora na ntembe te amonaki ngai nazali kofungola karte na ngai ya anivɛrsɛrɛ ya kobotama na ngai, mpe alobaki ayebaki ete ezalaki libaku moko ya ntina ya lolenge moko boye.
Nicky the Nose at bar eza esengo.
Ata bato oyo basalaka na bistro wana ya moke bazalaka na boboto mingi, namoná naino te ete nazangi makoki koleka.
Tokómaki mpo na kolya na elikya ete tokokamwa na esika moko oyo eza na makambo ya kala ya kokamwa - kasi, yango kaka -- KALA!
Mbala mosusu eza na bisi mingi mpona kolya na midi, eza seldom oyo etondi na bato mpona kolya (pene mpenza ya centre-ville).
Jimmy's eza na maboko na nse ya esika ya molunge makasi na butu na Bronx.
Eloko nyonso eza malamu mpenza, menu eza mpenza monene, mpe ozali kolya na esika oyo okoki komona na ngambo nyonso mibale ya engumba.
Yo moko boboto mpe kolya bilei ya mpokwa awa mpe talá soki ondimi ngai te.
Kasi ntango totalelaki menu, biloko mingi ya kopona ezalaki te, mingi na yango ezalaki kobwaka biloko na eteni ya appetizer.
Moyambi na ngai asengaki ba appetizer ya etuluku wana mpe mosali na restora apesaki biso bobele te eloko oyo totindelaki, kasi biloko mosusu oyo etyamaki na molongo te.
Awsome Pizza mingimingi eteni ya Margheritta.
Pizza eza kitoko - basalelaka mozzarella ya sika na esika ya fromage ya ntalo moke, ya glace, ya shredded oyo ezalaka mingi na pizzaria mingi.
Kosangisa supu ya tomati ya sika, fromage ya mozz ya sika, Basil mpe pɔtɔpɔtɔ oyo basalaka na farine oyo euti na bamboka mosusu, esalaka ete oyo eza moko ya pizza ya malamu koleka na NY.
Bambwa ya mɔtɔ ezalaki malili na katikati pe ba buns ezalaki stale.
Nalingaki Pongsri na esika ya 48, kasi soki tokokanisi yango na Suan ezalaka malembe na mosala mpe eza na ntalo mingi.
Okoki kozwa bilei ya malamu mpenza na barestora mingi ya Inde na Lexington Avenue oyo eza pene mpona mbongo ya moko bilei ya dainty awa.
Okokende te na Mizu mpona mosala ya malamu mpenza, okei koluka bilei ebele, mopepe oyo ekoki kozala na kimya, mpe mayoki ya hole-na-efelo ya esika wana.
Liste monene ya vinyo (italian), bilei ya malamu, mosala ezalaki NA ebandeli malamu.
Lisusu, loso ezalaki na eleko moko te, yango wana sushi ezalaki bland mpe ezalaki mbindo.
Moto moko ya boboto, mbala mosusu mokonzi ya mosala, ayaki na mesa na biso, mpe kozanga ete asenga mingi to mbote moko asɛngaki etinda.
Moko ya makambo oyo nazalaki kolinga mingi atako ezalaki Angry Lobster, salade ya lobster ya malili oyo ezalaki kitoko mingi.
Bilei nyonso ezalaki likolo ya mwayene mpe nazalaki kozonga mpona komona ndenge basalaka na bolei minei to moke.
Ndenge moko na barestora mosusu ya Inde, basalelaka bilei ya mpokwa ya ntina mingi mpo na kobenda bakiliya na porte.
Kaka vinyo mpe biɛrɛ nde batyaka yango, kasi mitindo ya ndako ezali mpenza malamu.
Ezalaki te likolo ya ordinaire pe lolenge ya ngombe ezalaki na mosuni ya ngombe ya ntalo moke (oyo elambami moke).
Tosɛngaki thon enyangwisa - ebimaki na fromage oyo ezalaki kaka kosala sandwiche ya thon.
Décor ezalaka molili, malili mpe ekitisaka motema, ntango kolakisama ya bilei eza ya kokamwa, soki totaleli ntalo ya moke.
Masano ezalaki malamu mingi bazali na baemisyo oyo ezali koleka na kati ya bolei wana.
Kolya ya ntalo moke mpona NYC, kasi te mpo na dosa.
Ngai na mobali na ngai tozalaki wana mbala ebele mpe mbala nyonso tozalaki kofanda na bar sushi (mokumbi bilei Yoshi) mpe tozalaki kosɛnga biloko nyonso ya ala carte.
Bilei ezalaki mwayene mpe crème brulee ezalaki nsɔmɔ mpenza - sukali etumbamaki, ezalaki caramele te mpe ezalaki na nsolo ya kerosene.
Bilei ya malamu na ntalo ya malamu.
Mosala ezalaki kosalema malɛmbɛmalɛmbɛ, kasi bato bazalaki na boboto.
Service eza nsɔmɔ--mbala ya nsuka oyo nazalaki wana (mpe nasali elimboli mbala ya nsuka) bayebisaki biso ete baza na mposa ya mesa na biso yango wana tosengeli kolongwa wana.
Quality ya bilei eza malamu mingi mpe ntalo na yango eza ntalo moke, ekangamaka na ngulu, mbisi, soso, mwana mpate mpe ndunda.
Nakokaki kutu komilela ata moke te soki bilei ata elɛngi na yango ezalaki kitoko kasi lolenge ya bilei ezalaki crappy, mpe.
$160 po na 2 filets, 2 sides, appetizer na masanga.
Bapesaka menu ya ndenge moko kasi baza na masanga ya bozalisi oyo etondi na masanga mpe bankombo ya matama -- kasi bafutaka yo mbongo.
Liste ya vinyo ya makasi, bato ya mosala oyo bayebi makambo mingi, bankolo ya boboto mpe menu ya koluka sika, oyo ebongwanaka ntango nyonso esalaka ete tózonga.
Pizza eza kitoko pe proprietor eza moko ya biloko ya kitoko koleka na NYC.
Ata nazalaki kosepela mingi na bilei mpe ambience, nandimi mpenza te soki ebongi mpenza na yango grade Michelin oyo balakisaki mingi na lininisa.
Ndako ya kolya eza kitoko na kimia kozanga miziki ya koganga makasi -- ndenge nini epesaka!
Nazalaki na bilikya minene mpenza mpo na esika oyo mpe nasalaki reservation liboso ya libaku moko ya ntina mingi.
Bilei mosusu ya kosepelisa mpo na mbongwana eza nsoso na supu ya curry mpe na caserole ya salmon.
Bilei ezali malamu mingi.
Bilei yango ebongi kotyelama motema mpe ntalo na yango ezali mwa moke.
Pizza ezali malamu.
Soki olingaka vinyo na fromage mpe talo ya kitoko ya France, okolinga Artisanal!
Bilei ya awa esalaka mosala monene na nkombo ya canton (elingi koloba...).
Pizza nde eleki malamu soki olingaka pizza ya crusted ya pete.

Na boumeli ya bambula moyambi ya bapaya, Vittorio, na bato na ye, basalelaka ngai makambo ntango nyonso lokola libota---atako na mombongo nyonso oyo eza te eloko ya motuya oyo eza moke esalaka, ekamwisaka kutu azali na makoki ya komikundola mopaya oyo azangaka kobongwana kasi ezalaka mingi te.
Liste ya vinyo esepelisaka mpe eza na bizaleli mingi ya malamu.
Mpe nasengelaki koyokana na ebele ya bato na oyo etali mosala - kobota eza litindi ya Achille na bango.
Nazalaki mpenza te na mokakatano na bato ya kosala malembe na bambula 10 oyo nazalaki kokende.
Big Wong azwaka ba Ups ya minene mpona esika ya kitoko.
Restaurant oyo elukaka kosala eloko moko te longola kaka kopesa bilei ya minene na mosala monene na esika ya esengo.
Masanga yango ezalaki malamu mpenza, mpe dessert ezalaki malamu.
Lendisá yango mingi lokola motuya monene mpo na sushi ya malamu mpe mosala malamu.
Ntalo eza pene ya $9 mpona entré mpona kolya mpe ata moke mpona kolya na midi.
Mwayene ya bilei ya malamu ya Thaïlande, kasi kobota ya nsɔmɔ.

Ok, yango wana ba-server ezoyengayenga mwa kozanga koyeba, kasi eza na ba-server mingi koleka oyo ekoki mpona ebele ya bato oyo bazwaka -- eza malamu, osengeli kaka kosala milende moke mpona kobenda likebi na bango.
Nazalaki koya awa ntango nazalaki mwana moke mpe kozonga ntango nyonso mpo na elɛngi na yango.
Tosɛkaki ntango nsukansuka apesaki biso menu ya dessert mpe totikaki nsɔngɛ ya 10%, oyo ezalaki ya bokabi, nazali koyoka.

Likambo ya ntina mingi na butu wana ezalaki mayonaisse mpona ngambo na ngai ya fries oyo nazwaki epai ya moko ya bato oyo bazalaki kopota mbangu bilei, oyo eza malamu te soki totaleli ete mobeko wana ezalaki pene ya badolare 100.
Na solo (mpo na kozwa bato mingi oyo bakoki kolya) bazalaki kaka kozwa bisika ya kobomba telefone mpe koyeba bamesa ya bato oyo bazalaki kozela na lobby.
Ayebisaki biso tófanda esika nyonso, mpe ntango tofandaki alobaki ete mesa ebatelamaki.

Nha Trang, atako ayebana mingi mpo na kozanga libɔndisi mpe kobongisa makambo, bato ya mosala ya kozela malembe na ndenge ya nsɔmɔ mpe bilei ya noki ya nsɔmɔ, eza moko ya barestora ya malamu ya Vietnam oyo nakendá naino te. pho ezalaka elɛngi mpe ezalaka na bavegtable ya sika mpenza.
Serve na biso ya boboto epesaki makanisi ya malamu ya bilei mpe lisusu atindaki sommelier mpe fromager na mesa mpo na kosalisa na kopesa likanisi ya kosangisa vinyo mpe fromage ekeseni.
ɛ, basalelaka biloko ya kitoko, kasi ata biloko ya kitoko esalaka te pizza ya malamu longola kaka soki moto ayebi malamu ndenge ya kozwa cruste.

Nazali kolendisa ba plaques na bango Pad See Ew, Pork Chops to Tofu.
Banzete mosusu oyo ezali na banzete ezali mpenza approx.

Mpe nyonso eyaka na ntalo ya malamu mpenza (congee, makaron, mpe basaani ya loso eleki te $3-6 mokomoko).
Ba calzones na bango eza nsɔmɔ, ya mabe, ya kosanza, ya kosanza, YUCK.
Biloko yango ezalaka na elɛngi ya sika, crust ezalaka moke mpe ezalaka na crispier, eteni yango ezalaka na mafuta mingi te, mpe ekozika ata moke te ndenge ezalaka na bantango mosusu na Joe's.
$160 po na 2 filets, 2 sides, appetizer na masanga.
Mpe supu ya Tom Kha ezalaki komitya na esika na bango.
Ntalo mpe motindo ya mbisi yango moko ekopekisa biso kozongela yango.
Basali bazali mpenza kofunda.
Ntango nyonso oyo oza na mposa ya kobongisa Sushi, Mizu akozala wana na mbisi ya malamu mpe mosala monene.
Kopona mingi ya bruschettas, paninis, tramezzinis ebatelaka palate na kotelema.

Lokola eza na barestora mingi ya malamu na UWS, naza na mposa ya bilei ya ntalo mingi te, bato ya lofundo oyo basalaka na restora-bato ya kozela oyo bayebi te ete basalaka na mosala moko ya lokumu, ya mayele mabe, mpe bakonzi oyo bakipaka yango te.

Nasengeli kokebisa motángi ete bonene ya biteni eza moke mpenza (mingimingi ba appetizer), yango wana soki oza na likanisi ya kolya kino ekotonda mpe oza te na likanisi ya kosenga menu ya sipesiale ya sipesiale ya chef, komibongisa mpo na kosomba mpe kofuta appetizer (1 elubu mpo na moto mokomoko mpo biteni na yango eza te mpo na kokabola),  Entrée ya monene, mpe udon ya malili na nsuka ya bilei.
Service ezalaki na molunge mpe kotya likebi, carpaachio ya ngombe ezalaki exellent (eteni monene) mpe pasta ezalaki ya sika mpe ebongisamaki malamu.
Café yango moko ezalaki kitoko mpenza na bakiti ya malamu ya libanda mpe bamesa, kasi mosala ekokaki kozala malamu koleka.
Curry ya mussaman oyo nasɛngaki ezalaki moke lokola mai mpe longola tofu oyo ezikaki malamu te oyo nasengaki na kati, na boboto nyonso bapesaki ngai eteni MOKO ya potato oyo elambami malamu te.
Bazali koyoka nsolo lokola bazali kosangisa yango na ndunda ya kala ya manzanza lokola calzone ya mayebo ya épinard.
Mosali na biso ya restora mpe bato nyonso oyo bazalaki kosalisa ye bazalaki kotya likebi mpe ya solosolo.
Bato bazalaka ntango nyonso na boboto.
Fianse na ngai amemaki ngai na Scopa poso eleki mpona mokolo ya kobotama na ngai pe nazalaki kondima bilei te.
Bilei ezalaki kitoko mpenza, kasi ezalaki na mwa elɛngi te mpe biteni na yango ezalaki moke mpenza, ata mpe dessert.
Ya solo mopepe oyo ezangi, kasi atako bongo ozali kozela nini na esika ya bagel ya ngonga 24?
Tozalaki kolanda bilei ya chef Lyle zingazinga ya New York banda mbula 15 mpe atako etikali kaka classique, makambo na ye ya sika na bisitro fare esalaki ete tózongela mpe tozonga.
Banda kala, nazalaki kosepela mingi na lingomba ya Saint Basil na East Village, mpe atako nandimi ete bilei na bango esili mwa moke na qualité, nazalaki kokakatana mpo na kozala sembo te.

Nazali kolendisa mbisi ya libumu, nsoso ya molangwa mpe biloko oyo ezali na supu na yango, ya solo grube ya bule ya stir fry.
Tozalaki kolya na esika oyo ya Thaïlande nsima ya botaleli kasi tozalaki kosepela te na bilei wana.
Bilei oyo tolingaka mingi eza pizza ya pesto, salade ya ndako, mpe molangi ya malamu ya vinyo.

Mesa mokomoko ezali na nzungu ya mai ya mɔtɔ oyo bazindaka na likoló na yango, mpe ozwaka ba platters ya misuni ya mikemike oyo bakati na biteni, ndunda ndenge na ndenge, mpe makaroni ya loso mpe talatala.

Pizza - pizza kaka moko na NYC oyo esengeli te kozala na toppings mosusu - crust ezalaka elɛngi lokola mampa ya malamu koleka, oyo bauti kotumba sika!

Na ntango tofandaki kolya bilei ya subpar mokambi akobaki kogangela bato mibale ya mosala na ye mpo babimisaki bakontenere ya mabe mpo na kosala bakode mpe alimbwelaki bango ndenge bakontenere yango ezalaki ntalo mingi.

Longola kozala na mesa oyo balakaki biso na bato mosusu oyo bazalaki kobatela restora mbala mibale liboso ya kofanda mpenza, bapesaki biso bilei oyo batindaki biso mbala misato te, tozwaki moko ya mitindo na biso miniti 20 nsima ya kopesa mesa mosusu (mpe molongo wana ezalaki moke), mpe basengaki badolare 45 koleka oyo tosengelaki kozala na yango na mbongo na biso.

Kulungile, ngakho-ke amaseva azulazula kancane ngaphandle kwe-clueless, kodwa kukhona amaseva angaphezu kwanele wesixuku abasitholayo -- kulungile, kufanele nje wenze umzamo omncane ukuze uthole ukunakwa kwabo.
Bengilokhu ngiza lapha ngisemncane futhi ngihlale ngibuya ukunambitheka.

Okugqamile ebusuku kwakuyi-mayonaisse ohlangothini lwami lwama-fries engiwathole komunye wabagijimi bokudla, okungekuhle uma ucabanga ukuthi ibhilidi lalicishe li-$ 100.
Eqinisweni (ukukhulisa abadla abangaba khona) babesathatha ukubhuka kwefoni nokwabiwa kabusha kwamatafula alabo abalinde e-lobby.

I-Nha Trang, ngenkathi idume ngokuntuleka ngokuphelele kwenduduzo nokuhlobisa, abasebenzi bokulinda kancane okwesabekayo nokudla okusheshayo okwesabekayo, ingenye yezindawo zokudlela ezinhle kakhulu ze-vietnamese engake ngaya kuzo. i-pho imnandi futhi iza nama-vegtables amasha kakhulu.

Ngakwesokudla sami, i-hostess yema phezu kwe-busboy futhi i-hissed rapido, i-rapido njengoba ezama ukusula futhi aphinde abeke itafula lesithupha.

Inkonzo yayifudumele futhi iqaphela, i-carpaachio yenkomo yayiyi-exellent (ingxenye enkulu) futhi i-pasta yayisha futhi ilungiselelwe kahle.
Izithako ezintsha nakho konke kwenziwa uku-oda.

Njengoba sasihlezi sidla ukudla kwe-subpar umphathi waqhubeka nokuhlambalaza umbhangqwana wabasebenzi bakhe ngokukhipha izitsha ezingalungile zama-condiments futhi wabachazela ukuthi lezi ziqukathi zibiza kangakanani.
Insizakalo ilungile futhi bakuvumela ukuba ujabulele umbono.

Ngenkathi uhla lwe- $ 20 entrée lungabizi ngokweqile, eNew York City, nakanjani kukhona ukudla okungcono kulelo banga, futhi ngakho-ke i-Sapphire, naphezu komkhathi othandekayo, cishe ngeke ibe yindawo yokudlela engizobuyela kuyo.
Leon kuyinto East Village gem: abayitoho kodwa hip, nge kahle okulungiselelwe eziyisisekelo French bistro yokugibela, okukhethekile ezinhle, umoya efudumele futhi ephilayo.
uhlu olukhulu lwewayini (i-italian), ukudla okuhle, inkonzo EKUQALENI kwakulungile.

Ukudla kwakuhle futhi umbono we-skiline entsha yedolobha lase-york wawusabekayo ngisho nangosuku lwemvula olunenkungu njengaleyo lapho ngihamba.
Le ndawo inengaphakathi elihle kakhulu engilibonile noma kuphi enyakatho yeW'burg, futhi izohlaba umxhwele noma ngubani oletha lapho.
Ukuze ikhwalithi yokudla, kancane ezibizayo kakhulu.
Inhlanganisela fresh utamatisi sauce, fresh mozz ushizi, basil kanye inhlama benza ngofulawa amazwe, kwenza lokhu ingenye pizza kangcono e NY.

Ngaphandle kokuba netafula esasithenjiswe lona kwabanye abaxhasi bezindawo zokudlela kabili ngaphambi kokuba empeleni sihlezi, sanikezwa izitsha esingazange si-oda kathathu, sathola enye yama-oda ethu imizuzu engu-20 ngemuva kokuthi lonke itafula lase likhonziwe (futhi lowo myalelo wawungaphekiwe), futhi wakhokhisa u- $ 45 ngaphezu kwalokho okwakufanele sibe khona ku-bill yethu.
Ububi kuphela - ngeke bathose i-bagel yakho, futhi awenzi amaqanda e-bagel.
Kukhonzwa iwayini nobhiya kuphela, kodwa ama-varities endlu empeleni amahle kakhulu.
Ingxenye engcono kakhulu yokuhlangenwe nakho kwakuwukwazi ukuthi umphathi (owesifazane osemusha oqhakazile, onobungane ngokumomotheka okukhulu) wayekhathalela ngempela ukuthi senza kanjani.
Ngenkathi imenyu ingeyona ikakhulukazi i-groundbreaking, konke engikuzamile kuze kube manje kuye kwabulawa kahle futhi kunambitheka.
Ngeke yini batusa isidlo sakusihlwa!
Kungcono nakakhulu, bayazi ukuthi bangapheka kanjani ama-classics aseFrance afana ne-Steak au Poivre ne-Onglet ngaphandle kokuyishisa kuze kube sekufeni noma ukuyipheka ngokweqile.
I-Pad thai, i-lad nar nezinye izitsha ezihlukahlukene zonke zibukeka kahle ephepheni kodwa, ngibe nokudla okungcono kwe-thai ezindaweni ezingajabulisi kakhulu.
Ngathandana nama-noodle amaqanda kumhluzi wenkomo nge-shrimp dumplings kanye nezingcezu zengulube eyosiwe ye-BBQ.

ngezinye izikhathi i uthole ukudla okubi futhi inkonzo embi, ngezinye izikhathi i uthole inkonzo enhle enhle nemibi.
Indawo iphelele.
Ekugcineni usale nomhluzi omnene ngama-noodle ongawa-slurp ngaphandle kwendebe.
Into ecasulayo kakhulu, noma kunjalo, yiqiniso lokuthi amaseva abonakala eqeqeshelwa ukushayela imali engenayo.
Kuhle isidlo sakusihlwa esingajwayelekile nge-jeans namateki.
Ama-bagels ahlala efudumele, ethambile ngaphakathi, esihlwabusayo ngaphandle futhi enkulu kakhulu ngobukhulu.

Sikhethekile kakhulu mayelana ne-sushi futhi sobabili sasijabulisa ngakho konke ukukhetha okubandakanya: i-ceviche mix (ekhethekile), ama-crab dumplings, i-sashimi ye-assorted, i-sushi ne-rolls, izinhlobo ezimbili ze-sake, kanye ne-banana tempura.
Uma ubani enokungabaza ukungazi ngokwanele ngamawayini,sicela uhlole uhlu lwabo lwewayini.
Uma ungumuntu obonga ukulula, ubuhle, futhi ethulwa ngokumangalisayo futhi enambitha ukudla kwasolwandle nemifino kungakhathaliseki usayizi wengxenye, i-Kai yindawo yakho.
Inkonzo yayishesha.
Isamba esifiphele simnandi ngenkathi amanani alula kakhulu esikhwameni.
Umnumzane, mhlawumbe umphathi, weza etafuleni lethu, futhi ngaphandle kokumamatheka noma ukubingelela wacela i-oda lethu.
I-brushetta emhlophe yebhontshisi ukuqala yayimangalisa futhi i-pasta yayimangalisa.
Owesibili uhamba nge-vault enzima njengomnyango, nabantu abalindele ukufika kwakho uthola umqondo wokuthi uzoba nokugibela indawo yokudlela yokuphila.
I-shrimp scampi yayihle kakhulu futhi i-antipasti yayiningi.
Ngisho noma ngenza ukubhuka ngo-3pm ngobusuku obufanayo nge-Dinnerbroker, sasihleli etafuleni ngenye yombono omuhle kakhulu!
Ngibe lapha izikhathi ezimbalwa isidlo sakusihlwa, kanye brunch futhi kabili kwasemini.
Thina imenyu eshintsha kabusha, e xcept for eyodwa noma ezimbili ezikhethekile, ikhwalithi nokunakekelwa abafaka ukudla kwabo ngokubonakalayo.
I babe phezu 100 uzinyosi ezahlukene ukunikela isivakashi sabo ukuze lokho kwenza umyeni wami ujabule kakhulu futhi ukudla kwaba okumnandi, uma kumele batusa isidlo kumele kube pumkin tortelini.

Ngaleso sikhathi, i-bartender yaqhubeka nokuthela i-champagne kusuka ku-reserve yakhe ngemuva kokuthi siqede ibhodlela lethu futhi sajabulela ukuhlekisa kwesobho le-turnip nge-basil ehlanzekile, i-gratis.
Kwadingeka ngabelane ngetafula lami neqembu elikhulu lezingane futhi inkonzo yayinolaka i-unattentive.
BUt isidlo sabo esihle kakhulu yi-thh Thai spiced curry noodles nge-shrimp - isidlo esingabiza u- $ 23.95 yizindawo eziningi, kodwa yi- $ 16 lapha.
Ngemva kwakho konke lokho, bakhononda kimi ngethiphu encane.
Abasebenzi banake kakhulu, i-ambience ethandekayo, nokudla okuhle kakhulu.
Ukudla kuyinto esabekayo - nakanjani zama bass striped.
U-DJ wesifazane wangaphakathi ngoMgqibelo ebusuku unokunambitheka okuhle ngokunyanyekayo emculweni, futhi ngaphezu kwalokho, uthatha izicelo.
Ikhofi yabo inhle kakhulu futhi!
Sasiphinde sabelane ngesaladi yendlu eyayisha.
le ndawo encane ine-cute decor yangaphakathi kanye namanani edolobheni angabizi.
Kuyinto kinda nosiy futhi amatafula eduze ndawonye kodwa namanje indawo enhle ukujabulela dinner nice.
Uhlu lwewayini alukhulu kodwa def lukhethwe kahle.
kalbi futhi nebbiolo ukwenza umsebenzi ndawonye.
Ayikwazi ukuba yi-ambience, ngoba indawo ixinekile kakhulu futhi ezinye izivakashi kufanele zihlale emgwaqweni.
Ngempela esihlwabusayo entwasahlobo imiqulu kanye noodles ngentengo enhle Nokho.
Ngibe ne-pizza zombili izikhathi kanye ne-caprese salad appetizer.
Isevisi ilungile kodwa ingaba ngcono.
Ukuze indawo, amanani anengqondo kakhulu.
Uma ufuna indawo yokuhlala phansi, ube nesiphuzo nezingxoxo nabangani, iya ku-sweet-n-tart bese uzi-oda ubisi lwesitayela se-hong-kong netiye ngamaparele e-tapioca (ashisayo).
Abasebenzi abanobungane empeleni abakuvumela ukuthi ujabulele ukudla kwakho nenkampani onalo.
Badinga ukukhahlela ngaphandle kwayo kodwa kuze kube yileso sikhathi i-sushi inhle kakhulu futhi indawo iyahambisana.
Kubonakala sengathi ibhizinisi lokuqala lomnikazi futhi libonisa.
I-atmoshere enkulu futhi ifanele yonke intwana.
Uhlu lwewayini alukhulu, futhi ama-dessert athunyelwa kusuka eBruno's phansi emgwaqweni, okungekuhle njengoba kwakukade kunjalo.
Ukulunga kwami, yonke into kusukela ezinhlanzi kuya elayisi kuya ezitshalweni zasolwandle kwakumangalisa ngokuphelele.
Namatira nehuku, nyama yemombe, uye zvokudya zvegwayana.
Basa racho rinoshamisa uye yangu crab-cake mazai benedict yaisagona kunge iri nani.
Edza maorivhi kirimu cheese kana lox kupararira pamusoro gorosi rose zvose bagel.
Kunyange zvazvo izvi zvisingagoni kunzi resitorendi, zvichida ndiyo yakanakisisa yekuita muManhatten: $ 4 yendiro yakaunganidzwa nemupunga uye 2-3 entrees.
$ 20 yezvose zvaunogona kudya sushi haigoni kurohwa.
Namatira nehuku, nyama yemombe, uye zvokudya zvegwayana.

Zvakanaka, nokuti hey, zvokudya zvakawanda, asi zvakaipa nokuti dim sum inofanirwa kunge iri zvikamu zviduku kuitira kuti iwe ugogona kuedza zvimwe zvidya uye zviduku kuitira kuti chikafu chimwe nechimwe chive chisingadhuri.
Ichi ndicho chiitiko chakaipisisa chekudya chandakamboita.
Friendly uye dzidziso vashandi, kunyatsoteerera chaizvo uye nokukurumidza mbishi bhaa basa.
Tinoparadzanisa samosa yemuriwo inonaka uye Malii Tikka wrap.
Zvinoita sokuti vakatora huku yakasara, vakadurura mafuta uye vakasasa pepper powder pamusoro payo (muto wacho wakanga uri translucent uye mutsvuku).

Traditional French decour yakanga ichifadza kunyange zvazvo horo yakanga yakanyanya ruzha - resitorendi yakanga yakazara uye taifanira kusimudza manzwi edu kuti tikwanise kuchengetedza kukurukurirana.
Matafura akazara nzira yakanyanya pedyo, menyu yacho inowanzoitika kune chero resitorendi yeItaly, uye waini yewaini inongova overpriced.
Takavaona vachidziyisa chinhu chimwe chete chakaomeswa nechando kunyange zvazvo ndisina chokwadi kuti ndechipi dim sum dish yaive.
The menyu yaisanganisira mureza brassiere zvokudya, nani ipapo nzvimbo dzakaita Balthazar etc.
The huku hari Pie iri excpetiona, ari cheeseburger hombe uye delictable, uye basa nyanzvi wan inodziya.
Chakaipisisa pane zvose, $60 yakawedzerwa nenzira isina kururama kubhiri redu re $80.
Ndakanga ndine zvokudya zvinotyisa, uye server yedu yakatitungamirira kune waini yakanaka kwazvo mumutengo wedu, pane kutibvumira kutenga waini ine mutengo wakafanana iyo yakanga isiri yakanaka.
Basa racho rakanga rakaisvonaka uye zvokudya zvakanga zvinonaka.
Hove dzangu dzainaka mune incredible curry sauce.
Mitengo yakakwirira kudya mukati uye huku yavo tikka marsala yakanaka zvikuru.
The zvinwiwa nguva dzose welll akaita uye waini kusarudzwa zvakarurama mutengo.
A kubata zvakawanda jalapeno kupisa nokuda kusiyana uye zvingadai zvakanaka chaizvo zvechokwadi.
Small servings for main entrée, i had salmon (haana kuororwa) musikana aiva nehuku, zvakanga zvakanaka.
Zvose desserts boka akaedza akawana zvakanaka wongororo.
Ndakawana zvokudya, basa uye kukosha zvakasiyana nguva dzose ndave ikoko.
Havana kutongotiunzira noodles yokurumbidza, vakafuratira zvikumbiro zvinodzokororwa zveshuga, uye vakakandira ndiro dzedu patafura.
Iyo corned nyama yemombe uye pastrami yakaisvonaka, isina mafuta kupfuura iyo nzvimbo huru dzevashanyi dzakapoteredza Times Square.

Barbecued codfish yakanga yakanyorova zvakaisvonaka - sokunge yakavhimwa - bva iyo yakaisvonaka yakagadzirwa yakaregedzwa nenzira inoshamisa bland seasoning - zvinonhuwira zvinonhuwira zvingave zvakanyanyisa, zvisinei kusanganiswa kwemishonga kana mumwe muto ungadai wakaita zvakawanda kuwedzera.
Chikafu chikuru uye mitengo inonzwisisika zvikuru.
Zvakatipoteredza ndezverudo, asi zvokudya zvinotyisa, basa racho rinosuruvarisa, uye gabriella anonyepa pamusoro pezvose zvaaigona.
Zvokudya zvinonaka uye zvakagadzirwa zvakanaka pamwe chete nebasa reushamwari uye personable.
Inonaka crab makeke zvakare.
Takanga tichitsvaka zvokudya uye takagumburwa pane iyi block yemaresitorendi eIndia paEast Sixth Street.
Dumplings yakaisvonaka yakashandiswa pakati peyakachena, chic decor.
Chikafu chakanga chiri pasi peavhareji, basa racho rakanga rinosuruvarisa, pakanga pasina ambience zvachose.
Kana iwe ukaenda kune pre-theatre menu, inyaya yakatokura.

Kwemakore anogamuchira, Vittorio, uye vashandi vake, vagara vachindibata semhuri--kunyange zvazvo nebhizimisi rose iri kwete-saka-diki gem inoita, zvinoshamisa kuti iye anokwanisa kunyange kuyeuka mushanyi anoenderana asi kwete-kazhinji kazhinji.
Chikafu chikuru, saizi yakanaka menyu, basa guru uye nzvimbo isina kuzvikudza.
Pizza pano inogara yakanaka.
Nzvimbo uye ambience ndeye Ok asi chikafu ndicho chinoita kuti chivepo.
Zvokudya zvacho zvaiva zvechokwadi.
The cuisine kubva pane zvandakaunganidza ndeyechokwadi Taiwanese, kunyange zvazvo yayo yakasiyana chaizvo nezvandajaira muTaipei.
Pizza - iyo chete pizza muNYC iyo isingafaniri kuva nemamwe toppings - iyo crust inonaka sechingwa chakanakisisa, chichangobva kubikwa!
Butter yakanyungudutswa, waini chena inodziya, chizi oozing kwose kwose.
The aesthetics nzvimbo ino akafanana Airport lounge.

Ndinofanira kunyevera muverengi kuti zvikamu zvakakura zviduku zvikuru (kunyanya appetizers), saka kana iwe uchironga kudya kusvikira wazara uye usina chinangwa chekuraira chef's special tasting menu, gadzirira kuraira uye kubhadhara appetizer (1 dish yemunhu mumwe nomumwe nekuti zvikamu hazvisi zvekugoverana),  chinhu chikuru entree, uye udon inotonhora pakupera kwekudya.
Dai ndaigona kuyera vanhu nzvimbo iyi yaizova kure machati - zvinosuruvarisa - iyo pizza, urombo - kwete yakanakisisa muNYC.
After 2 tries by the waiter to take it away (we had not even looked at it yet, we had full beers yet to drink), maneja akasvika ndokutiudza kuti vaida tafura yevanhu vane reservations.
Muridzi zvechokwadi anogutsa zvose zvaunoda.

Ita kuchengetedza asi tarisira kunonoka 15-20 maminitsi sezvo vashandi vekugamuchira vakanga vachinetseka kugara vaenzi vakasvika nekuchengetedza nekuti zvichida vaive nehuwandu hwekufamba ins kuva pedyo kwazvo neTime Square.
Ndanga ndiri 4 times uye ndagara ndiine chikafu chakakura.
Mushure mekudya kwemanheru, tora zuva rako kune HUGE dance floor, zvichida imwe yehukuru hwauchaona muNY.
Ivo vanowanzo kuve vakazara pakupera kwevhiki asi ivo vanobudirira uye vakarurama nebasa ravo.
Server yacho yaitonhorera chaizvo uye yakatipa zvokudya zvedu nezvinwiwa tichinyemwerera.
Boka rakanaka, yakanaka kunze kwekugara, ine hip japanese vibe.
Ndaida everythig pamusoro payo-kunyanya kuratidza uye vatambi.
Ndinokurudzirawo zvokudya zvemupunga kana mhando dzakasiyana dzecongee (rice porridge).
Kubva kune mumwe munhu anotaura Chirungu.
Hapana akabvunza kuti chii chakanga chisina kumira zvakanaka sezvo takabva tisina chakabatwa pamapuranga edu.
Dzimwe nguva ndinowana zvokudya zvakaipa uye basa rakaipa, dzimwe nguva ndinowana basa rakanaka uye rakaipa.
Edza Pad Se-Ew kana Chicken neCashew Nuts kune chiitiko chisingakanganwiki uye chinodzokororwa.

Kubva kune inorumbidzwa chef app yeiyo yakanyanyisa butternut squash ravioli mune inonaka truffle sauce kune inoshamisa buttery uye nyoro langostine entrée kune dessert yandisingagoni kuyeuka nekuda kweiyo yakaisvonaka Cakebread Cabernet yatakanga tichinwa - manheru ose aishamisa.
aspects: Delicate butternut squash ravioli mune inonaka truffle sauce

sentences: Hapana gimmicks pano -- chikafu chinotaura pachayo mukutsva kwayo nekugadzirira.
Basa racho rakanga rakaisvonaka, zvokudya zvakanga zvakaisvonaka, asi chiitiko chose chakanga chichitonhorera zvikuru.
Isu takanyatsotarisirwa nevashandi vanoshingaira kunyanya maneja Tony Gaskin uyo akaita mazano akaisvonaka ekusarudza kwedu menyu.
Iwe unorayira kubva kune menyu, saka iwe unosiya uchinzwa sokuti wakapotsa ruzivo rwakazara.
Zvakanaka kupararira, zvikuru chinwiwa sarudzo uye bagels chaizvoizvo inonaka.
Mativi akanga akanaka uye zvinoshamisa munyu.
Handisati ndadya gwayana chop inonaka sezvo,saladi dzakanaka chaizvo dzakapfeka lemon uye extra virgnin olive oil.
Takatanga ne lox uye mussels (yakanakisisa ive yati yambova nayo, nguva dzose) uye takanga tine cod uye trout yekudya kwemanheru.
Basa raigona kuvandudzwa asi zvachose iyi inzvimbo inonzwisisa kukosha kwezvinhu zviduku (iyo inorema, yakasviba, yekare-inoratidzika teapot, kune imwe) mune resitorendi ruzivo.
Excellent mhepo, zvinonaka ndiro zvakanaka uye ushamwari basa.
Chikafu chakanga chiri avhareji uye creme brulee yakanga yakaipa - shuga yakatsva, kwete caramelized uye yainhuwa parafini.
Girazi reLeaping Lizard, girazi re prosecco, uye mussels raive nezvose zvinofadza.
Mitengo haigoni kurohwa nokuda kwehutano, huwandu, hutsva uye kuravira.
Takanga desserts zvikuru (kusanganisira yakanakisisa cannoli ndakambova) uye ipapo vakapa pashure kudya kunwa, paimba.
Muridzi uye vashandi vose Japanese uyewo uye kuti anowedzera yose ambiance.
The pizza iri overpriced uye soggy.
Zvisinei, tichitarisa patafura iri pedyo neyedu, isu tose takanga tichishuva kuti dai tairayira pizza, iyo yakatarisa PERRRRRRRRRFECT.
Murume akanga kugamuchira akavimbisa kuchengetedza tafura yedu bato 7, ipapo akagara bato 2 patafura chaiyo akanga kuchengetedza (kureva apo paiva zvose pachena kumativi ose).
Ndinoronga kuuya pano zvakare uye ndinotarisira kuedza assortment yavo ye bruschetta, panini's.....
Picks yangu: Guizhou huku, hove pamwe inopisa bhinzi manyuko, hove fillet mune zvinonhuwira manyuko (chinokosha menyu).
Waitress yedu yakanga inotapira uye inogamuchira, kwete kuzvidzora.
Ndingakurudzira zvikuru Nina's kune chero ani zvake anoda kudya kwerudo mumwoyo unodziya wakapoteredza wakazadzwa nemakenduru nemifananidzo yemhuri.
A resitorendi kuti haana kuedza kuita chinhu kunze kushumira zvokudya zvikuru nebasa guru munzvimbo inofadza.
Basa rine ushamwari, uye harina kumbobvira rine dambudziko rekufamba mukati uye kuwana tafura.
Mumwewo munhu akarumbidza dessert - isu takasiyawo izvozvo.
Inzvimbo yakanaka yekuzorora uye kukurukura.
Edza maorivhi kirimu cheese kana lox kupararira pamusoro gorosi rose zvose bagel.
Handisi kuzodzokera shure kunze kwekunge mumwe munhu ari kubhadhara bhiri.
The waitress anondiyeuka uye ane ushamwari chaizvo, anoziva chii yangu nguva dzose uye ndizvo fried mini buns pamwe condensed mukaka uye assorted michero pamusoro beancurd.
aspects: Fried mini buns ine mukaka wakagadzirwa uye michero yakasiyana-siyana pane beancurd

sentences: Ive akakumbira cart attendant for a lotus leaf wrapped rice and she replied back rice and just walked away.
Uye pakupera kweizvi zvinotyisa zvekudya cheki yakapiwa patafura yedu nekugogodza girazi remvura.
Ndichitarisa kumativi, ndakaona kamuri rakazara nevagari veNew York vachifarikanya zvokudya chaizvoizvo muresitorendi chaiyoiyo, kwete clubhouse yefabulous kuedza kuonekwa.
The zvinwiwa nguva dzose welll akaita uye waini kusarudzwa zvakarurama mutengo.
Asi basa racho rakanga richinonoka.
Aiva 1 appetizer, 2 entrees uye 2 cokes uye bhiri raiva ~ $ 55.00, kusanganisira tip.
The waini mazita yakakura uye inoorora.
Nepo mitengo isiri chinhu chaicho, zvikamu zvakakura.
Kunyange zvazvo hove dzayo dzakanaka dzegungwa, mitengo yacho yakanyanyisa.
Zvikasadaro, nzvimbo iyi ine basa guru uye mitengo uye yakanaka ushamwari mamiriro.
Rao's ine basa rakanakisisa uye mhepo muNYC.
Sauro akanaka kwazvo, asi zvechokwadi kwete zvikuru.
Best Taiwanese zvokudya muNY!
Ndakanga ndisati ndambova Edamame pureed kare asi ndakafunga kuti yaiva itsva uye inonaka (could've akashandisa zvishoma zvikuru munyu).

Ndinofanira kunyevera muverengi kuti zvikamu zvakakura zviduku zvikuru (kunyanya appetizers), saka kana iwe uchironga kudya kusvikira wazara uye usina chinangwa chekuraira chef's special tasting menu, gadzirira kuraira uye kubhadhara appetizer (1 dish yemunhu mumwe nomumwe nekuti zvikamu hazvisi zvekugoverana),  chinhu chikuru entree, uye udon inotonhora pakupera kwekudya.
Nepo iyi iri nzvimbo yakanaka munzira iyoyo yakanyanyisa yakanaka yechiFrench, chikafu chacho chakanga chichityisa nenzira yokutuka.
Iyo tsvuku curry isina simba uye isina kunaka, iyo pad thai yakanamatira pamwe chete uye lumpy, mupunga unowanzo overcooked, uye zvokudya zvegungwa zvakanaka sketchy.
Zvino dai vaigona chete kuwana toaster.
The vibe chaizvo akasununguka uye cozy, basa raiva guru uye zvokudya zvakanga zvakaisvonaka!
Kusarudzwa kukuru kwe bruschettas, paninis, tramezzinis kunochengetedza mukanwa kubva pakumira.
Ambiance- yakasununguka uye stylish.

The sushi yave kubva avhareji kuti pasi avhareji, kumirira basa nguva dzose yave Sub-par mhepo anoenda kubva zvakanaka kuti chaizvoizvo zvinogumbura (kana iwe kugara munharaunda mhiri kicheni, ari acousitcs zvinotyisa, zvose echoes zvikuru ruzha).
Havana kana kundirega ndichipedza girazi rangu rewaini ndisati ndapa imwe.

Sezvo takanga takagara tichidya zvokudya zvesubpar maneja akapfuurira kutuka vashandi vake vaviri nokuda kwokubudisa midziyo isiri iyo nokuda kwezvinonhuwira ndokuvatsanangurira kuti midziyo iyi yaidhura sei.
Kudya mukati, mhepo inochengetedza, asi patafura yako, chiitiko chinoshungurudza zvikuru.
Mitengo yacho yakanga iri CHEAPER zvichienzaniswa nehutano hwebasa uye chikafu.
Takanga tine scallops se appetizer uye ivo vainaka uye muto wacho waishamisa.
Best ndiro iri nori-akaputirwa tuna.
$ 6 uye pane zvokudya zvakawanda zvinonaka, zvose zvitsva uye zvinoramba zvichizadzwazve.
The dim sum is ok but doesn't taste that fresh, and the little dishes don't look steamy hot as they should (uyewo cherechedza kushaya Chinese pano).
Uyewo, usaronga pamusoro pekukumbira mupumburu wako waunofarira, kana usiri pane menyu, haugoni kuva nayo.
Murume akanga kugamuchira akavimbisa kuchengetedza tafura yedu bato 7, ipapo akagara bato 2 patafura chaiyo akanga kuchengetedza (kureva apo paiva zvose pachena kumativi ose).
The Waitstaff vakanga vakanaka chaizvo uye akakarakadza swordfish murume wangu iye kunakidzwa kudya kwake.
Akaita kuti chiitiko changu chekudya chisagadzikana.

Kune rumwe rutivi, kana iwe usina kunyengerwa nyore nyore, iwe uchawana mazana emaresitorendi achakupa basa uye ambiance iyo iri pamwe chete neAlain Ducasse, uye chikafu chichapenya mu presentaion, kuravira, sarudzo, unhu uye huwandu.
The zvokudya zvegungwa zvinoshamisa, pane zvakanaka waini mazita, uye nguva dzose-kuchinja menyu nguva dzose inopa zvimwe zvikuru zvinoshamisa.
Toons ichangobva kuitwazve, saka ikozvino nzvimbo inokwezva zvikuru.
Madziro epuke akasvibirira anosiya zvakawanda zvinodiwa, asi zvokudya zvakanaka kwazvo.
Chimwe chinhu chandakafarira pamusoro penzvimbo ino ndechekuti handina kumbobvira ndanzwa ndakamhanyira kana kumanikidzwa kurega tafura yangu ot kuuya vaenzi.
Iyo inonhuwira tuna uye salmon ndiyo yakanakisisa yatakamboita.
Taive ne reservations na9pm, asi hatina kugara kusvika 10:15pm.
Chinhu chimwe chete chinoshamisa chaiva chekuti kana tikawana bhodhoro, waitress ingadai yakangowedzera mutengo wegirazi X4, izvo zvisina musoro zvachose.
Ndakanga ndine Filet Mignon ne garlic mash.
Fluke sashimi drizzled ne jalapeno-lime mafuta emuorivhi, muchero wemafuta zvakanaka kusimbisa kutapira kwehove.

Ini ndinozengurira kunyora nekuti handingadi kuti jem yangu yepizza nzvimbo ive yakazara.

Zvimwe zvakasara zvemenyu zvakaganhurirwa nezvose zvakanaka zvinodya.
Zvokudya zvinonaka - kubva kune zvakakosha kusvika kune yenguva dzose menu-fare, ndiro hadzimboodzwi mwoyo.
Takagumisa kudya kwemanheru nechiedza chinoshamisa uye flaky apple tarte tatin.
Chikafu chacho chinogadzira asi chichiri kuchengeta chinyakare cheindia flavoring.
Ivo vanotova nechikamu mumenyu inonzi American Chinese chikafu!
Spice is sleek, yemazuva ano uye inotonhorera ine menyu isingazokuvadzi chikwama chako.
Saladi yavo yewhitefish yakaisvonaka--yese whitefish ine mayo shoma.
Plain uye nyore zviri zvakaipa thai zvokudya.

Kana murume wangu uye kuenda ikoko, tinopedza $ 60.00 (vane LOBSTER MISWE UMMMMM ndinoda ndinotaura zvakawanda) Handigoni kutaura zvimwe, iyo nzvimbo yausingambofi wakakanganwa Kana iwe usingamboendi, iwe uchapotsa A Meal yenguva yako yehupenyu

Mumwe angafunga kuti taizowana ruregerero kana zvinwiwa zvinorumbidzwa - panzvimbo pezvo, takawana snobby waiter yaisazotora kunyange kuraira kwedu kwemaminitsi 15 uye yakatipa miromo patakamukumbira kuti aite saizvozvo.
Ndingakurudzira zvikuru nzvimbo ino kune chero ani zvake anotsvaga mamiriro ezvinhu asina kujairika anokuendesa kure kumahombekombe ekuruboshwe erwizi Seine.
Takagoverana bhodhoro resake, order of edamames, and she had the sushi plate while I had the sashimi.
Izvo hazviratidziki kuti zvinoisa simbiso pane zvakakosha kana zvinhu zvitsva izvo kwandiri zvakakosha kune thai yakanaka.

zvinyorwa zvangu ndeizvi: - Scallion Pancake (yakagochwa nemuto wemiriwo, inokosha chaizvo uye inonaka) - Guizhou Chicken - Shredded Squid Family Style (imwe yezvinhu zvandinofarira) - Sichuan Spicy Soft Shell Crab - Shuizhu Fish (iyi ndeye hardcore Sichuan chikafu mafeni, ini handingakurudziri kune shamwari dzangu dzeAmerica sezvo zvakanyanya kunhuhwirira.
Kana iwe uri kutsvaga yakakwana yechinyakare sushi, enda pano - kana iwe uri kutsvaga kusanganiswa kunonakidza, edza sushi yeGari's (East Side).
I was really disappointed ant wanted to tell everyone to not go eat or even take out food from there.
Rombo rakanaka kuwana tafura.
Zvose, kubva chingwa nyoro, soggy saladi, uye 50 miniti kumirira nguva, pamwe zvinoshamisa zvisina kufanira basa kuendesa pasi avhareji zvokudya.
Ndinogara munharaunda uye shamwari dzangu dzinosangana neni pasi pano kwete chete nokuda kwebhawa chiitiko asiwo chipikirwa cheThe Pizza Place na3am.
Chikafu chakanga chiri pasi peavhareji, basa racho rakanga rinosuruvarisa, pakanga pasina ambience zvachose.
Chikafu chakanaka - zvimwe zvinhu zvakanaka - zvimwe hazvisi (kufanana nesteak dish iyo inowanzova yakaoma).
Chinyunyuto changu chikuru chaiva chikafu chisina kunaka kunyange zvazvo chakapiwa zvakanaka.
Izvi zvitsva zveFrench Indian fusion zvinoita basa guru rekugadzira zvidya zvinonakidza sezvinobvira apo zvichiri kuwanikwa.
Chandisina kufarira ndechekuti chikafu chakauya sei mushure mekunge charayirwa.
Izvo zvakanakisisa bagels zvandave nazvo.
The Thai chando tii akanga zvinoshamisa akatsetseka uye yummy!
Asi iyo yakanga isiri icing pane keke: tiramisu iyo yakafanana nechinhu chandakamboita.
Ini nemudzimai wangu tinowanzorayira primi imwe chete uye secondi imwe chete uye kuvaparadzanisa, sezvo vanowanzopa zvikamu zvikuru.

Kubva kune inorumbidzwa chef app yeiyo yakanyanyisa butternut squash ravioli mune inonaka truffle sauce kune inoshamisa buttery uye nyoro langostine entrée kune dessert yandisingagoni kuyeuka nekuda kweiyo yakaisvonaka Cakebread Cabernet yatakanga tichinwa - manheru ose aishamisa.

Apo dessert yangu yakauya, pakanga pane kanduru mairi - kwete nekuti chero munhu akakumbira imwe - asi nekuti weti inofanira kunge yakandiona ndichivhura kadhi rangu rekuzvarwa uye chipo, uye akati aiziva kuti yaiva nhambo chaiyo yeimwe mhando.
Nicky the Nose pabhawa inobata.
Nepo vashandi pa bistro duku iyi vane ushamwari zvikuru, handina kumbobvira ndawana kusagona kwakawanda.
Takasvika kudya kwemanheru tichitarisira kuororwa nenzvimbo ine nguva yakapfuura inoorora - asi, ndizvo chete - iyo PAST!
Zvichida busier zvikuru zvokudya zvemasikati, zviri kashoma vakawanda kudya kwemanheru (zvikuru pedyo downtown).
Jimmy's is hands down the hottest night spot in the Bronx.
Zvose zvakaisvonaka, menyu yakakura zvikuru, uye iwe unodya nemaonero kumativi ose eguta.
Iwe pachako nyasha uye uve nezvokudya zvemanheru pano uone kana usingabvumirani neni.
Asi patakatarisa menyu, pakanga pasina sarudzo dzakawanda, dzakawanda dzacho dzakanga dziri dumplings muchikamu cheappetizer.
Mugamuchiri wangu akakumbira appetizers yeboka uye weti akatipa kwete chete zvatakarayira, asi zvimwe zvimwe zvinhu zvisina kurairwa.
Awsome Pizza kunyanya iyo Margheritta slice.
Iyo pizza inonaka - ivo vanoshandisa mozzarella itsva panzvimbo yeiyo yakachipa, yakaomeswa, shredded cheese yakajairika kune yakawanda pizzaria's.
Kubatanidzwa kweiyo itsva tomato sauce, itsva mozz cheese, basil uye donje ravanoita nehupfu hunobva kune dzimwe nyika, inoita kuti iyi ndiyo imwe ye pizza iri nani muNY.
Imbwa dzinopisa dzakanga dzichitonhora pakati uye mabhanzi akanga akaoma.
Ndakanga ndichidanana naPongsri musi wa48, asi zvichienzaniswa naSuan inononoka mubasa uye yakawandisa.
Iwe unogona kuwana zvokudya zvakaisvonaka pane zvakawanda zvezvokudya zvakawanda zveIndia paLexington Avenue iri pedyo nemutengo weimwe yezvokudya zvakaisvonaka pano.
Iwe hauendi kuMizu kune basa rakaisvonaka, iwe unoenda kune huwandu hwakawanda hwezvokudya, mamiriro ezvinhu ane ushamwari, uye buri-mu-madziro kunzwa kwenzvimbo.
Great waini mazita (Italian), zvokudya zvakanaka, basa raiva PAKUTANGA zvakanaka.
Kupfuurirazve, mupunga wacho wakanga usina zvokudya, naizvozvo sushi yakanga isina kujeka uye inonyangadza.
Mumwe murume, zvichida maneja, akauya patafura yedu, uye pasina kunyemwerera kana kuti kukwazisa kwakakumbira kuraira kwedu.
Chimwe chandaifarira kunyange zvakadaro chaiva Angry Lobster, saladi inotonhora ye lobster iyo yakanga yakaisvonaka.
Zvose muzvokudya zvose zvakanga zviri pamusoro peavhareji uye ndaidzoka kuti ndione kuti vanoshanda sei nezvokudya zvina kana zvishoma.
Kufanana nemamwe maresitorendi eIndia, vanoshandisa kudya kwemanheru chaiko kukwezva vatengi pasuo.
Waini chete uye doro zvinoshumirwa, asi imba varities chaizvoizvo zvakanaka zvikuru.
Yakanga isiri pamusoro pezvakajairika uye shanduro yemombe yakanga ine yakachipa (undercooked) nyama yemombe.
Takarayira tuna inonyungudika - yakauya ne out cheese iyo yakangoita kuti ive tuna sandwich.
Iyo decor yakasviba, inotonhorera uye inonyaradza, nepo mharidzo yezvokudya inoshamisa, tichifunga nezvemitengo yakaderera.
Varaidzo yakanga yakakura, vane zvinoratidza zvinoenderera mberi kuburikidza nekudya kwemanheru.
Kudya kwakachipa kweNYC, asi kwete dosa.
Ini nemurume wangu tave tiri ikoko kanoverengeka uye nguva imwe neimwe takagara pa sushi bar (chef Yoshi) ndokuraira zvose ala carte.
Chikafu chakanga chiri avhareji uye creme brulee yakanga yakaipa - shuga yakatsva, kwete caramelized uye yainhuwa parafini.
Chikafu chikuru pamitengo inonzwisisika.
Basa rainonoka, asi vanhu vaiva noushamwari.
Basa racho rinotyisa--nguva yekupedzisira yandaiva ikoko (uye ini ndinoreva nguva yekupedzisira) takaudzwa kuti vaida tafura yedu saka taizofanira kubva.
Unhu hwezvokudya hwakanaka kwazvo uye mutengo wakachipa, namatira kune nyama yenguruve, hove, huku, gwayana nemiriwo.
Ini ndingadai ndisina kunyange kunyunyuta zvachose kana chikafu kanenge chakaravira zvakanaka asi unhu hwezvokudya hwakanga huri crappy, zvakare.

Vanopa menyu imwecheteyo asi vane zvinwiwa zvekusika izvo zvakazadzwa nedoro uye mazita echeeky -- asi zvinokudhurira.
Solid waini mazita, ruzivo vashandi, varidzi ushamwari uye adventurous, nguva dzose-kuchinja menyu tirambe tichidzoka.
Iyo pizza inonaka uye muridzi ndeimwe yezvakanakisisa muNYC.
Nepo ini zvikuru kufarira zvokudya uye ambience, Handisi chaizvo chokwadi kana ivo chaizvoizvo vanofanirwa nayo Michelin Rating ivo vakaratidza saka prooudly muhwindo.
Imba yekudyira yakanyarara yakanaka pasina mimhanzi yekudanidzira pamusoro -- inozorodza sei!
Ndakanga ndine kariro dzakakwirira zvikuru dzenzvimbo iyi uye ndakaita kuchengetedza mwedzi mishomanana pachine nguva mberi nokuda kwechiitiko chaicho.
Zvinonakidza zvimwe zvokudya zvekuchinja zvinosanganisira huku mu curry sauce uye salmon caserole.
Chikafu chikuru.
Chikafu chacho chakavimbika uye mutengo wacho une mwero.
Pizza yakanaka zvisinei.
Kana iwe uchida waini uye chizi uye inonaka French fare, iwe uchada Artisanal!
Chikafu pano chinoita basa guru kune zita (Cantonese iyo ...).
The pizza ndiyo yakanakisisa kana uchida mutete crusted pizza.

Kwemakore anogamuchira, Vittorio, uye vashandi vake, vagara vachindibata semhuri--kunyange zvazvo nebhizimisi rose iri kwete-saka-diki gem inoita, zvinoshamisa kuti iye anokwanisa kunyange kuyeuka mushanyi anoenderana asi kwete-kazhinji kazhinji.
Iyo waini yewaini inonakidza uye ine tsika dzakawanda dzakanaka.
Uye ndingadai ndichifanira kubvumirana nevanhu vakawanda maererano nebasa - kuendesa chitsitsinho chavo cheAchilles.
Handisati ndave nedambudziko nevashandi vanononoka mumakore 10 andave ndichienda.
Big Wong inowana makuru Ups ekugadzwa kwakanaka.
A resitorendi kuti haana kuedza kuita chinhu kunze kushumira zvokudya zvikuru nebasa guru munzvimbo inofadza.
Zvinwiwa zvakanga zvakaisvonaka, uye dessert yakanga yakanaka.
Zvikuru vanokurudzira ichi sezvo kukosha kukuru kwazvo sushi uye basa.
Mitengo yacho inenge $ 9 ye entree yekudya kwemanheru uye kunyange zvishoma zvemasikati.
Avhareji kune zvokudya zvakanaka zveThai, asi kuendesa kunotyisa.
Ok, saka maseva anodzungaira zvishoma clueless, asi pane zvinopfuura zvakakwana servers kuti boka vanowana - zvakanaka, iwe chete vanofanira kuita duku kuedza kuwana pfungwa dzavo.
Ndave kuuya kuno ndichiri mwana uye ndinogara ndichidzoka nekuda kwekuravira.
Takaseka apo akazopedzisira atipa dessert menu uye isu takasiya 10 percent tip, iyo yaive norupo, ndinonzwa.
Chinhu chikuru cheusiku chakanga chiri mayonaisse kune divi rangu refries randakagamuchira kubva kune mumwe wevamhanyi vezvokudya, izvo zvisina kunaka tichifunga kuti bhiri raive rinenge $ 100.
Chaizvoizvo (kuti vawedzere vanogona kudya) vakanga vachiri kutora foni yekuchengetedza uye kugoverazve matafura eavo vakamirira mu lobby.
Akatiudza kuti tigare chero kupi, uye patakagara akati tafura yakachengetedzwa.

Nha Trang, nepo kuva nomukurumbira nokuda zvachose kushaya nyaradzo uye decor, zvinotyisa kunonoka kumirira vashandi uye zvinotyisa nokukurumidza zvokudya, ndeimwe yakanakisisa Vietnamese mumaresitorendi ndakamboenda. Iyo pho inonaka uye inouya nemavegtables matsva kwazvo.
Server yedu ushamwari akaita zvikuru zvokudya mazano uye akatumirawo zvose sommelier uye fromager patafura kubatsira zvinoratidza pairings dzakasiyana waini uye chizi.
Hongu, vanoshandisa zvinhu zvemhando yepamusoro, asi kunyange zvinhu zvakaisvonaka hazviiti kuti pizza yakanaka kunze kwekunge mumwe munhu achiziva nzira yekuwana crust zvakanaka.
Taj Mahal inopa kukosha kwakakura uye chikafu chikuru.
Ndinokurudzira yavo Pad Ona Ew, Pork Chops kana Tofu ndiro.
Chimwe chinowedzera ndechokuti vakawanda entrees vari approx.
Baluchi's ine zvokudya zvakasimba uye yakanaka decor pamitengo inonzwisisika.
Uye zvose zvinouya nemutengo unonzwisisika zvikuru (congee, noodles, uye mupunga ndiro hazvipfuuri $ 3-6 imwe neimwe).
Calzones dzavo dzinotyisa, dzakaipa, kurutsa-inducing, YUCK.
Zvinhu zvinogadzirwa zvinonaka zvitsva, crust yakaonda uye crispier, iyo slice haina mafuta, uye haina kumbobvira yatsva sezvinoita dzimwe nguva paJoe's.
$ 160 ye 2 filets, 2 mativi, appetizer uye zvinwiwa.
Uye muto waTom Kha wakanga uchisuruvarisa.
Mutengo uye unhu hwehove chete zvichatidzivisa kuita shanyo yekudzoka.
Vashandi vanogamuchira zvikuru.
Pose paunoda Sushi kugadzirisa, Mizu achava ikoko pamwe unhu hove uye basa guru.
Kusarudzwa kukuru kwe bruschettas, paninis, tramezzinis kunochengetedza mukanwa kubva pakumira.

Nemaresitorendi akawanda akanaka paUWS, handidi zvokudya zvakanyanyisa, zvisina musoro kuzvikudza kumirira-vashandi vasingazivi kuti vanoshanda pane imwe nzvimbo inokudzwa yekudyira, basa risina kunaka, uye manejimendi asina basa.

Ndinofanira kunyevera muverengi kuti zvikamu zvakakura zviduku zvikuru (kunyanya appetizers), saka kana iwe uchironga kudya kusvikira wazara uye usina chinangwa chekuraira chef's special tasting menu, gadzirira kuraira uye kubhadhara appetizer (1 dish yemunhu mumwe nomumwe nekuti zvikamu hazvisi zvekugoverana),  chinhu chikuru entree, uye udon inotonhora pakupera kwekudya.
Basa rakanga richidziya uye richiteerera, nyama yemombe carpaachio yakanga iri exellent (chikamu chikuru) uye pasta yakanga yakatsva uye yakanyatsogadzirira.
The cafe pachayo chaizvoizvo akanaka pamwe vakasununguka panze zvigaro uye matafura, asi basa aigona kunge nani.
Mussaman curry yandakaraira yakanga yakatetepa semvura uye kunze kweiyo tofu isina kunyatsogochwa yandakaraira mairi, ivo nenyasha vakandipa ONE chidimbu chembatatisi isina kunyatsobikwa.
Vanonhuwira sokuti vanozviisa nemiriwo yekare yakagadzirwa sespinach mushroom calzone.
Weti yedu nevanhu vose vaimubatsira vaiteerera uye vechokwadi.
Vanhu vanogara vaine ushamwari.
My fiance akandiendesa kuScopa last week for my birthday and I couldn't believe the food.
Zvokudya zvakanga zvakanaka chaizvo, asi zvishoma flavorless uye zvikamu zviduku chaizvo, kusanganisira dessert.
Zvechokwadi mamiriro ezvinhu aya ari kushaikwa, asi chii chaunotarisira kubva kune 24 awa bagel nzvimbo zvisinei?
Tave tichitevera chikafu chemubiki Lyle kumativi eNew York kwemakore 15 uye nepo tichiramba tiri classic, zvitsva zvake ne bistro fare zvakaita kuti tidzoke uye tidzoke.
Ndave ndichifarira Holy Basil kwenguva refu muEast Village, uye nepo ndichidavira kuti zvokudya zvavo zvakaderera zvishoma muhutano, ndave ndichizengurira kusavimbika.
Inochengetedza kufamba ichipinda uye ichimirira tafura mubhawa rinowanzova neruzha, rakazara vanhu panguva yekudya kwemanheru.
The makhani was OK --the korma was bland.
Zvokudya zvakanga zvikuru uye basa akanga kunyange nani.
Kunze kwezvo, kana iwe uine basa rakaipa, iyo mari shoma yaunofanira tip.
Server yedu ushamwari akaita zvikuru zvokudya mazano uye akatumirawo zvose sommelier uye fromager patafura kubatsira zvinoratidza pairings dzakasiyana waini uye chizi.
Zvose zviri zviviri zvine musoro chaizvo mutengo (pakati pe $ 8 yekudya kwemanheru uye $ 5 yemasikati), uye inonaka uye inozadza.
Mupunga kune hove ration wakanga wakanakawo-- havana kuedza kuwedzera mupunga.
Ndinodzokera mumutsetse sekatatu paavhareji kusvikira ndisingachakwanisi kufamba.
Ndinokurudzira jelly hove, huku yakadhakwa uye soupy dumplings, zvechokwadi iyo stir fry blue crab.
Takadya panzvimbo iyi yeThai zvichitevera kuongororwa asi tisingafari zvikuru nezvokudya.
Zvokudya zvatinofarira ndeye pesto pizza, saladi yeimba, uye bhodhoro rakanaka rewaini.
Takanga desserts zvikuru (kusanganisira yakanakisisa cannoli ndakambova) uye ipapo vakapa pashure kudya kunwa, paimba.
Saka kana iwe uchida kudya kwakanaka, kunonakidza kuMontparnasse, enda mangwanani kune pre-theater prix-fixe.
Chikafu chakanga chakanaka, hapana chikuru.
Kutanga kubva, waitress akanga zvachose unattentive ari 2 nguva takamuona(chienzi muresitorendi pamwe 6 matafura) uye akawana kuti yedu zvakaipa.
Sauce yakanga ine mvura uye chikafu chacho chakanga chisina kunaka kwakawanda.
Hapana mapfekero ekupfeka, hapana mafungiro, kushamwaridzana kwakawanda kwekunyaradza, nzvimbo huru yekuzorora muMidtown inogara yakabatikana.
Tafura imwe neimwe ine hari yemvura inovira yakanyura pamusoro payo, uye iwe unowana ndiro dzenyama dzakatetepa dzakatsemurwa, miriwo yakasiyana-siyana, uye mupunga uye magirazi noodles.
Zvechokwadi mamiriro ezvinhu aya ari kushaikwa, asi chii chaunotarisira kubva kune 24 awa bagel nzvimbo zvisinei?
Pashure pokunge tawana sashimi order yedu, handina kugona kudavira kuti zvikamu zvacho zvakanga zviri zviduku sei!
Mushure mekunyunyuta pamusoro pedhishi rehuku, maneja akauya kuzotiudza kuti, hapana munhu akanga ambonyunyuta, uye kuti isu takanga tisingazivi kuti ndiro yaifanira kunaka sei.
Ndave pano boka nguva ikozvino uye basa nguva dzose kunoshamisa.
Mutengo wose wakanga uchidhura zvikuru, chimwe chinhu chandaitarisira.
Vashandi vanopa basa risina kukanganisa.
Mumwe wevanhu vepakutanga vachitsinhira pamusoro peresitorendi haana kuwana iyo iyo imwe yekuedza iri kuenderera mberi nemenyu nenzira yakanaka.
Ndinofanira kutaura kuti handina kumbobvira ndadya zvokudya zvinotsausa pano.
Pizza - iyo chete pizza muNYC iyo isingafaniri kuva nemamwe toppings - iyo crust inonaka sechingwa chakanakisisa, chichangobva kubikwa!
Kurudyi rwangu, hostess akamira pamusoro pe busboy uye hissed rapido, rapido sezvaakaedza kubvisa uye kuisazve tafura yematanhatu.
The basa, waini kusarudzwa, ambiance zvose zvinoshamisa uye vanofanirwa kuzivikanwa.
Kusarudzwa kwakanaka kwewaini kubva kune inokwanisika kusvika kumugumo wakakwirira.
Kana chikafu chako chaunofarira cheChinese chiri General Tao huku, saka iyi haisi nzvimbo yako.
Uye mitengo yavo yakakwirira kwazvo - ivo chaizvoizvo vanofunga kuti vanogona kubva nekubhadharisa mitengo yakadaro yezvokudya zvinotyisa zvakadaro uye basa!
Iyi ndiyo yakakwana zuva nzvimbo yeWilliamsburg vakaroorana.
Kwakanga kune zvakawanda zvikuru zve 6 Blue Point oysters uye doro kana girazi rewaini ye $ 8!
