Vakanga kamwe kamwe neni apo ndakafonera uye chaizvoizvo vakati chikafu chakanonoka nokuti vakanga vasipo mupunga.
Kufarira kwangu poto inopisa nezvokudya zvegungwa kwakanga kwakazara nenyama yecrabmeat yokutevedzera ine zvidimbu zviviri zve shrimp uye squid, uye yakapiswa zvisina kufanira nomupisi.
Takakumbira kutamisirwa (izvo zvakatora hafu yeawa), uye ipapo takanga takagara munzvimbo yakakwirira yemotokari kumashure, kunyange zvazvo dzimwe nzvimbo dzakasara dzakanga dzisina chinhu.
Ndakakumbira seltzer ne lime, hapana ice.
Zvokudya, zvakashandiswa muzvikamu zviduku zvekuravira (sechisarudzo) zvakanaka kwazvo nedhiza rimwe nerimwe riri nani pane rinotevera.
Basa rakanga richidziya uye richiteerera, nyama yemombe carpaachio yakanga iri exellent (chikamu chikuru) uye pasta yakanga yakatsva uye yakanyatsogadzirira.
Zvinhu zvitsva uye zvose zvakagadzirwa kuti zvirayire.

Sezvo takanga takagara tichidya zvokudya zvesubpar maneja akapfuurira kutuka vashandi vake vaviri nokuda kwokubudisa midziyo isiri iyo nokuda kwezvinonhuwira ndokuvatsanangurira kuti midziyo iyi yaidhura sei.
Basa racho rakanaka uye zvinokubvumira kuti unakirwe nemaonero.

Nepo iyo $ 20 entrée range haisi yakanyanya kudhura, muNew York City, pane zvechokwadi chikafu chiri nani mune iyo huwandu, uye saka Sapphire, pasinei nekuti yakanaka mhepo, ingangove isiri resitorendi yandichadzokera.
Leon chinhu chinokosha cheEast Village: zvakajairika asi hudyu, zvakanyatsogadzirirwa zvinokosha French bistro fare, zvakanaka zvakakosha, inodziya uye ine upenyu.
Great waini mazita (Italian), zvokudya zvakanaka, basa raiva PAKUTANGA zvakanaka.
Ehe, dzimwe nguva basa rinogona kunonoka.
Vanhu vakanaka vakadaro vanoshanda pano - asi ndinofanira kuongorora chikafu.
Zvokudya zvakanga zvakanaka uye maonero eNew York city skiline akanga achityisa kunyange pazuva rine mhute mvura yakafanana neyeapo ndakaenda.
Nzvimbo iyi ine yakanakisisa yemukati yandakaona chero kupi zvako kuchamhembe kweW'burg, uye ichaorora chero ani zvake waunounza ikoko.
Nokuda kwehutano hwezvokudya, zvishoma zvakanyanya kudhura.
Kubatanidzwa kweiyo itsva tomato sauce, itsva mozz cheese, basil uye donje ravanoita nehupfu hunobva kune dzimwe nyika, inoita kuti iyi ndiyo imwe ye pizza iri nani muNY.

Kunze kwekuva netafura yatakanga tavimbiswa yakapiwa kune vamwe vatsigiri vemaresitorendi kaviri tisati tagara chaizvoizvo, takagoverwa zvidya zvatakanga tisina kuraira katatu, takagamuchira imwe yemirairo yedu maminitsi 20 mushure mekunge tafura yakasara yashumirwa (uye iyo murayiro yakanga isina kubikwa), uye yakabhadhara $ 45 kupfuura zvataifanira kunge tiri pabhiri redu.
Chete drawback - havazoiti toast bagel yako, uye havaiti mazai nokuda bagel.
Waini chete uye doro zvinoshumirwa, asi imba varities chaizvoizvo zvakanaka zvikuru.
Chikamu chakanakisisa chechiitiko chacho chaiva chekuziva kuti maneja (mukadzi wechidiki ane bubbly, ane ushamwari ane kunyemwerera kukuru) zvechokwadi aiva nehanya nemaitiro ataiita.
Kunyange zvazvo menyu isiri kunyanya groundbreaking, zvese zvandakaedza kusvika zvino zvave zvakanyatsoitwa uye zvinonaka.
Rega ndikurudzire kudya kwemanheru!
Kunyange zviri nani, vanoziva kubika French classics akafanana Steak au Poivre uye Onglet pasina kupisa kusvikira rufu kana overcooking nayo.
The Pad thai, mukomana nar uye zvakasiyana-siyana zvimwe ndiro zvose kutarisa zvakanaka papepa asi, Ndave nani thai zvokudya zvishoma asthetically kufadza nzvimbo.
Ndakadanana nemazai noodles mumuto wenyama yemombe ne shrimp dumplings uye zvidimbu zveBBQ roast nyama yenguruve.
aspects: zai noodles mune nyama yemombe muto ne shrimp dumplings uye zvidimbu zveBBQ yakagochwa nyama yenguruve

sentences: Yakanaka, yakasviba mhepo uye mimhanzi yakanaka kubata.
The ambience akanaka uye akanaka kukurukurirana, saka zvakajairika masikati pano zvimwe zvingava zvakanakisisa.
Volare mhandara kana vhiki nevhiki regulars, munhu wose anowana kubatwa zvakafanana uye haugoni kukumbira kupfuura kuti apo basa iri ushamwari.
Nepo resitorendi itsva ichiri inoratidza zvakawanda zvakafanana Classic fenicha kuti akaita Tiffin saka anokwezva, menyu yave overhauled.
Just don't take the seat between the bar and the back half of the restaurant, i saw a woman get nudged 40times akagara ipapo.
The zvokudya zvakanga zvinoshamisa, basa akanga saka kunyatsoteerera uye personable, uye sei kuti ambience!
Basa racho rakanaka uye resturant yakachena.
Pizza yakanga yakakura.
Ini kupedza zvachose bagel ruzivo nokuita kuti zvishoma toasted.
Its yakanaka yakanyarara nzvimbo kuenda kudya zvokudya zvakanaka, zororo, kukwanisa kutaura uye vane nguva yakanaka chaizvo.
Iyo menyu yakanga ichishamisa nekusarudzwa kubva kune burger, kusvika kune steak, kusvika kune escargot.
Mukadzi wacho uye waitress vakanga vane utsinye hunoshamisa uye vakaita zvose zvavaigona kuti vatimhanyise kubuda.
Zvaiita kunge chizi yakatsemurwa chikamu chakaitwa - ichiri mumitsetse.
Kungoti zvakachipa hazvirevi kuti zvikamu zviduku kana kuti zvokudya zvinonyangadza, ZVAKANAKA!
Mutengo wacho wakanga une mufungo zvikuru nokuda kwezvokudya nezvokudya zvataidya.
Basa rakanga rakakurumidza, ushamwari uye guru.
The menyu yaisanganisira mureza brassiere zvokudya, nani ipapo nzvimbo dzakaita Balthazar etc.
Unofanira kuedza shrimp appetizers.
Zvidzidzo zvitatu - sarudzo dzinosanganisira mussels yakaisvonaka, puff pastry mbudzi cheese uye saladi ine kupfeka kunonaka, uye hanger steak au poivre iyo iri kunze kwenyika ino.
Nzvimbo iyi yakakodzera kuenda kunyange kana chete doro ravo.
Basa rakaisvonaka, zvokudya zvakaisvonaka, uye mhepo inotonhorera uye zvakatipoteredza.
Winnie nevashandi vake ndivo vashandi vakanakisisa vaunogona kuwana vachikushumira.
The menyu iri Prix Fixe, saka iva akagadzirira kushandisa kanenge $ 60 pamunhu, asi zviri Zvakanaka zvakakodzera itsuperb zvokudya.
The filet mignon ndiro yakanga yakaisvonaka!
Ini nemurume wangu takaraira Steak, medium.
Pizza yakanga zvishoma soggy.
Basa rakanga rakaisvonaka, uye AC yakashanda zvakanaka kwazvo zvakare (kutenda Mwari, kwaipisa!).
Takanga tiri boka re8 uye takanyatsoseved.
Tuna tartar appetizer yavo ndeyokufa.
Takanga takagara nokukurumidza sezvo takanga tisina chokwadi, zvisinei pashure paizvozvo basa racho rakanonoka.
Iyo cream cheeses iri kunze kwenyika ino uye ndinoda iyo kofi !!
$ 20 inokuwana iwe usingagumi sushi yemhando yepamusoro chaizvo- Ndakatotora shamwari pano kubva kuJapan uyo akati yaiva imwe yenzvimbo dzakanakisisa dze sushi muUS iyo yaakaenda.
Inzvimbo yakakwana yekuve nezvokudya zveIndia zvinosunungura.
Ndakaenda kune zvinonhuwira katatu- kaviri panguva yekudya kwemasikati uye kamwe chete pakudya kwemanheru.
Great roofdeck, yakanaka boka 30 somethings, asi hapana mumhanzi, mhando runyararo.
The zvokudya zvakanaka chaizvo nokuti zviri mutengo, nani kupfuura vakawanda fried dumplings ndave pamwe.
The scallion pancakes uye fried dumplings vakanga chinhu chisiri chenguva dzose.
Iyo Prix Fixe menu inokosha peni yega yega uye iwe unowana zvinopfuura zvakakwana (zvose muhuwandu uye unhu).
Rudzi rwenzvimbo duku asi ndinofungidzira kana vasina kunyanya kubatikana vangakwanisa kukodzera boka kana vana.
$ 160 ye 2 filets, 2 mativi, appetizer uye zvinwiwa.
Vose NYU vadzidzi vanoda nzvimbo iyi saka zvinoita kuti mafaro vechidiki mhepo.
Basa racho rakanga richinyatsoteerera pasina kunyanya kudzora uye chikafu chimwe nechimwe chatakaedza chaishamisa kubva kune zvinyorwa zvechirimo kusvika kune cod ne pineapple tempura.
Waini inogara yakanaka, iyo tapas inogara iri yummy, kunyanya nechingwa chinodziya chepita.
Kufanana nekuti chingwa chake chinobva kune imwe bhekari chaiyo apo takamuona achitenga dowtown manhathan.

(Chikafu chakaendeswa nemukomana webhazi, kwete weti) Hatina kuwana chizi inopiwa nokuda pasta, mvura yedu uye waini magirazi akaramba EMPTY yedu yose zvokudya, apo tingadai nyore kushandisa imwe $ 20 pamusoro waini.
Kana iwe uchida zvokudya zvinonhuwira tora huku vindaloo.
Ndakanga kunonoka kudya paLucky Stike, zita guru kuti mubatanidzwa kana ndamboona mumwe.
Takaenda mushure mekunwa kamwe chete.
IYO ndiyo yakanakisisa yekuita muguta reMuvhuro usiku kudya kwemanheru pane imwe resitorendi yakanaka.
Vabiki vaviri venyeredzi vakaenda nguva yakati yapfuura kuti vazarure nzvimbo yavo pachavo.
Menyu yacho yakaganhurirwa asi inenge yese yezvidya zvakaisvonaka.
Uyewo zvakanaka kune misangano yemasikati evatengi, esp.
Iwe unofanirwa kuwedzera basa zvakanyanya.
Downstairs lounge nguva dzose inokwezva zvakanaka
Zvokudya zvacho zvitsva, zvinonaka, uye zvine mutengo unonzwisisika.
Zvinwiwa nyasha dzekuponesa, asi vashandi vebasa, ndapota, vanozvipedza.
Very yakakurumbira manyorerwo Izakaya (Sake uye chikamu chiduku sake-ushamwari ndiro ).
Kunyange zvazvo resitorendi yakanga yakazara, takanga takagara nokukurumidza uye kunyange kukumbira tafura yepamusoro pasina zvinetso.
Vanotengesa sushi chaiyo, zvose zvine topping, sauce uye nezvimwewo.
Ndakaraira Chicken Teriyaki dish ndokuwana kuti huku yakanga yakaoma zvikuru.
Kusarudzwa kwewaini (negirazi uye bhodhoro) kunoshamisa uye ndinogara ndichikurudzira kuti shamwari dziite kuchengetedza kana dzichizova muguta.
Isu kazhinji chete kuwana zvimwe zvokudya zvakakosha uye ivo chaizvo zvine musoro mutengo uye zvinonaka chaizvo.
Zvokudya zvinogadzirwa nokukurumidza uye zvakanaka.
Tichangobva kubhadhara, waiter akatora mari ndokuti, okay, imi vakomana muri kunze kuno.
Nokuda kwekudya kwemanheru ndaiva nehuku tikka-masala uye imwe garlic naan.
The calamari anouya incredible muto, uye duku noodles vari yummy uyewo.
Basa harisi chaizvoizvo nyeredzi shanu, asi kuti haisi chaizvoizvo chinhu chikuru.
Tora muto uye nosh (pastrami sandwich) ye $ 8 uye iwe uri goridhe.
Iyo fillings inogona kunge isina kujairika asi dosa batter zvechokwadi ndeyechokwadi uye kusanganiswa kunonaka kwazvo.
Cornelia Street inoratidzika seBroadway yakagadzirirwa West Side Story uye mukati mePo inotonhorera kwazvo quaint iwe chaizvoizvo haugoni kumusoro kwekugadzirisa kudya kwerudo muNYC.
Havana kutongotiunzira noodles yokurumbidza, vakafuratira zvikumbiro zvinodzokororwa zveshuga, uye vakakandira ndiro dzedu patafura.
Chero kana iwe uine kuchengetedza iwe uchamirira max 5 maminitsi - saka iva nekunwa pabhawa.
Zvinonyadzisa kuti nzvimbo yakanaka, yakakodzera sePink Pony inogona kuparadzwa kwazvo nebasa re lousy.
Zvose zvinogara zvakabikwa kusvika pakukwana, basa racho rakaisvonaka, iyo decoration inotonhorera uye yakaderera.
Uye, atlhough matafura akavhurwa pedyo nesu uye isu ASKED nzvimbo yakakura zvishoma, vakatisiya awkardly akagara.
Mitengo haigoni kurohwa nokuda kwehutano, huwandu, hutsva uye kuravira.
Nokuda kwechimwe chikonzero, hove dzose dzegungwa dziri pamenyu dzakanga dzisina kuwanikwa kunze kweSalmon.
Iwe unowana zvaunobhadhara uye neiyo pfungwa mupfungwa, Spice inzvimbo yakanaka yekutora zvimwe zvakachipa zvinodya uye zvinwiwa munzvimbo yakanaka.
Zvikamu zvakakura uye maseva anogara achitishamisa nekutanga kwakasiyana.
Iyo inotungamirirwa nemubiki mumwe chete weSichuan uyo akatanga cheni muChinatown.
Nzvimbo pachayo yakanaka, nzvimbo yebhawa inoita seiri kuitika.
Iwe unogona zvechokwadi kuwana maresitorendi anopa ruzivo rwakakwirira rwakanaka rwekudya, asi nokuda kwezvokudya zvakaisvonaka pamitengo inonzwisisika, La Villa haigoni kurohwa.
Mhuri yedu haina kutongokarira varaidzo inoshamisa yakadaro muresitorendi.
Takanga tine tiem huru yekutarisa zvinoratidza uye mavara uye ar chikafu chakanga chiri chaizvo zvatakanga tichitsvaga.
Takanga tichikurumidza kuraira ndiro yeappetizer sezvo takanga tine nzara zvikuru.
Usatarisira kugara pasi mukati kunyange zvakadaro, kune matafura mashomanana chete uye vanogara vakazara.
Ndakadya kuAlain Ducasse's restaurant muMonte Carlo kwehafu yemutengo weiyo yakanakisisa yekudya ruzivo.

kwete zvokudya, kwete ambiance , kwete basa, Ndinobvumirana yapfuura wongororo iwe kumirira uye kumirira, kumirira vashandi vari zvikuru zvisina kufanira uye kana iwe kupinda vari kutarisa kuti iwe zvakanaka kunze .
Kamwe kudya kwemanheru uye kamwe chete brunch.
Basa rakanga riri devine, oysters apo munhu wenyama sezvavanouya, uye mutengo haugoni kurohwa!!
Kana iwe uri mumwe munhu anoonga nyore, runako, uye zvinoshamisa zvakaiswa uye kuravira zvokudya zvegungwa nemiriwo pasinei nehukuru hwechikamu, Kai ndiyo nzvimbo yako.
Nzvimbo yacho yakanga isina chinhu chaicho asi izvozvo zvakanga zvakadaro nokuti iyi yaiva Svondo yekutanga yavakambovhura.
Nice atmosphere, basa racho raifadza zvikuru uye renje rakanga rakanaka.
Saka zvimwe zvekuongorora pano zvakarurama pamusoro peboka uye ruzha.
Tsvimbo hadzisi kuti ushamwari, asi kuravira kunofukidza zvose.
Saka handina kumbobvira ndamboenda chaizvoizvo kuM zvakakodzera, asi ndakaita kuti iendeswe nguva shomanana.

iyi ndiyo nzvimbo yakanakisisa yakavanzika pakati peguta ', ndakanzwa kuti kubva kune bartender, mushure mekunge chikafu chakajeka ( edza steak ne portobello howa) uye zvinwiwa pabhawa rapera Chipiri.
The photobook menyu akanga akanaka kubata, zvechokwadi akabatsira boka rangu uye ini kunhonga huku yakagochwa, nyama yenguruve, uye noodle ndiro kuti isu tose akarayira.
Vashandi vanogara, iyo ambiance inonakidza asi yakasununguka, uye chikafu chiri kunze kwenyika ino!
Nokuti mitengo iwayo uye akapfeka kumusoro mhepo iwe kutarisira zvakawanda uye anofanira kuwana zvakawanda.
Zvokudya zvinonaka, basa rakaisvonaka, uye mhepo yakanaka inoita kuti izvi zvive sarudzo huru yekudya kwemanheru uye $ 5.99 masikati buffet inoita kuti ive sarudzo inotova nani yemasikati!
The bagels vari fabulous.
Sushi yakanga isiri chinhu chinoshamisa nokuda kwemutengo.
Zvose zvandinogona kutaura ndeye $ 2 pints panguva inofadza awa uye dzimwe dzeiyo yakachipa oysters iwe uchawana muguta, kunyange zvazvo unhu ndevamwe vezvakanakisisa.

iyi ndiyo nzvimbo yakanakisisa yakavanzika pakati peguta ', ndakanzwa kuti kubva kune bartender, mushure mekunge chikafu chakajeka ( edza steak ne portobello howa) uye zvinwiwa pabhawa rapera Chipiri.
Nzvimbo dzinodziya, dzakagadzikana, kugadzwa kwakanaka (kupupurira girazi rakanyorwa uye zvidhinha zvinoparadzanisa dzimba dzekudya).
Chikafu pano chakanaka zvikuru, asi chete kana uchida kumirira.
Ndakawana zvokudya, basa uye kukosha zvakasiyana nguva dzose ndave ikoko.
Mumwe wedu chaizvoizvo akafarira expresso - ndizvozvo.
Mune yakadaro crappy chikamu chetaundi kuwana kukosha kwakanaka kwemasikati, nzvimbo iyi yakakura.

Takafunga kuti hatina kumbobvira tave neArgentina Pizza kare saka takabata masikati edu ikoko, tichigoverana Pelligrino hombe, pizza yemaviri ezvinhu zvavo zvakakosha, imwe yaiva mbudzi cheese imwe yebhuruu cheese, uye zvose zvakanga zvakaisvonaka.
Iyo tsvuku curry isina simba uye isina kunaka, iyo pad thai yakanamatira pamwe chete uye lumpy, mupunga unowanzo overcooked, uye zvokudya zvegungwa zvakanaka sketchy.
Takatora advanatage yehafu mutengo sushi deal musi weMugovera saka zvakanga zvakanaka zvakakodzera.
Ndakaenda pa 6:00 PM zvakananga kune pre-theater menu ($ 19.95 yeiyo yakagochwa tomato soup ne chevre, steak frites, creme brulee) uye zvakanga zvinoshamisa.
Usaenda wega---kunyange vanhu vaviri hazvina kukwana kune ruzivo rwose, ne pickles uye sarudzo yenyama uye seafoods.
Vane Indian yechokwadi pamitengo inoshamisa.
Shoko rezano, chengetedza nzvimbo ye pasta zvidya uye usambosiya kusvikira wave ne tiramisu.
Kunze kwekunge iwe uri kudya muPizzeria divi renzvimbo ino, uye hausi kumhanya, nzvimbo iyi ipfungwa yakaipa.
Vashandi vakanga vachinyatsoteerera, ambience yakanaka, uye chikafu chakaisvonaka.
Dhiza racho rakanga rakaita sezvidimbu zvitanhatu zvenyama yemombe mairi.

Asi usambofa kuraira bacon kunonoka pa nite (kana ndiro kana mumasangweji, nokuti nyaya iyoyo regai kubva chero kutora kunze nzvimbo) sezvazviri kubva mangwanani frying anobuda zvakaoma anenge sezvinoita bacos, kukuvadza molars yangu.
Chinokosha zvikuru, sushi inokwikwidzana neyakanakisisa muTokyo.
Simple nyaradzo zvokudya uye chii inopisa uye lage zvikamu.
Nzvimbo yayo yakanaka uye chokwadi chekuti Hutner College iri pedyo uye mitengo yavo inonzwisisika zvikuru, inoita kuti vadzidzi vadzokere kuSuan zvakare uye zvakare.
Mimhanzi yakanaka, chikafu chikuru, basa rinokurumidza mitengo inokwanisika.
20 maminitsi ekuchengetedza kwedu asi zvakatipa nguva yekuve nemacocktails mashomanana uye kunakidzwa nenzvimbo dzedu uye mumwe nomumwe.
Patakanga tichienda, vaviri vacho vakamira pedyo nemukova vakati kune mumwe weti, hatisi kumhanya-mhanya.
Isu tose takasarudza pasta dhiza uye ivo vaipiwa nenguva uye vatsva.
Iyo anti-pasta yakanga yakaisvonaka, kunyanya calamari, sezvakanga zvakaita kuzadza pasta mains.
Vakakwanisa kundipinza pa 6 mushure mekunge ndafonera usiku pamberi pezuva rangu rekucherechedza kweChishanu manheru ndokundiudza kuti vaizotibata zvakanaka nokuda kwechiitiko.
Yellowtail yakanga yakanaka zvikuru uyewo.
Mukuedza kuwedzera turnover, iyo resitorendi inopa hapana desserts kupfuura inorumbidzwa espresso cup yakazadzwa ne chokoreti mousse.
Luckily takachengetedza nzvimbo yeBBQ Salmon, Sea Bass uye Crispy Duck.
Paunenge wakagara muimba yavo huru yekudyira (iyo ine inoshamisa, yakapendwa nemaoko yakakwirira denga) iwe haumbofi wakaziva kuti kune nyika kunze.
Zvisinei, basa racho rakanga riri ruva rakajeka mubindu.

Nepo iyo $ 20 entrée range haisi yakanyanya kudhura, muNew York City, pane zvechokwadi chikafu chiri nani mune iyo huwandu, uye saka Sapphire, pasinei nekuti yakanaka mhepo, ingangove isiri resitorendi yandichadzokera.
Iyo zucchini uye mbatatisi yakasvibiswa inosanganiswa negariki uye butter iyo inongonyungudika mumuromo mako.
Nzvimbo iyi haienzaniswi neMamoun's maererano nemutengo, kutsva, kukosha, uye unhu hwakatumirwa, asi ndizvo chete maonero angu.
Nzvimbo iyi ine mukana wakanaka, asi inoda huwandu hwakakosha hwebasa tisati tagona kururamisa kushandisa mari yakawanda iyoyo pane zvokudya zveIndia zvaunogona kuwana kwese kwese.
Iyo menyu yakatarisa zvakanaka, kunze kwekupa Chilean Sea Bass, asi server haipi zvakakosha zvakanyorwa pabhodhi kunze.
Kana iwe uri kutsvaga nzvimbo yekugara pasi, kunwa uye kukurukurirana neshamwari, enda kune inotapira-n-tart uye uzvirayire iwe hong-kong styled mukaka uye tii ne tapioca maparera (kupisa).
Zvisinei, enda kune ambience, uye funga kuti chikafu chete shamwari rwendo mhiri nyika!
Nepo chikafu chacho chakanga chakaisvonaka, chakanga chisiri chisingadhuri (kunyange zvazvo chisingadhuri zvikuru kana).
Tinoenda nemusi weMuvhuro kune prix fixe uye ruzivo rwedu nezvokudya rwave rwakaenzana neBlue Ribbon.

(Chikafu chakaendeswa nemukomana webhazi, kwete weti) Hatina kuwana chizi inopiwa nokuda pasta, mvura yedu uye waini magirazi akaramba EMPTY yedu yose zvokudya, apo tingadai nyore kushandisa imwe $ 20 pamusoro waini.
Basa rine ushamwari, mitengo yakanaka - nguva yekuendesa yakanga ichinonoka zvishoma, asi nokuda kwenzira iyo iyi pizza inonaka, ndinoda kuifuratira.
Takasvika nenguva nokuda kwechengetedzo yedu ndokugara nokukurumidza.
$ 160 ye 2 filets, 2 mativi, appetizer uye zvinwiwa.
Iyo appetizing yakaisvonaka - kungofanana neZabars Barney Greengrass pamutengo unonzwisisika (kana yakatengwa nepaundi).
Iyo tsvuku curry isina simba uye isina kunaka, iyo pad thai yakanamatira pamwe chete uye lumpy, mupunga unowanzo overcooked, uye zvokudya zvegungwa zvakanaka sketchy.
Chikafu chacho chinonaka.
Chikafu panzvimbo ino ndeche 'gourmet' Indian cuisine.
Dambudziko chete nderekuti maneja haana kukwanisa zvachose.
Ndakaraira tamarind duck uye mudzimai wangu akarayira noodles nenyama yemombe, uye isu tose takafara nenzira iyo ndiro dzakamutsa Thai flavors nenzira dzisingatarisirwi.
Chikafu chacho chikuru uye chine mutengo unonzwisisika.
Excellent mhepo, zvinonaka ndiro zvakanaka uye ushamwari basa.
Waini chete uye doro zvinoshumirwa, asi imba varities chaizvoizvo zvakanaka zvikuru.
Murume wangu akati he could've eaten several more, the portion was fine for me he even claimed that the french fries were the best he has had.
Great bagels akaita nzira yekare.
Ndinoda zvokudya Mamoun uyewo, asi parutivi, Kati Rolls chete kubereka tastier zvokudya maoko pasi.
Edza Times Square cocktail -- ginger lemonade ne vodka (inowanikwawo pasina vodka.)
Decor yakanaka uye minimalist, chikafu chiri nyore asi chakanyatsoiswa uye chakabikwa, uye waini yewaini inoenderana nezvokudya zvakanaka kwazvo.
Zvokudya zvatinofarira ndeye pesto pizza, saladi yeimba, uye bhodhoro rakanaka rewaini.

Apo matangi mune mamwe maresitorendi eChinatown anoratidza yakavanda zviuru zvehupenyu hwegungwa hunosuruvarisa mumvura yavo yakasviba, matangi paPing's akajeka segirazi rine zvisikwa zvine hutano-zvinotarisa izvo zvisati zvaziva kuti zvichava chikamu chevamwe dim sum lover's brunch.
Pakanga pane kumirira kwenguva refu kwetafura kunze, asi zvakanga zvishoma zvakanyanya kupisa muzuva zvakadaro saka tafura yedu ye insde yakanga yakanaka kwazvo.
Uchafanirwa kudzokera ku Edza Chokoreti Yako!
Zvokudya zvacho zvakanga zvisina kunaka.
Ambience inofadza, basa risina kukanganisa.
Wangu akanga zvishoma akatsva asi achiri inonaka mbudzi chizi uye panchetta (raddichio akanga mhando inovava kunyange).
Kunyange zvazvo zvimwe zvinhu zvinokosha zvakaisvonaka (iyo burger, dzimwe dze pastas), chikafu hachisi chaizvoizvo pfungwa.
Zvisinei, enda kune ambience, uye funga kuti chikafu chete shamwari rwendo mhiri nyika!
Chaizvoizvo inonaka chitubu rolls uye noodles kuti mutengo wakanaka kunyange.
Anodada chaizvoizvo nezvokudya zvake nebhizimisi rake.
Chikafu chacho chaidhura zvikuru (takashandisa $ 160 yekudya kwemasikati kwevaviri) asi inonaka zvikuru.
Iyo menyu yakanga ichishamisa nekusarudzwa kubva kune burger, kusvika kune steak, kusvika kune escargot.
Ndakaraira Chicken Teriyaki dish ndokuwana kuti huku yakanga yakaoma zvikuru.
Zviri charmingly duku uye kuti kunotungamirira mhepo kuti zvikuru cozy uye kudanana, kunyange.
Nzvimbo yayo yakanaka uye chokwadi chekuti Hutner College iri pedyo uye mitengo yavo inonzwisisika zvikuru, inoita kuti vadzidzi vadzokere kuSuan zvakare uye zvakare.
Mupunga kune hove ration wakanga wakanakawo-- havana kuedza kuwedzera mupunga.

kwete zvokudya, kwete ambiance , kwete basa, Ndinobvumirana yapfuura wongororo iwe kumirira uye kumirira, kumirira vashandi vari zvikuru zvisina kufanira uye kana iwe kupinda vari kutarisa kuti iwe zvakanaka kunze .
Dzimwe nguva ndinowana zvokudya zvakaipa uye basa rakaipa, dzimwe nguva ndinowana basa rakanaka uye rakaipa.
Nzvimbo yacho yakakwana.
Pakupedzisira iwe unosara uine muto wakapfava une noodles iyo iwe unogona slurp kubva mumukombe.
Chinhu chinonyanya kushungurudza, kunyange zvakadaro, ndechokuti maseva anoita seakadzidziswa kufambisa mari.
Zvakanaka zvekudya zvisina kujairika nejini uye sneakers.
The bagels nguva dzose kudziya, nyoro mukati, crispy kunze uye hombe kukura.

Isu tiri chaizvo pamusoro pe sushi uye isu tose takanga tiri ndapota nesarudzo yega yega iyo yaisanganisira: ceviche mix (chaiyo), crab dumplings, assorted sashimi, sushi uye rolls, mhando mbiri dzesake, uye banana tempura.
Kana paine munhu ane panikiro yekusaziva zvakakwana pamusoro pewaini,tapota tarisa waini yavo.
Kana iwe uri mumwe munhu anoonga nyore, runako, uye zvinoshamisa zvakaiswa uye kuravira zvokudya zvegungwa nemiriwo pasinei nehukuru hwechikamu, Kai ndiyo nzvimbo yako.
Basa rakakurumidza.
The dim mari iri delectable apo mitengo zviri nyore zvikuru pamusoro chikwama.
Mumwe murume, zvichida maneja, akauya patafura yedu, uye pasina kunyemwerera kana kuti kukwazisa kwakakumbira kuraira kwedu.
The chena bhinzi brushetta kutanga akanga incredible uye pasta akanga phenomenal.
Wechipiri iwe kufamba kuburikidza rinorema vault kufanana musuo, nevanhu vachitarisira kusvika kwako iwe kuwana pfungwa yokuti uri kuenda kuva kudya kukwira kwoupenyu hwose.
Iyo shrimp scampi yakanga yakaisvonaka uye antipasti yakanga yakawanda.
Kunyange zvazvo ndakaita kuchengetedza pa 3pm kweusiku humwe chete kuburikidza neDinnerbroker, takanga takagara patafura neimwe yemaonero akanaka!
Ndave pano nguva shomanana kudya kwemanheru, kamwe chete brunch uye kaviri kudya kwemasikati.
Isu menyu inochinja zvakanyanya, e xcept kune imwe kana maviri chaiwo, unhu uye kutarisirwa kwavanoisa muzvokudya zvavo zviri pachena.

The vane pamusoro 100 doro dzakasiyana-siyana kupa muenzi wavo saka kuti akaita murume wangu kufara chaizvo uye zvokudya zvakanga zvinonaka, kana ndichifanira kukurudzira ndiro inofanira kuva pumkin tortelini.
Zvichakadaro, mutengesi webhawa akaramba achidurura champagne kubva kuchengetedza kwake mushure mekunge tapedza bhodhoro redu uye takafarikanya kushandiswa kwemuto we turnip ne pureed basil, gratis.
Ndaifanira kugoverana tafura yangu neboka rine ruzha revana uye minamato yakanga isina kufanira munhu asingateereri.
BUt chikafu chavo chakanakisisa ndeche thh Thai spiced curry noodles ne shrimp - chikafu chaizodhura $ 23.95 inzvimbo dzakawanda, asi iri $ 16 pano.
Pashure pezvose izvozvo, vakanyunyuta kwandiri pamusoro pezano duku.
Vashandi vakanga vachinyatsoteerera, ambience yakanaka, uye chikafu chakaisvonaka.
Chikafu chinotyisa - zvechokwadi edza bass ine mitsetse.
The mukati-imba mukadzi DJ musi weMugovera usiku ane zvinotyisa zvakanaka kuravira mumhanzi, uye uyezve, anotora zvikumbiro.
Kofi yavo yakanaka zvikuru zvakare!
Takanga tagoverana saladi yeimba yakanga iri itsva.
Iyi nzvimbo duku ine yakanaka yemukati decor uye inokwanisika mitengo yeguta.
Zviri kinda nosiy uye matafura vari pedyo pamwe chete asi ichiri nzvimbo yakanaka kunakidzwa akanaka kudya kwemanheru.
Waini mazita haasi hombe asi def zvakanaka akasarudzwa.
Kalbi naNebbiolo vanoita basa pamwe chete.
Haigoni kuva ambience, nokuti nzvimbo yacho yakamanikana zvikuru uye vamwe vaenzi vanofanira kugara munzira.
Chaizvoizvo inonaka chitubu rolls uye noodles kuti mutengo wakanaka kunyange.
Ndave ne pizza nguva dzose uye caprese saladi appetizer.
Basa iri ok asi rinogona kuva nani.
Nokuda kwenzvimbo, mitengo inonzwisisika zvikuru.
Kana iwe uri kutsvaga nzvimbo yekugara pasi, kunwa uye kukurukurirana neshamwari, enda kune inotapira-n-tart uye uzvirayire iwe hong-kong styled mukaka uye tii ne tapioca maparera (kupisa).
Vashandi vane ushamwari vanonyatsokubvumira kuti unakirwe nekudya kwako uye kambani yauri nayo.
Vanoda kick kubva mairi asi kusvikira panguva iyoyo sushi yakanaka kwazvo uye nzvimbo yacho inoenderana.
Inoratidzika kuva muridzi wekutanga uye inoratidza.
Great atmoshere uye kukosha ose bit.
The waini mazita haasi zvikuru, uye desserts vanotumirwa kubva Bruno pasi mumugwagwa, izvo zvisiri zvakanaka sezvazvaimboita.
Kunaka kwangu, chinhu chiri chose kubva pahove kusvika kumupunga kusvika kune seaweed zvakanga zvachose zvinoshamisa.
kumamatira ndi nkhuku, nyama ya ng'ombe, ndi mbale za nkhosa.
Utumiki ndi wapadera ndi nkhanu-keke mazira anga benedict sakanakhoza kukhala bwino.
Yesani tchizi cha kirimu wa azitona kapena lox kufalikira pa tirigu wathunthu chirichonse bagel.
Ngakhale izi sizingatchedwe malo odyera, mwina ndizochita zabwino kwambiri ku Manhatten: $ 4 kwa mbale younjikana ndi mpunga ndi 2-3 entrees.
$ 20 pa zonse zomwe mungadye sushi sizingamenyedwe.
kumamatira ndi nkhuku, nyama ya ng'ombe, ndi mbale za nkhosa.

Zabwino, chifukwa Hei, ndi chakudya chochuluka, koma choipa chifukwa dim sum imayenera kukhala magawo ang'onoang'ono kuti muthe kuyesa mbale zambiri komanso zazing'ono kuti mbale iliyonse ikhale yotsika mtengo.
Ichi chinali chochitika choipa kwambiri chodyera chomwe ndakhala nacho.
Ogwira ntchito aubwenzi ndi ophunzitsa, atcheru kwambiri ndipo amasonkhezera utumiki wa bar yaiwisi.
tinagawa samosa yokoma ya masamba ndi malai tikka wrap.
Zili ngati iwo anatenga nkhuku zotsalira, kutsanulira mafuta ndi kuwaza tsabola ufa pa izo (msuzi unali translucent ndi wofiira).
Chikhalidwe cha French decour chinali chosangalatsa ngakhale kuti holoyo inali phokoso m'malo mwake - malo odyera anali odzaza ndipo tinayenera kukweza mawu athu kuti tithe kusunga zokambirana.
Matebulo ndi crammed njira kwambiri pafupi, menyu ndi chizindikiro cha aliyense odyera Italy, ndi mndandanda vinyo chabe overpriced.
Tinawaona akutentha chinthu chimodzi chozizira ngakhale kuti sindikudziwa kuti chinali mbale iti ya dim sum.
Menyu inali ndi chakudya cha brassiere chokhazikika, bwino ndiye malo monga Balthazar etc.
The nkhuku mphika pie ndi excpetiona, ndi cheeseburger lalikulu ndi delictable, ndi utumiki akatswiri wan ofunda.
Choipitsitsa nchakuti, $60 inawonjezeredwa molakwa pa ndalama zathu za $80.
Ndinali ndi chakudya chochititsa mantha, ndipo seva yathu inkatitsogolera ku vinyo wabwino kwambiri mu mtengo wathu, m'malo motilola kugula vinyo wamtengo wapatali mofananamo womwe sunali wabwino.
Utumikiwo unali wabwino kwambiri ndipo chakudyacho chinali chokoma.
Nsomba zanga zinali zokoma mu msuzi wodabwitsa wa curry.
Mitengo ndi yapamwamba kudya ndipo nkhuku yawo tikka marsala ndi yabwino kwambiri.
Zakumwa nthawi zonse welll anapanga ndi vinyo kusankha ndi mwachilungamo mtengo.
A kukhudza kwambiri jalapeno kutentha kwa kusiyana ndipo zikanakhala zabwino kwambiri ndithudi.
Small servings kwa entrée chachikulu, ine ndinali salmon (sanali chidwi) chibwenzi anali nkhuku, zinali zabwino.
Desserts onse gulu anayesa anapeza ndemanga zabwino.
Ndinapeza chakudya, utumiki ndi mtengo wapadera everytime ndakhala kumeneko.
Iwo sanatipatse zakudya zoyamikira, ananyalanyaza zopempha mobwerezabwereza za shuga, ndipo anaponya mbale zathu patebulo.
Nyama ya ng'ombe ya corned ndi pastrami ndi yabwino kwambiri, yochepa kwambiri mafuta kuposa malo akuluakulu a alendo kuzungulira Times Square.

Nsomba ya codfish yophika inali yonyowa kwambiri - ngati kuti inaphedwa molakwa - komabe mawonekedwe abwino kwambiri anagwetsedwa ndi zokometsera zodabwitsa za bland - zokometsera zokometsera zingakhale zitagonjetsedwa, komabe kusakaniza zitsamba kapena msuzi wina ukanachita zambiri kuti uwonjezere.
Chakudya chachikulu ndi mitengo ndi zomveka kwambiri.
Malo ndi achikondi, koma chakudya ndi choopsa, utumiki ndi womvetsa chisoni, ndipo gabriella amanama pa zonse zomwe angathe.
Chakudyacho ndi chokoma komanso chokonzedwa bwino pamodzi ndi utumiki waubwenzi komanso wa munthu.
Zokoma nkhanu makeke kwambiri.
Tinali kufunafuna chakudya ndipo tinapunthwa pamalo odyera a ku India ku East Sixth Street.
Dumplings kwambiri anatumikira pakati woyera, chic zokongoletsa.
Chakudya chinali pansi pa avareji, utumiki unali womvetsa chisoni, panalibe ambience konse.
Ngati mupita ku menyu ya zisudzo zisanachitike, ndizovuta kwambiri.

Kwa zaka zambiri woyang'anira, Vittorio, ndi gulu lake, nthawi zonse amandichitira ngati banja--ngakhale ndi bizinesi yonse iyi osati-yaing'ono yamtengo wapatali imachita, ndizodabwitsa kuti amatha ngakhale kukumbukira mlendo wokhazikika koma osati pafupipafupi.
Chakudya chachikulu, menyu yabwino ya kukula, utumiki waukulu ndi malo odzichepetsa.
Pizza pano ndi yabwino nthawi zonse.
Malo ndi ambience ndi Ok koma chakudya ndi chimene chimapanga.
Chakudyacho chinali chenicheni.
Zakudya kuchokera ku zomwe ndasonkhanitsa ndi zenizeni za ku Taiwan, ngakhale kuti ndizosiyana kwambiri ndi zomwe ndazolowera ku Taipei.
Pizza - pizza yokhayo ku NYC yomwe sayenera kukhala ndi toppings yowonjezera - crust imakoma ngati mkate wabwino kwambiri, wophika mwatsopano!
Butter anasungunuka, vinyo woyera wofunda, tchizi oozing kulikonse.
Kukongola kwa malowa kuli ngati malo ochezera a ndege.

Ndiyenera kuchenjeza wowerenga kuti magawo a magawo ndi ochepa kwambiri (makamaka appetizers), kotero ngati mukukonzekera kudya mpaka mutakhuta ndipo simukufuna kulamula menyu yapadera yolawa ya wophika, konzekerani kulamula ndi kulipira appetizer (1 mbale kwa munthu aliyense chifukwa magawo sali ogawana),  entree yaikulu, ndi udon yozizira kumapeto kwa chakudya.
Ngati ndikanatha kuwerengera anthu malowa akanakhala kuchoka pama chart - mwatsoka - pizza, pepani - osati zabwino kwambiri ku NYC.

Pambuyo pa 2 kuyesa kwa woperekera chakudya kuti achotse (sitinayang'ane ngakhale pa izo komabe, tinali ndi mowa wathunthu komabe kumwa), woyang'anira adayandikira ndikutiuza kuti akufunikira tebulo kwa anthu omwe ali ndi zosungitsa.
Mwiniwakeyo amasamaliradi zosowa zanu zonse.

Pangani zosungirako koma muyembekezere kuchedwa mphindi 15-20 pamene ogwira ntchito ochereza alendo anali ndi vuto lokhala alendo omwe anafika ndi malo osungirako chifukwa mwina anali ndi ins zambiri zoyenda kukhala pafupi kwambiri ndi Time Square.
Ndakhala pafupifupi nthawi 4 ndipo nthawi zonse ndakhala ndikudya chakudya chachikulu.
Pambuyo pa chakudya chamadzulo, tengani tsiku lanu ku HUGE dance floor, mwinamwake imodzi mwa zazikulu zomwe mudzawona ku NY.
Nthawi zambiri amakhala odzaza kumapeto kwa sabata koma amagwira ntchito bwino komanso olondola ndi utumiki wawo.
Seva inalidi yozizira ndipo inatipatsa chakudya ndi zakumwa zathu ndi kumwetulira.
Khamu labwino, malo abwino okhala panja, ndi vibe ya m'chiuno ya ku Japan.
Ndinkakonda everythig za izo-makamaka ziwonetsero ndi osewera.
Ndikulimbikitsanso mbale za mpunga kapena mitundu yosiyanasiyana ya congee (mpunga porridge).
kuchokera kwa ndodo yolankhula Chingerezi.
Palibe amene anafunsa chomwe chinali cholakwika pamene tinachoka popanda chilichonse chokhudza mbale zathu.
nthawi zina ndimapeza chakudya choipa ndi utumiki woipa, nthawi zina ndimapeza utumiki wabwino wabwino ndi woipa.
Yesani Pad Se-Ew kapena Chicken ndi Cashew Nuts kuti mupeze zochitika zosaiwalika komanso zobwerezabwereza.

Kuchokera ku pulogalamu yoyamikira yophika ya butternut squash ravioli yovuta mu msuzi wokoma wa truffle kupita ku buttery yodabwitsa ndi langostine entree yofewa kupita ku dessert yomwe sindingathe kukumbukira chifukwa cha Cakebread Cabernet yosangalatsa yomwe tinkamwa - madzulo onse anali odabwitsa.
aspects: wosalimba butternut squash ravioli mu msuzi wokoma wa truffle

sentences: Palibe gimmicks pano -- chakudya chimalankhula chokha mu mwatsopano wake ndi kukonzekera.
Utumikiwo unali wabwino kwambiri, chakudyacho chinali chabwino kwambiri, koma chochitika chonsecho chinali chozizira kwambiri.
Tinasamalidwa bwino ndi ogwira ntchito mwachangu makamaka woyang'anira Tony Gaskin yemwe adapanga malingaliro abwino kwambiri pazosankha zathu za menyu.
Inu kulamula kuchokera menyu, kotero inu kusiya kumverera ngati inu anaphonya zinachitikira zonse.
Kufalikira kwabwino, kusankha kwakukulu kwa zakumwa ndi bagels kwenikweni zokoma.
Mbali zinali bwino ndi mchere modabwitsa.
Ine sindinadye nkhosa chop monga zokoma ngati zimenezo,saladi kwenikweni zabwino atavala ndi mandimu ndi owonjezera virgnin mafuta azitona.
Tinayamba ndi lox ndi mussels (ive yabwino kwambiri yomwe inali nayo, nthawi zonse) ndipo tinali ndi cod ndi trout chakudya chamadzulo.
Utumiki ukhoza kuwongoleredwa koma mwachisawawa iyi ndi malo omwe amamvetsetsa kufunika kwa zinthu zazing'ono (zolemera, zakuda, zakale zowoneka ngati teapot, kwa wina) mu zochitika za odyera.
Mlengalenga wabwino kwambiri, mbale zokoma zabwino ndi utumiki waubwenzi.
Chakudya chinali pafupifupi ndipo crème brulee inali yowopsa - shuga anali wopsereza, osati caramelized ndi kununkhiza kwa parafini.
Galasi la Leaping Lizard, galasi la prosecco, ndi mussels anali ndi zonse zosangalatsa.
Mitengo singathe kumenyedwa chifukwa cha khalidwe, kuchuluka, mwatsopano ndi kukoma.
Tinali ndi desserts kwambiri (kuphatikizapo cannoli yabwino kwambiri yomwe ndakhala nayo) ndiyeno iwo anapereka pambuyo pa chakudya chamadzulo, panyumba.
Mwiniwake ndi ogwira ntchito onse ndi a ku Japan komanso omwe amawonjezera ambiance yonse.
The pitsa ndi overpriced ndi soggy.
Komabe, kuyang'ana pa tebulo pafupi wathu, ife tonse mtundu ankafuna ife analamula pitsa, amene anayang'ana PERRRRRRRRRFECT.

Munthu amene anali kuchititsa analonjeza kupulumutsa tebulo chipani chathu cha 7, ndiye anakhala phwando la 2 pa tebulo kwambiri iye anali kupulumutsa (kutanthauza pamene panali boths lotseguka kuzungulira onse).
Ndikukonzekera kubweranso kuno ndikuyembekezera kuyesa assortment yawo ya bruschetta, panini's.....
zosankha zanga: Guizhou nkhuku, nsomba ndi otentha nyemba gwero, nsomba fillet mu zokometsera gwero (menyu wapadera).
Mkazi wathu woperekera chakudya anali wokoma ndi wokodza, osati wopambanitsa.
Ndikupangira kwambiri Nina kwa aliyense amene akufuna kukhala ndi chakudya chamadzulo chachikondi mu kutentha kwa mtima kozungulira wodzazidwa ndi makandulo ndi zithunzi za banja.
Malo odyera omwe samayesa kuchita chilichonse kupatula kutumikira chakudya chachikulu ndi utumiki waukulu mu mkhalidwe wosangalatsa.
utumiki ndi wochezeka, ndipo sanali ndi vuto kuyenda mu ndi kupeza tebulo.
Wina analimbikitsa dessert - ifenso tinasiya zimenezo.
Ndi malo abwino omasuka ndi kukambirana.
Yesani tchizi cha kirimu wa azitona kapena lox kufalikira pa tirigu wathunthu chirichonse bagel.
Sindidzabwerera m'mbuyo pokhapokha wina ali footing bill.

Woperekera chakudya amandikumbukira ndipo ndi waubwenzi kwambiri, amadziwa zomwe nthawi zonse zimakhala ndipo ndizo mini buns zokazinga ndi mkaka wothinikizidwa ndi zipatso zosiyanasiyana pa beancurd.
aspects: mini buns wokazinga ndi mkaka wothiniki za condensed ndi zipatso zosiyanasiyana pa beancurd

sentences: Ive anapempha woyang'anira ngolo kuti apereke mpunga wokutidwa ndi tsamba la lotus ndipo anayankha mpunga kumbuyo ndipo anangochoka.
Ndipo pamapeto pa maloto ophika awa cheke chinaperekedwa ku tebulo lathu mwa kugwetsa galasi la madzi.
Ndikuyang'ana mozungulira, ndinawona chipinda chodzaza ndi anthu a ku New York akusangalala ndi chakudya chenicheni mu lesitilanti yeniyeni, osati clubhouse ya kuyesera kodabwitsa kuyesa kuwonedwa.
Zakumwa nthawi zonse welll anapanga ndi vinyo kusankha ndi mwachilungamo mtengo.
koma utumikiwo unali pang'onopang'ono pang'onopang'ono.
Anali 1 appetizer, 2 entrees ndi 2 cokes ndi bilu anali ~ $ 55.00, osaphatikizapo nsonga.
Mndandanda wa vinyo ndi waukulu komanso wochititsa chidwi.
Ngakhale kuti mitengo si yapadera, magawo ake ndi aakulu.
Ngakhale kuti nsomba zake zabwino za m'nyanja, mitengo yake ndi yokwera kwambiri.
Apo ayi, malowa ali ndi utumiki waukulu ndi mitengo komanso mkhalidwe wabwino waubwenzi.
Rao's ili ndi utumiki wabwino kwambiri ndi mlengalenga ku NYC.
Saulo ndi wabwino kwambiri, koma ndithudi osati wamkulu.
Chakudya chabwino kwambiri cha Taiwan ku NY!
Ndinali ndisanakhalepo ndi Edamame pureed kale koma ndinkaganiza kuti zinali zatsopano komanso zokoma (zikanatha kugwiritsa ntchito mchere pang'ono).

Ndiyenera kuchenjeza wowerenga kuti magawo a magawo ndi ochepa kwambiri (makamaka appetizers), kotero ngati mukukonzekera kudya mpaka mutakhuta ndipo simukufuna kulamula menyu yapadera yolawa ya wophika, konzekerani kulamula ndi kulipira appetizer (1 mbale kwa munthu aliyense chifukwa magawo sali ogawana),  entree yaikulu, ndi udon yozizira kumapeto kwa chakudya.
Ngakhale izi ndi malo wokongola kuti mopambanitsa wokongola French njira, chakudya anali mwano zoopsa.
Curry wofiira ndi wofooka komanso wopanda kukoma, pad thai imamangidwa pamodzi ndi lumpy, mpunga nthawi zambiri umaphika kwambiri, ndipo nsomba zam'nyanja zimakhala zokongola kwambiri.
tsopano ngati akanatha kupeza toaster basi.
The vibe ndi omasuka kwambiri ndi wokondweretsa, utumiki unali waukulu ndi chakudya anali kwambiri!
Kusankhidwa kwakukulu kwa bruschettas, paninis, tramezzinis kumasunga m'kamwa ku stagnating.
Ambiance- omasuka ndi masitayelo.

The sushi wakhala kuchokera pafupifupi kuti pansipa pafupifupi, utumiki kudikira nthawizonse wakhala sub-par m'mlengalenga amapita kuchokera zabwino kwenikweni zokwiyitsa (ngati inu kukhala m'deralo kupitirira khitchini, ndi acousitcs ndi zoopsa, chirichonse echoes ndi phokoso kwambiri).
Iwo sanalole ngakhale ine kumaliza galasi langa la vinyo ndisanapereke wina.

Pamene tinali kukhala pansi kudya chakudya cha subpar bwanayo anapitiriza kudzudzula antchito ake angapo chifukwa chotulutsa makontena olakwika kaamba ka zokometsera ndi kuwafotokozera mmene makontena ameneŵa anali okwera mtengo.
Kudya kuchokera, mlengalenga umapulumutsa, koma pa desiki yanu, ndizochitika zokhumudwitsa kwambiri.
Mitengoyo anali CHEAP poyerekeza ndi khalidwe la utumiki ndi chakudya.
Tinali ndi scallops monga appetizer ndipo zinali zokoma ndipo msuzi unali wodabwitsa.
Chakudya chabwino kwambiri ndi nsomba ya nori-wrapped tuna.
$ 6 ndipo pali zakudya zambiri zokoma, zonse zatsopano komanso zodzazidwa mosalekeza.
Ndalama zochepa zili bwino koma sizimakoma kuti zatsopano, ndipo mbale zazing'ono sizikuwoneka zotentha zotentha monga momwe ziyenera (komanso onani kusowa kwa Chinese pano).
Komanso, musakonzekere kupempha mpukutu womwe mumakonda, ngati suli pa menyu, simungathe kukhala nawo.

Munthu amene anali kuchititsa analonjeza kupulumutsa tebulo chipani chathu cha 7, ndiye anakhala phwando la 2 pa tebulo kwambiri iye anali kupulumutsa (kutanthauza pamene panali boths lotseguka kuzungulira onse).
The Waitstaff anali zabwino kwambiri ndipo analingalira swordfish kwa mwamuna wanga iye anasangalala chakudya chake.
Zinapangitsa kuti malo anga odyera azikhala osamasuka.

Komanso, ngati simukupusitsidwa mosavuta, mudzapeza mazana a malo odyera omwe adzakupatsani utumiki ndi ambiance zomwe zili zofanana ndi Alain Ducasse, ndi chakudya chomwe chidzaposa mu presentaion, kukoma, kusankha, khalidwe ndi kuchuluka.
Nsomba zam'nyanja ndizodabwitsa, pali mndandanda wabwino wa vinyo, ndipo menyu yomwe imasintha nthawi zonse imapereka zodabwitsa zazikulu.
Toons posachedwapa wakhala redone, kotero tsopano ndi malo okongola kwambiri.
Makoma obiriwira a puke amasiya zambiri zofunikira, koma chakudyacho ndi chabwino kwambiri.
Chinthu chimodzi chomwe ndinkakonda pa malowa ndikuti sindinamvepo kuthamangira kapena kukakamizidwa kuti ndipereke tebulo langa ot alendo obwera.
Nsomba ya tuna ndi salmon ndi yabwino kwambiri yomwe takhala nayo.
Tinali ndi zosungitsa pa 9pm, koma sitinakhale mpaka 10:15pm.
Chinthu chokha chodabwitsa chinali ngati titapeza botolo, woperekera chakudya akanangochulukitsa mtengo wa galasi X4, zomwe sizomveka ngakhale pang'ono.
Ndinali ndi Filet Mignon ndi adyo mash.
Fluke sashimi drizzled ndi jalapeno-lime mafuta a azitona, zipatso za mafuta bwino kuwunikira kukoma kwa nsomba.
Pafupi ndi L ku Brooklyn iyi ndi malo abwino abwino okhala ndi pizza yabwino.
Tinali mafani a theka-mtengo Loweruka usiku njira mpaka ena inedible squid pa ulendo posachedwapa.
Magawo ndi aakulu ndipo ma seva nthawi zonse amatidabwitsa ndi woyambira wosiyana.
Zidutswa zonse zatsopano za mozzerella ndi chidutswa cha Plain Cheese ndizodabwitsa.
Utumikiwo unali wapakati, ndipo kusoŵeka kwa makina oziziritsa mpweya kunapangitsa chakudya chosakhala chabwino.
Chakudyacho chinali chokwera mtengo kwambiri (tinawononga $ 160 pa chakudya chamasana kwa awiri) koma chokoma kwambiri.
Super wochezeka ndi knowledgable ndodo, lowoneka bistro ulendo ndi zodabwitsa jazz brunch ndi kwambiri moyo jazz (ndi chilaquiles anali zozizwitsa!
Ndikuzengereza kulemba chifukwa sindingafune kuti jem yanga ya malo a pizza ikhale yodzaza.
Mnzanga anapeza pizza ya bowa yomwe inalawa bwino.
Ena onse a menyu ndi ochepa ndi chirichonse ndi chakudya chabwino.
Chakudyacho ndi chokoma - kuchokera ku zapadera kupita ku menyu-fare nthawi zonse, mbale sizimakhumudwitsa konse.
Tinamaliza chakudya chamadzulo ndi apulo tarte tatin yopepuka modabwitsa ndi flaky.
Chakudyacho ndi chopangidwa komabe chimasunga chikhalidwe cha indian flavoring.
Iwo ngakhale gawo mu menyu otchedwa American Chinese chakudya!
Zokometsera ndizowoneka bwino, zamakono komanso zozizira ndi menyu yomwe sidzapweteka chikwama chanu.
Saladi yawo ya whitefish ndi yabwino kwambiri--nsomba zonse zoyera ndi mayo pang'ono.
Plain ndi yosavuta ndi chakudya choipa cha thai.

Pamene mwamuna wanga ndikupita kumeneko, timagwiritsa ntchito $ 60.00 (khalani ndi LOBSTER TAILS UMMMMM ikufunika ndikunena zambiri) Sindingathe kunena zambiri, ndi malo omwe simudzaiwala Ngati simupita, mudzaphonya A Meal of your life time

Munthu angaganize kuti tidzapeza kupepesa kapena zakumwa zoyamikira - m'malo mwake, tili ndi woperekera chakudya wa snobby sangatenge ngakhale dongosolo lathu kwa mphindi 15 ndipo anatipatsa mlomo pamene tinamupempha kuti achite zimenezo.
Ndikupangira kwambiri malowa kwa aliyense amene akufunafuna mkhalidwe wamba womwe umakuchotsani kumanzere kwa mtsinje wa Seine.
Tinagawana botolo la sake, dongosolo la edamames, ndipo iye anali ndi mbale ya sushi pamene ine ndinali ndi sashimi.
Iwo sakuwoneka kuti amaika chigogomezero pa zapadera kapena zosakaniza zatsopano zomwe kwa ine ndizofunikira kwa thai yabwino.

zosankha zanga ndi izi: - Scallion Pancake (wokazinga ndi madzi a masamba, wapadera kwambiri komanso wokoma) - Guizhou Chicken - Shredded Squid Family Style (imodzi mwazomwe ndimakonda kwambiri) - Sichuan Spicy Soft Shell Crab - Shuizhu Fish (iyi ndi ya mafani a zakudya za Sichuan hardcore, sindingalimbikitse anzanga a ku America monga momwe zimakhalira zokometsera kwambiri.
ngati mukuyang'ana sushi yangwiro yachikhalidwe, pitani apa - ngati mukuyang'ana zophatikiza zosangalatsa, yesani sushi ya gari's (mbali yakum'mawa).
Ndinakhumudwa kwambiri nyerere ankafuna kuuza aliyense kuti asapite kukadya kapena ngakhale kutenga chakudya kumeneko.
Mwayi wabwino kupeza tebulo.
Chilichonse, kuchokera ku mkate wofewa, saladi ya soggy, ndi nthawi yodikira ya mphindi 50, ndi utumiki wamwano wodabwitsa wopereka chakudya chochepa.
Ndimakhala m'dera loyandikana nalo ndipo anzanga amakumana nane pansi pano osati malo a bar komanso lonjezo la The Pizza Place pa 3am.
Chakudya chinali pansi pa avareji, utumiki unali womvetsa chisoni, panalibe ambience konse.
Chakudyacho chili bwino - zinthu zina ndi zabwino - zina sizili (monga mbale ya steak yomwe imakonda kukhala youma).
Kudandaula kwanga kwakukulu kunali chakudya chosakoma ngakhale kuti chinaperekedwa bwino.
Opanga zatsopano awa a french indian fusion amachita bwino kwambiri kupanga mbale zosangalatsa monga momwe zingathere pamene akupezekabe.
Chomwe sindinkakonda ndi mmene chakudyacho chinabwera chitalamulidwa.
Iwo ndi ma bagel abwino kwambiri omwe ndakhala nawo.
Tiyi wa ayezi wa ku Thailand anali wosalala modabwitsa ndi yummy!
Koma zimenezo sizinali icing pa keke: tiramisu yomwe inafanana ndi palibe chomwe ndakhala nacho.
Ine ndi mkazi wanga nthawi zambiri timangolamula primi imodzi ndi secondi imodzi ndikuwagawa, popeza amakonda kupereka magawo akuluakulu.

Kuchokera ku pulogalamu yoyamikira yophika ya butternut squash ravioli yovuta mu msuzi wokoma wa truffle kupita ku buttery yodabwitsa ndi langostine entree yofewa kupita ku dessert yomwe sindingathe kukumbukira chifukwa cha Cakebread Cabernet yosangalatsa yomwe tinkamwa - madzulo onse anali odabwitsa.

Pamene dessert yanga inabwera, panali kandulo mmenemo - osati chifukwa chakuti aliyense anapempha imodzi - koma chifukwa woperekera chakudya ayenera kuti anandiwona ndikutsegula khadi langa la tsiku lobadwa ndi mphatso, ndipo anati akudziwa kuti inali nthawi yapadera ya mtundu wina.
Nicky Mphuno pa bala ndi chithandizo.
Ngakhale ogwira ntchito pa bistro yaing'onoyi ndi aubwenzi kwambiri, sindinakumanepo ndi luso lambiri.
Tinafika ku chakudya chamadzulo tikuyembekezera kuchita chidwi ndi malo omwe ali ndi zakale zochititsa chidwi - koma, ndizo zokhazokha - ZAKALE!
Mwinamwake kwambiri busier chakudya chamasana, izo kawirikawiri yodzaza chakudya chamadzulo (pafupi kwambiri ndi mzinda).
Jimmy's ndi manja pansi pa malo otentha kwambiri usiku ku Bronx.
Chilichonse ndi chabwino kwambiri, menyu ndi yaikulu kwambiri, ndipo mumadya ndi mawonekedwe kumbali zonse za mzindawo.
nokha chiyanjo ndikudya chakudya chamadzulo pano muone ngati simukugwirizana nane.
koma pamene tinayang'ana pa menyu, panalibe zosankha zambiri, ambiri a iwo anali dumplings mu gawo la appetizer.
Woyang'anira wanga anapempha appetizers gulu ndi woperekera chakudya anatipatsa osati zimene tinalamula, koma zinthu zina zimene sizinalamule.
Awsome Pizza makamaka chidutswa cha Margheritta.
Pizza ndi yokoma - amagwiritsa ntchito mozzarella yatsopano m'malo mwa tchizi chotsika mtengo, chozizira, chosweka chofala kwa pizzaria ambiri.
Kuphatikiza kwa msuzi watsopano wa tomato, tchizi chatsopano cha mozz, basil ndi mtanda womwe amapanga ndi ufa wochokera kunja, kumapangitsa izi kukhala imodzi mwa pizza yabwino ku NY.
Agalu otentha anali ozizira pakati ndipo ma buns anali akale.
Ndinali m'chikondi ndi Pongsri pa 48th, koma poyerekeza ndi Suan ndi pang'onopang'ono mu utumiki ndi overpriced.
Mukhoza kupeza chakudya chabwino kwambiri pa malo ambiri odyera a ku India pafupi ndi Lexington Avenue chifukwa cha mtengo wa imodzi mwa mbale zokoma kwambiri pano.
Simupita ku Mizu chifukwa cha utumiki wabwino kwambiri, mumapita ku chakudya chachikulu, mlengalenga wokoma mtima, ndi kumverera kwa dzenje-m'khoma la malo.
kwambiri vinyo mndandanda (italy), chakudya chabwino, utumiki anali POYAMBA bwino.
Ndiponso, mpungawo unalibe zokometsera, chotero sushi inali ya bland ndi yonyansa.
Mwamuna wina, mwinamwake bwana, anabwera patebulo lathu, ndipo popanda ngakhale kumwetulira kapena moni anapempha lamulo lathu.
Mmodzi wa ankakonda wanga ngakhale anali Angry Lobster, ozizira nkhanu saladi kuti anali zazikulu.
Chakudya chonse chinali pamwamba pa avareji ndipo ndinkabwerera kuti ndione momwe amagwirira ntchito ndi chakudya chamadzulo chachinayi kapena chochepa.
Mofanana ndi malo odyera ena a ku India, amagwiritsa ntchito chakudya chamadzulo chapadera kuti akope makasitomala pakhomo.
Vinyo ndi mowa zokha ndizo zimaperekedwa, koma mitundu ya nyumba kwenikweni ndi yabwino kwambiri.
Sizinali pamwamba pa wamba ndipo mtundu wa ng'ombe unali ndi nyama ya ng'ombe yotsika mtengo (yosaphika).
Tinalamula kusungunuka kwa nsomba ya tuna - inatuluka ndi tchizi chomwe chinangopanga sangweji ya tuna.
Kukongoletsa ndi mdima, kuzizira komanso kutonthoza, pomwe chiwonetsero cha chakudya ndi chochititsa chidwi, poganizira mitengo yotsika.
Zosangalatsa zinali zabwino kwambiri zomwe ali nazo ziwonetsero zomwe zimachitika kudzera kunja kwa chakudya chamadzulo.
A wotchipa kudya kwa NYC, koma osati dosa.
Ine ndi mwamuna wanga takhala kumeneko kangapo ndipo nthawi iliyonse tinakhala pa bar ya sushi (chef Yoshi) ndikulamula zonse ala carte.
Chakudya chinali pafupifupi ndipo crème brulee inali yowopsa - shuga anali wopsereza, osati caramelized ndi kununkhiza kwa parafini.
Chakudya chachikulu pa mitengo yoyenera.
Utumiki unali wochedwa, koma anthuwo anali aubwenzi.
Utumikiwo ndi woopsa--nthawi yomaliza yomwe ndinali kumeneko (ndipo ndikutanthauza nthawi yomaliza) tinauzidwa kuti akufunikira tebulo lathu kuti tichoke.
Makhalidwe a chakudya ndi abwino kwambiri ndipo mtengo ndi wotsika mtengo, kumamatira ku nkhumba, nsomba, nkhuku, nkhosa ndi ndiwo zamasamba.
Ine sindikanadandaula ngakhale pang'ono ngati chakudya osachepera kulawa zabwino koma khalidwe la chakudya anali crappy, kwambiri.
$ 160 kwa 2 filets, 2 mbali, appetizer ndi zakumwa.
Amapereka menyu yomweyo koma ali ndi zakumwa zolengedwa zomwe zimakhala ndi mowa ndi mayina a cheeky - koma zimakuwonongerani.
Mndandanda wolimba wa vinyo, ogwira ntchito odziwa bwino, eni ake aubwenzi komanso menyu yosangalatsa, yomwe imasintha nthawi zonse imatipangitsa kuti tibwerere.
Pizza ndi yokoma ndipo mwiniwake ndi mmodzi wa abwino kwambiri ku NYC.
Ngakhale ine ndithu ankakonda chakudya ndi ambience, Ine sindiri wotsimikiza kwenikweni ngati izo iwo kwenikweni akuyenera izo Michelin mlingo iwo anasonyeza kotero prooudly mu zenera.
Chipinda chodyera chimakhala chokongola mwakachetechete popanda nyimbo zofuula - ndizotsitsimutsa bwanji!
Ndinali ndi ziyembekezo zapamwamba kwambiri za malowa ndipo ndinapanga kusungitsa miyezi ingapo pasadakhale pa chochitika chapadera.
Zakudya zina zosangalatsa za kusintha zimaphatikizapo nkhuku mu msuzi wa curry ndi salmon caserole.
Chakudya ndi chachikulu.
Chakudyacho ndi chodalirika ndipo mtengo wake ndi wachikatikati.
Pizza ndi yabwino ngakhale.
Ngati mumakonda vinyo ndi tchizi ndi zokoma French ulendo, mudzakonda Artisanal!
Chakudya pano chimachita utumiki waukulu ku dzina (Cantonese yomwe ili ...).
The pitsa ndi bwino ngati mumakonda woonda crusted pitsa.

Kwa zaka zambiri woyang'anira, Vittorio, ndi gulu lake, nthawi zonse amandichitira ngati banja--ngakhale ndi bizinesi yonse iyi osati-yaing'ono yamtengo wapatali imachita, ndizodabwitsa kuti amatha ngakhale kukumbukira mlendo wokhazikika koma osati pafupipafupi.
Mndandanda wa vinyo ndi wosangalatsa ndipo uli ndi makhalidwe ambiri abwino.
Ndipo ndikuyenera kugwirizana ndi anthu ambiri pankhani ya utumiki - kupereka ndi chidendene chawo cha Achilles.
Kawirikawiri sindinakhalepo ndi vuto ndi ogwira ntchito pang'onopang'ono m'zaka 10 zomwe ndakhala ndikupita.
Big Wong amapeza Ups yaikulu kwa kukhazikitsidwa kwabwino.
Malo odyera omwe samayesa kuchita chilichonse kupatula kutumikira chakudya chachikulu ndi utumiki waukulu mu mkhalidwe wosangalatsa.
Zakumwazo zinali zabwino kwambiri, ndipo chakudyacho chinali chabwino.
Kwambiri amalangiza izi monga phindu lalikulu kwambiri sushi ndi utumiki.
Mitengo ndi pafupifupi $ 9 kwa entree chakudya chamadzulo ndipo ngakhale zochepa chakudya chamasana.
Avereji ku chakudya chabwino cha Thai, koma kubereka koopsa.
Chabwino, kotero ma seva amayendayenda mozungulira pang'ono clueless, koma pali ma seva oposa okwanira kwa khamu lomwe amapeza - ndibwino, muyenera kungoyesetsa pang'ono kuti mupeze chidwi chawo.
Ndakhala ndikubwera kuno ndili mwana ndipo nthawi zonse ndimabweranso chifukwa cha kukoma.
Tinaseka pamene potsiriza anatipatsa menyu ya dessert ndipo tinasiya nsonga ya 10 peresenti, yomwe inali yopatsa, ndikumverera.

Chochititsa chidwi cha usiku chinali mayonaisse kwa mbali yanga ya batala yomwe ndinalandira kuchokera kwa mmodzi wa othamanga chakudya, zomwe sizabwino poganizira kuti ndalamazo zinali pafupifupi $ 100.
Kwenikweni (kuti awonjezere odyera omwe angathe) iwo anali kutengabe kusungitsa foni ndikugawiranso matebulo a omwe akudikirira m'chipinda chochezera alendo.
Anatiuza kuti tikhale paliponse, ndipo pamene tinakhala iye anati tebulo linali losungidwa.

Nha Trang, pamene kukhala wotchuka chifukwa cha kusowa kwathunthu chitonthozo ndi zokongoletsa, zoopsa pang'onopang'ono kudikira ndodo ndi chakudya zoopsa mwamsanga, ndi imodzi yabwino vietnamese odyera ine ndakhalapo. ndi pho ndi zokoma ndipo akubwera ndi vegtables atsopano kwambiri.
seva wathu wochezeka anapanga malingaliro kwambiri chakudya komanso anatumiza onse sommelier ndi fromager ku tebulo kuthandiza amati pairings osiyana vinyo ndi tchizi.
Inde, amagwiritsa ntchito zosakaniza zapamwamba, koma ngakhale zosakaniza zapamwamba sizipanga pizza yabwino pokhapokha wina atadziwa momwe angapezere bwino chigoba.
Taj Mahal amapereka phindu la mafuta ndi chakudya chachikulu.
Ndikupangira mbale zawo za Pad See Ew, Pork Chops kapena Tofu.
Wina kuphatikiza ndi ambiri a entrees ndi pafupifupi.
Baluchi's ili ndi chakudya cholimba komanso chokongoletsera chabwino pa mitengo yoyenera.
Ndipo zonse zimabwera pamtengo woyenera kwambiri (congee, noodles, ndi mbale za mpunga siziposa $ 3-6 iliyonse).
Calzones awo ndi zoopsa, zoipa, kusanza-kuyambitsa, YUCK.
Zosakaniza zimakoma mwatsopano, chigoba chimakhala chochepa komanso crispier, chidutswacho chimakhala ndi mafuta ochepa, ndipo sichiwotchedwa ngati nthawi zina chimakhala ku Joe's.
$ 160 kwa 2 filets, 2 mbali, appetizer ndi zakumwa.
Ndipo msuzi wa Tom Kha unali womvetsa chisoni.
Mtengo ndi khalidwe la nsomba zokha zidzatiletsa kupanga ulendo wobwereza.
Ogwira ntchito ndi accomodating kwambiri.
Nthawi iliyonse yomwe mukufuna kukonza Sushi, Mizu idzakhalapo ndi nsomba zabwino komanso utumiki waukulu.
Kusankhidwa kwakukulu kwa bruschettas, paninis, tramezzinis kumasunga m'kamwa ku stagnating.

Ndi odyera ambiri abwino pa UWS, Ine sindikusowa overpriced chakudya, zopanda pake odzikuza kudikira-antchito amene sazindikira iwo ntchito pa odyera wolemekezeka, utumiki clumsy, ndi kasamalidwe kuti alibe nazo ntchito.

Ndiyenera kuchenjeza wowerenga kuti magawo a magawo ndi ochepa kwambiri (makamaka appetizers), kotero ngati mukukonzekera kudya mpaka mutakhuta ndipo simukufuna kulamula menyu yapadera yolawa ya wophika, konzekerani kulamula ndi kulipira appetizer (1 mbale kwa munthu aliyense chifukwa magawo sali ogawana),  entree yaikulu, ndi udon yozizira kumapeto kwa chakudya.
Utumiki unali wotentha komanso wosamala, carpaachio ya ng'ombe inali exellent (gawo lalikulu) ndipo pasitala anali watsopano komanso wokonzekera bwino.
The cafe palokha anali kwenikweni zabwino ndi mipando omasuka panja ndi matebulo, koma utumiki zikanakhala bwino.

The mussaman curry yomwe ndinalamula inali yowonda ngati madzi ndipo kupatula tofu yokazinga bwino yomwe ndinalamula mmenemo, iwo mwachisomo anandipatsa chidutswa chimodzi cha mbatata yophika molakwika.
Iwo kununkhiza ngati iwo zinthu ndi masamba akale zamzitini ngati sipinachi bowa calzone.
Woperekera chakudya wathu ndi anthu onse omuthandiza anali atcheru ndi oona mtima.
Anthu nthawi zonse amakhala aubwenzi.
Chibwenzi changa chinanditengera ku Scopa sabata yatha tsiku langa lobadwa ndipo sindinakhulupirire chakudyacho.
Chakudyacho chinali chabwino kwambiri, koma chopanda kukoma pang'ono ndi magawo ang'onoang'ono kwambiri, kuphatikizapo dessert.
Ndithudi mkhalidwe umenewu ukusowa, koma kodi mukuyembekezera chiyani kuchokera ku malo a bagel a maola 24?
Takhala tikutsatira chakudya cha chef Lyle kuzungulira New York kwa zaka 15 ndipo pamene tikukhalabe akale, zatsopano zake ndi bistro fare zatipangitsa kubwerera ndi kubwerera.
Ndakhala ndikukonda Kwambiri Holy Basil ku East Village, ndipo ngakhale ndikukhulupirira kuti chakudya chawo chatsika pang'ono, ndakhala ndikuzengereza kukhala wosakhulupirika.
Zimapulumutsa kulowa ndikuyembekezera tebulo mu bar yomwe nthawi zambiri imakhala phokoso, yodzaza pa nthawi ya chakudya chamadzulo.
Makhani anali bwino --korma inali bland.
Chakudya chinali chachikulu ndipo utumiki unali wabwino kwambiri.
Kupatula apo, pamene muli ndi utumiki woipa, ndi ndalama zochepa zomwe muyenera kupereka.
seva wathu wochezeka anapanga malingaliro kwambiri chakudya komanso anatumiza onse sommelier ndi fromager ku tebulo kuthandiza amati pairings osiyana vinyo ndi tchizi.
zonsezi zimakhala ndi mtengo woyenera kwambiri (kuzungulira $ 8 chakudya chamadzulo ndi $ 5 chakudya chamasana), ndipo zimakhala zokoma komanso zodzaza.
Mpunga ku chakudya cha nsomba unalinso wabwino--sanayese overpack mpunga.
Ndimabwerera mu mzere ngati katatu pafupifupi mpaka sindingathenso kuyenda.
Ndikupangira nsomba za jelly, nkhuku yoledzera ndi soupy dumplings, ndithudi stir fry blue crab.
Tinadya pa malo awa a Thai potsatira ndemanga koma osakondwa kwambiri ndi zakudya.
Chakudya chathu chomwe timakonda kwambiri ndi pizza ya pesto, saladi ya nyumba, ndi botolo labwino la vinyo.
Tinali ndi desserts kwambiri (kuphatikizapo cannoli yabwino kwambiri yomwe ndakhala nayo) ndiyeno iwo anapereka pambuyo pa chakudya chamadzulo, panyumba.
Kotero ngati mukufuna chakudya chabwino, chosangalatsa ku Montparnasse, pitani mofulumira kwa pre-theater prix-fixe.
Chakudya chinali bwino, palibe chachikulu.
Choyamba, woperekera chakudya anali wosasamala kwathunthu nthawi za 2 zomwe tinamuwona(zodabwitsa mu malo odyera okhala ndi matebulo a 6) ndipo adapeza dongosolo lathu molakwika.
Msuzi unali wamadzi ndipo chakudyacho chinalibe kukoma kwakukulu.
Palibe malamulo a kavalidwe, palibe maganizo, ubwenzi wambiri wotonthoza, malo abwino kwambiri omasuka mu Midtown yotanganidwa nthawi zonse.
Gome lirilonse liri ndi mphika wa madzi otentha omizidwa pamwamba pake, ndipo mumapeza mbale za nyama zowonda, ndiwo zamasamba zosiyanasiyana, ndi mpunga ndi galasi.
Ndithudi mkhalidwe umenewu ukusowa, koma kodi mukuyembekezera chiyani kuchokera ku malo a bagel a maola 24?
Titalandira lamulo lathu la sashimi, sindinakhulupirire kuti magawo ake anali ochepa motani!
Pambuyo podandaula za mbale ya nkhuku, bwana anabwera kudzatiuza zimenezo, palibe amene anadandaulapo kale, ndikuti sitinkadziwa kuti mbaleyo iyenera kukoma bwanji.
Ive akhala pano gulu la nthawi tsopano ndi utumiki nthawi zonse apadera.
Mtengo wonse unali wokwera mtengo kwambiri, chinthu chimene ndinayembekezera.
Ogwira ntchito amapereka ntchito yopanda kanthu.
Mmodzi mwa anthu oyambirira ndemanga pa odyera sanapeze kuti ena kuyesera zikuchitika ndi menyu mu njira yabwino.
Ndiyenera kunena kuti sindinakhalepo ndi chakudya chochotsa mfundo pano.
Pizza - pizza yokhayo ku NYC yomwe sayenera kukhala ndi toppings yowonjezera - crust imakoma ngati mkate wabwino kwambiri, wophika mwatsopano!
Kumanja kwanga, hostess anaima pamwamba pa busboy ndi hissed rapido, rapido pamene anayesa kuchotsa ndi kukhazikitsanso tebulo kwa zisanu ndi chimodzi.
The utumiki, vinyo kusankha, ambiance onse apadera ndipo ayenera kuzindikiridwa.
kusankha bwino vinyo kuyambira angakwanitse kuti mkulu mapeto.
Ngati chakudya chanu chomwe mumakonda ku China ndi General Tao nkhuku, ndiye kuti izi SI malo anu.
Ndipo mitengo yawo ndi yapamwamba kwambiri - kwenikweni amaganiza kuti akhoza kuchoka ndi kulipiritsa mitengo yotereyi chakudya choopsa ndi utumiki!
Izi ndi wangwiro tsiku malo kwa Williamsburg mabanja.
Panali zambiri kwa 6 Blue Point oysters ndi mowa kapena galasi la vinyo kwa $ 8!
Iwo anali mwadzidzidzi kwambiri ndi ine pamene ndinaimbira foni ndipo kwenikweni anati chakudya chinali mochedwa chifukwa iwo anali kunja kwa mpunga.
Msampha wanga wa mphika wotentha ndi nsomba za m'nyanja unali wodzaza ndi nkhanu zotsanzira ndi zidutswa zingapo za nkhanu ndi squid, ndipo unatenthedwa mosafunikira ndi choyaka.
Tinapempha kusamutsidwa (kumene kunatenga theka la ola), ndiyeno tinakhala m'malo okwera magalimoto kumbuyo, ngakhale kuti chipinda chonsecho chinali chopanda kanthu.
Ndinapempha seltzer ndi laimu, palibe ayezi.
Chakudya, choperekedwa m'magawo ang'onoang'ono olawa (monga njira) ndi chabwino kwambiri ndi mbale iliyonse kukhala yabwino kuposa yotsatira.
Utumiki unali wotentha komanso wosamala, carpaachio ya ng'ombe inali exellent (gawo lalikulu) ndipo pasitala anali watsopano komanso wokonzekera bwino.
Zosakaniza zatsopano ndi zonse zimapangidwa kuti zipangidwe.

Pamene tinali kukhala pansi kudya chakudya cha subpar bwanayo anapitiriza kudzudzula antchito ake angapo chifukwa chotulutsa makontena olakwika kaamba ka zokometsera ndi kuwafotokozera mmene makontena ameneŵa anali okwera mtengo.
Utumiki ndi wabwino ndipo amakulolani kuti musangalale ndi malingaliro.

Ngakhale $ 20 entrée osiyanasiyana si okwera mtengo kwambiri, ku New York City, palidi chakudya chabwino mu mndandanda umenewo, ndipo kotero Sapphire, ngakhale kuti ndi mlengalenga wokongola, mwinamwake sadzakhala malo odyera omwe ndidzabwerera.
Leon ndi East Village ngale: wamba koma m'chiuno, ndi bwino anakonza zofunika French bistro ulendo, wapadera wabwino, ofunda ndi moyo m'mlengalenga.
kwambiri vinyo mndandanda (italy), chakudya chabwino, utumiki anali POYAMBA bwino.
Eee, nthawi zina utumiki ukhoza kukhala pang'onopang'ono.
Anthu abwino oterewa akugwira ntchito pano - koma ndikuyenera kubwereza chakudya.
Chakudya chinali chabwino ndipo mawonekedwe a new york city skiline anali owopsa ngakhale pa tsiku la mvula ya nkhungu ngati la pamene ndinapita.
Malo awa ali ndi mkati mwabwino kwambiri omwe ndawawona kulikonse kumpoto kwa W'burg, ndipo adzakondweretsa aliyense yemwe mumabweretsa kumeneko.
Kwa khalidwe la chakudya, pang'ono mtengo kwambiri.
Kuphatikiza kwa msuzi watsopano wa tomato, tchizi chatsopano cha mozz, basil ndi mtanda womwe amapanga ndi ufa wochokera kunja, kumapangitsa izi kukhala imodzi mwa pizza yabwino ku NY.

Kuwonjezera pa kukhala ndi tebulo lomwe tinalonjezedwa kuperekedwa kwa ena ogwira ntchito m'ma lesitilanti kawiri tisanakhale kwenikweni, tinapatsidwa mbale zomwe sitinalamule katatu, tinalandira imodzi mwa malamulo athu mphindi 20 pambuyo poti tebulo lonse laperekedwa (ndipo lamulo limenelo linali loperewera), ndipo tinalipira $ 45 kuposa momwe tinayenera kukhalira pa bilu yathu.
Cholakwika chokha - iwo sadzatenga bagel yanu, ndipo samapanga mazira a bagel.
Vinyo ndi mowa zokha ndizo zimaperekedwa, koma mitundu ya nyumba kwenikweni ndi yabwino kwambiri.
Mbali yabwino kwambiri ya chochitikacho inali kudziwa kuti bwana (mtsikana wa bubbly, waubwenzi ndi kumwetulira kwakukulu) amasamaladi za momwe tinkachitira.
Ngakhale menyu si makamaka groundbreaking, zonse ndayesera mpaka pano wakhala bwino anaphedwa ndi zokoma.
Sangalimbikitse chakudya chamadzulo!
Ngakhale bwino, iwo amadziwa kuphika French classics monga Steak au Poivre ndi Onglet popanda kuwotcha mpaka imfa kapena overcooking izo.
The Pad thai, mnyamata nar ndi mbale zina zosiyanasiyana zonse zimawoneka bwino pa pepala koma, ndakhala ndi chakudya chabwino cha thai m'malo ochepa asthetically osangalatsa.
Ndinakonda mazira a dzira mu msuzi wa ng'ombe ndi nkhanu dumplings ndi zidutswa za BBQ nkhumba yophika.
aspects: dzira noodles mu msuzi ng'ombe ndi nkhanu dumplings ndi zidutswa za BBQ wokazinga nkhumba

sentences: Mkhalidwe wabwino, wakuda ndi nyimbo ndi kukhudza kwabwino.
The ambience ndi wokongola ndi zabwino kukambirana, kotero wamba masana pano mwina kukhala bwino.
Volare anamwali kapena mlungu uliwonse wokhazikika, aliyense amachitiridwa mofanana ndipo simungathe kupempha zambiri kuposa zimenezo pamene utumiki ndi wochezeka chonchi.
Ngakhale malo odyera atsopano adakali ndi mipando yambiri yomweyo yomwe inachititsa Tiffin kukhala wokongola kwambiri, menyu yasinthidwa.
Basi musatenge mpando pakati pa bala ndi kumbuyo theka la odyera, ndinaona mkazi kupeza nudged 40times atakhala pamenepo.
Chakudyacho chinali chodabwitsa, utumikiwo unali wosamala kwambiri ndi munthu, ndipo bwanji za ambience imeneyo!
Utumiki ndi wabwino ndipo resturant ndi woyera.
Pizza inali yaikulu.
Ine kumaliza okwana bagel zinachitikira mwa kukhala izo mopepuka toasted.
Its malo abwino chete kupita kudya chakudya chabwino, kumasuka, kukhala wokhoza kulankhula ndi kukhala ndi nthawi yabwino kwambiri.
Menyu inali yochititsa chidwi ndi kusankha kuyambira burger, kupita ku steak, kupita ku escargot.
Mkazi wolandira alendoyo ndi woperekera chakudyayo anali amwano kwambiri ndipo anachita zonse zimene akanatha kuti atifulumire kutuluka.
Zinkaoneka ngati tchizi chosweka pang'ono kuchitidwa - akadali m'mizere.
Chifukwa chakuti ndi zotsika mtengo sizikutanthauza kuti magawo ndi ang'onoang'ono kapena chakudya ndi chonyansa, NDI CHACHIKULU!
Mtengo wake unali womveka kwambiri kwa appetizers ndi chakudya chimene tinadya.
Utumiki unali wofulumira, waubwenzi komanso waukulu.
Menyu inali ndi chakudya cha brassiere chokhazikika, bwino ndiye malo monga Balthazar etc.
Muyenera kuyesa nkhanu appetizers.
Maphunziro atatu - zosankha zimaphatikizapo mussels zabwino kwambiri, puff pastry mbuzi tchizi ndi saladi ndi kuvala kokoma, ndi hanger steak au poivre yomwe ili kunja kwa dziko lino.
Malo awa ndi ofunika kupita ngakhale mowa wawo wokha.
Utumiki wosangalatsa, chakudya wosangalatsa, ndi chilled kunja mlengalenga ndi chilengedwe.
Winnie ndi antchito ake ndi gulu labwino kwambiri limene mungapeze likutumikirani.
Menyu ndi Prix Fixe, kotero khalani okonzeka kugwiritsa ntchito osachepera $ 60 pa munthu, koma ndi Bwino itsuperb chakudya.
The filet mignon mbale anali zapamwamba!
Ine ndi mwamuna wanga tonse tinalamula Steak, sing'anga.
Pizza anali pang'ono soggy.
Utumiki unali wabwino kwambiri, ndipo AC inagwiranso ntchito bwino kwambiri (zikomo Mulungu, inali yotentha!).
Tinali gulu la anthu 8 ndipo tinali oipa kwambiri.
Nsomba yawo ya tuna tartar appetizer ndiyo kufa.
Tinakhala pansi mwamsanga pamene tinali ndi zokayikira, komabe pambuyo pake utumikiwo unali wochedwa.
Tchizi cha kirimu chiri kunja kwa dziko lino ndipo ndimakonda khofi ameneyo !!
$ 20 imakupatsirani sushi yopanda malire yapamwamba kwambiri- Ndinatenga ngakhale bwenzi kuno kuchokera ku Japan yemwe adati inali imodzi mwa malo abwino kwambiri a sushi ku US omwe wakhalapo.
ndi malo angwiro kukhala ndi amanzing indian chakudya.
Ndakhala ndikukometsera katatu- kawiri pa chakudya chamasana ndi kamodzi pa chakudya chamadzulo.
Great roofdeck, gulu labwino la 30 somethings, koma palibe nyimbo, mtundu wa chete.
Chakudya ndi chabwino kwambiri kwa mtengo wake, bwino kuposa ambiri dumplings wokazinga ndakhala.
Mapepala a scallion ndi dumplings okazinga sanali wamba.
Menyu ya Prix Fixe ndi yoyenera penny iliyonse ndipo mumapeza zoposa zokwanira (zonse mu kuchuluka NDI khalidwe).
Mtundu wa malo ang'onoang'ono koma ndikuganiza kuti ngati sali otanganidwa kwambiri angathe kukwanira gulu kapena ana.
$ 160 kwa 2 filets, 2 mbali, appetizer ndi zakumwa.
Ophunzira onse a NYU amakonda malowa kotero zimapangitsa kuti pakhale mkhalidwe wachinyamata wosangalatsa.
Utumikiwo unali wosamala popanda kukhala wopambanitsa ndipo mbale iliyonse yomwe tinayesa inali yodabwitsa kuchokera ku mipukutu ya kasupe kupita ku cod ndi tempura ya nthochi.
Vinyo nthawi zonse amakhala wabwino, tapas nthawi zonse amakhala yummy, makamaka ndi mkate wofunda wa pita.
monga kunena kuti mkate wake umachokera ku mkate wapadera pamene tamuwona akugula dowtown manhathan.

(chakudya chinaperekedwa ndi busboy, osati woperekera chakudya) Sitinapeze tchizi choperekedwa kaamba ka pasitala, magalasi athu a madzi ndi vinyo anakhalabe EMPTY chakudya chathu chonse, pamene tikanawononga mosavuta $20 ina pa vinyo.
Ngati mumakonda chakudya chokometsera pezani nkhuku vindaloo.
Ndinali ndi chakudya chamadzulo mochedwa ku Lucky Stike, dzina lalikulu la mgwirizano ngati nthawi ina ndinawona imodzi.
Tinachoka pambuyo pa kumwa kamodzi.
NDI malonda abwino kwambiri m'tauni ya chakudya chamadzulo cha Lolemba usiku pa lesitilanti yabwino.
Ophika nyenyezi awiriwa anachoka nthawi ina yapitayo kuti atsegule malo awo.
Menyu ndi yochepa koma pafupifupi mbale zonse ndi zabwino kwambiri.
Komanso zabwino kwa kasitomala chakudya chamasana misonkhano, esp.
Muyenera kuwonjezera utumiki kwambiri.
Pansi chochezera nthawi zonse kukopa bwino
Chakudyacho ndi chatsopano, chokoma, komanso chogulidwa bwino.
Zakumwazo ndi chisomo chopulumutsa, koma ogwira ntchito zautumiki, chonde, mudzigonjetse nokha.
Kalembedwe kotchuka kwambiri Izakaya (Sake ndi gawo laling'ono la mbale za sake-friendly ).
Ngakhale kuti lesitilantiyo inali yodzaza, tinakhala pansi mwamsanga ndipo ngakhale kupempha tebulo m'chipinda chapamwamba popanda mavuto.
Amagulitsa sushi yapadera, chirichonse chili ndi topping, msuzi ndi zina zotero.
Ndinalamula mbale ya Chicken Teriyaki ndipo ndinapeza kuti nkhukuyo inali youma kwambiri.
Kusankhidwa kwa vinyo (ndi galasi ndi botolo) ndizodabwitsa ndipo nthawi zonse ndimalimbikitsa kuti abwenzi apange kusungitsa ngati adzakhala mtawuni.
Ife nthawi zambiri basi kupeza ena a chakudya chapadera ndipo iwo kwambiri moyenera mtengo ndi zokoma kwambiri.
Chakudyacho chimakonzedwa mofulumira komanso bwino.
Mwamsanga titalipira, woperekera chakudya anatenga ndalama ndipo anati, chabwino, inu anyamata muli outta pano.
Chakudya chamadzulo ndinali ndi nkhuku tikka-masala ndi ena adyo naan.
The calamari akubwera ndi msuzi zosaneneka, ndi bakha noodles ndi yummy komanso.
Utumiki si kwenikweni nyenyezi zisanu, koma kuti si kwenikweni nkhani yaikulu.
Pezani msuzi ndi nosh (pastrami sandwich) kwa $ 8 ndipo ndinu golide.
Zodzaza zingakhale zosagwirizana koma dosa batter ndithudi ndi yeniyeni ndipo osakaniza ndi okoma kwambiri.

Cornelia Street ikuwoneka ngati Broadway yokhazikitsidwa kwa West Side Story ndipo mkati mwa Po ndi quaint yozizira kwambiri simungathe kukhala pamwamba pa malo a chakudya chamadzulo chachikondi ku NYC.
Iwo sanatipatse zakudya zoyamikira, ananyalanyaza zopempha mobwerezabwereza za shuga, ndipo anaponya mbale zathu patebulo.
Aliyense ngati muli ndi kusungitsa mudzayembekezera max 5 mphindi - kotero khalani ndi chakumwa pa bar.
N'zomvetsa chisoni kuti malo abwino, abwino monga Pink Pony akhoza kuwonongeka kwambiri ndi utumiki lousy.
Chilichonse nthawi zonse chimaphikidwa ku ungwiro, utumiki ndi wabwino kwambiri, kukongoletsa ozizira ndi understated.
Ndipo, matebulo a atlhough anatseguka pafupi nafe ndipo tinaPEMPHA malo aakulu pang'ono, iwo anatisiya ife awkardly atakhala.
Mitengo singathe kumenyedwa chifukwa cha khalidwe, kuchuluka, mwatsopano ndi kukoma.
Pazifukwa zina, nsomba zonse za m'nyanja pa menyu sizinapezeke kupatulapo Salmon.
Mumapeza zomwe mumalipira komanso ndi mfundo imeneyo m'maganizo, Spice ndi malo abwino kwambiri kuti mugwire zakudya ndi zakumwa zotsika mtengo pamalo okongola.
Magawo ndi aakulu ndipo ma seva nthawi zonse amatidabwitsa ndi woyambira wosiyana.
Imayendetsedwa ndi wophika yemweyo wa Sichuan yemwe adayambitsa unyolo ku Chinatown.
Malo enieniwo ndi okongola malo a bar akuwoneka kuti akuchitika.
Ndithudi mukhoza kupeza malo odyera omwe amapereka malo odyera abwino kwambiri, koma chakudya chabwino kwambiri pamtengo woyenera, La Villa sangathe kumenyedwa.
Banja lathu silinayembekezere zosangalatsa zosaneneka zoterozo m'lesitilanti.
Tinali ndi tiem yaikulu yoyang'ana mawonetsero ndi anthu ndipo chakudya cha ar chinali chomwe tinkafunafuna.
Tinali mofulumira kulamula mbale ya appetizer popeza tinali ndi njala kwambiri.
Musayembekezere kukhala pansi mkati ngakhale, pali matebulo ochepa chabe ndipo nthawi zonse amadzaza.
Ndadya ku malo odyera a Alain Ducasse ku Monte Carlo kwa theka la mtengo womwewo wabwino kwambiri wodyera.

osati chakudya ,osati ambiance , osati utumiki, ndikugwirizana ndi ndemanga zapitazo mumadikira ndikudikira , ogwira ntchito kudikira ndi amwano kwambiri ndipo mukalowa akuyang'ana kuti akutulutseni bwino .
Kamodzi chakudya chamadzulo ndi kamodzi kwa brunch.
Utumiki unali devine, oysters kumene chilakolako pamene iwo akubwera, ndipo mtengo sangathe kumenyedwa!!
Ngati ndinu munthu amene amayamikira kuphweka, kukongola, ndi modabwitsa anapereka ndi kulawa nsomba ndi ndiwo zamasamba mosasamala gawo kukula, Kai ndi malo anu.
Malowa anali opanda kanthu kwenikweni koma chinali chifukwa chakuti ili linali Lamlungu loyamba lomwe anatsegula.
Mkhalidwe wabwino, utumiki unali wosangalatsa kwambiri ndipo chipululu chinali chabwino.
Kotero ena mwa ndemanga pano ndi olondola za khamu ndi phokoso.
Ogwira ntchito sali aubwenzi, koma kukoma kwake kumaphimba zonse.
Kotero ine sindinayambe kwenikweni kupita ku M moyenera, koma ndakhala ndikupereka kangapo.

iyi ndi malo abwino kwambiri achinsinsi pakati pa mzinda ', ndinamva kuti kuchokera kwa bartender, pambuyo pokhala ndi chakudya chowala ( yesani steak ndi bowa wa portobello) ndi zakumwa pa bar Lachiwiri lapitalo.
Menyu ya photobook inali kukhudza kokongola, ndithudi inathandiza gulu langa ndipo ndimasankha nkhuku yokazinga, nkhumba ya nkhumba, ndi mbale za noodle zomwe tonse tinalamula.
The ndodo ndi accomodating, ndi ambiance ndi zosangalatsa komabe omasuka, ndi chakudya ali kunja kwa dziko lino!
Kwa mitengo imeneyo ndi mkhalidwe wovala mmwamba mumayembekezera zambiri ndipo muyenera kupeza zambiri.

Chakudya chokoma, utumiki wabwino kwambiri, ndi mlengalenga wokongola zimapangitsa izi kusankha kwakukulu kwa chakudya chamadzulo ndi $ 5.99 masana buffet zimapangitsa kusankha bwino kwambiri chakudya chamasana!
The bagels ndi fabulous.
Sushi sanali chilichonse chochititsa chidwi pa mtengo.
Zonse zomwe ndinganene ndi $ 2 pints pa ola losangalala komanso ena mwa oyisitala otsika mtengo omwe mungapeze mumzindawu, ngakhale kuti khalidwe ndi zina zabwino kwambiri.

iyi ndi malo abwino kwambiri achinsinsi pakati pa mzinda ', ndinamva kuti kuchokera kwa bartender, pambuyo pokhala ndi chakudya chowala ( yesani steak ndi bowa wa portobello) ndi zakumwa pa bar Lachiwiri lapitalo.
Malo ofunda, omasuka, mapangano abwino (onani galasi la etched ndi njerwa zolekanitsa zipinda zodyera).
Chakudya kuno ndi chabwino, koma pokhapokha ngati mumakonda kudikira.
Ndinapeza chakudya, utumiki ndi mtengo wapadera everytime ndakhala kumeneko.
Mmodzi wa ife kwenikweni ankakonda expresso - ndizo.
Mu gawo loterolo crappy wa tawuni kupeza mtengo wabwino chakudya chamasana, malo awa ndi kwambiri.

Tinaganiza kuti sitinayambe takhalapo ndi Pizza ya ku Argentina kale kotero tinagwira chakudya chathu chamasana kumeneko, kugawana Pelligrino yaikulu, pitsa ya awiri awo apadera, wina anali tchizi cha mbuzi tchizi china cha buluu, ndipo onse anali abwino kwambiri.
Curry wofiira ndi wofooka komanso wopanda kukoma, pad thai imamangidwa pamodzi ndi lumpy, mpunga nthawi zambiri umaphika kwambiri, ndipo nsomba zam'nyanja zimakhala zokongola kwambiri.
Tinatenga advanatage ya theka mtengo sushi zambiri Loweruka kotero zinali bwino ofunika.
Ndinapita pa 6: 00 PM makamaka kwa menyu ya pre-theater ($ 19.95 ya msuzi wa tomato wokazinga ndi chevre, steak frites, crème brulee) ndipo zinali zodabwitsa.
Musapite nokha---ngakhale anthu awiri sikokwanira pazochitika zonse, ndi pickles ndi kusankha nyama ndi nsomba za m'nyanja.
Ali ndi Indian weniweni pa mitengo yodabwitsa.
mawu a malangizo, sungani malo a mbale za pasta ndipo musachoke mpaka mutakhala ndi tiramisu.
Pokhapokha ngati mukudya kumbali ya Pizzeria ya malo awa, ndipo simukuthamangira, malowa ndi lingaliro loipa.

Inyabu zihambaye ni zo zaciye zija mu nzira za kera.
Nkunda kurya kw'ipamba, ariko n'iy'indya ziri ku ruhande rumwe, ka gaca gaca.
Indya ziryoshe kandi zifise akamaro kanini, ariko zifise akamaro kanini ariko zifise akamaro kanini, kandi urudandazwa rw'umuvinyu ruhuza neza n'ibifungurwa.
Icupa ry'umujumbu ni icupa rya pesto, salade y'inzu hamwe n'icupa ryiza ry'umuvinyu.

Mu gihe amatanki yo mu bindi binyabuzima vyo mu Bushinwa yerekanye ubuzima bw'abantu benshi mu mazi abira, amatanki y'i Ping aboneka neza nk'ay'ibikoko bisa n'ibishobisho bidashobora kumenya ko bizoba ari bimwe mu bihimba vy'urukundo rw'abakundana.
